LeBron_James posted a 25 - point , 14 - assist double_double , while Kevin_Love also accomplished the feat with 20 points and 11 boards . The stellar production helped overcome a down night for Kyrie_Irving , who drained just 3 of his 17 shot attempts , producing a season - low 8 - point tally . His 0 - of - 5 tally from beyond the arc also marked the first time he 's been blanked from long distance this season . The Sixers received another standout effort from Joel_Embiid , who totaled 22 points , 6 rebounds , 2 assists and 4 blocks in 25 minutes . Ersan_Ilyasova may prove hard to keep on the bench much longer , given that his 21 points , which paced the reserves , was his second double_digit scoring haul in as many games since joining Philadelphia .
The Houston Rockets ( 56 - 26 ) concluded the regular season with an 117 - 91 win over the Utah Jazz ( 38 - 44 ) . The Rockets jumped out to a 65 - 35 halftime lead . James_Harden conceded the scoring title to the Thunders ' Russell_Westbrook , but did his best Westbrook imitation by securing a triple_double in fewer than 27 minutes . Rudy_Gobert made 1 last push for Most_Improved_Player and Defensive_Player_of_the_Year awards , notching 3 blocks and 1 steal in 24 minutes . He finished the year with 3 blocks per game , third best among qualifiers
Washington not only overcame a 13 - point fourth quarter deficit , but won by double_digit as well . The team shot over 51 percent from the field on the night and outscored Los_Angeles 37 - 13 in the fourth . At the crux of the win was All-Star point guard John_Wall , who scored 34 points to go along with 14 assists and 4 steals . John_Wall was an excellent 14 - of - 25 from the field . Sophomore D'Angelo_Russell filled the stat sheet respectably , shooting 10 - of - 21 for 28 points to go along with 9 assists and 6 rebounds . His backcourt partner , Jordan_Clarkson , added another 22 points and shot 10 - of - 19 .
The Oklahoma_City Thunder defeated the Brooklyn Nets , 124 - 105 , at Chesapeake_Energy_Arena . The Nets ( 4 - 8 ) came out like a house afire to open the game , scoring a whopping 40 points in the opening quarter . Oklahoma_City ( 8 - 5 ) finished with a 55 percent success rate from the field and outscored Brooklyn by a 90 - 65 margin over the final 3 quarters . Brooklyn was led by Brook_Lopez , who totaled 22 points , 4 rebounds , 2 assists , 2 blocks and 1 steal . Rondae-Rondae_Hollis-Jefferson and Bojan_Bogdanovic registered a pair of 13 - point tallies , with the former adding 5 rebounds , 2 assists and 2 steals and the latter hauling in a trio of boards and dishing out 2 assists . Anthony_Bennett led the second unit with 12 points and 3 rebounds , while Joe_Harris and Sean_Kilpatrick registered a pair of 10 - point efforts . Russell_Westbrook posted a triple_double that consisted of 30 points , 13 assists , 10 rebounds and 1 steal . Victor_Oladipo contributed 26 points , 6 assists and 5 rebounds . Steven_Adams was an effective third wheel with 15 points , 7 boards and 2 blocks . Joffrey_Lauvergne and Enes_Kanter managed a pair of 13 - point efforts to lead the reserves .
The Houston Rockets ( 18 - 5 ) defeated the Denver Nuggets ( 10 - 13 ) 108 - 96 on Saturday . He was supposed to be limited to 24 minutes in the game , but Dwight_Howard persevered to play 30 minutes and put up a monstrous double_double of 26 points and 13 rebounds . Joining Dwight_Howard in on the fun was James_Harden with a triple_double of 24 points , 10 rebounds and 10 assists in 38 minutes . The Rockets ' formidable defense held the Nuggets to just 38 percent shooting from the field . Even at the free_throw line , the Nuggets shot just 65 percent .
Kobe_Bryant scored 60 points as the Los_Angeles Lakers ( 17 - 65 ) beat the Utah Jazz ( 40 - 42 ) in his farewell game , 101 - 96 . Kobe_Bryant , who plans to retire after 20 NBA seasons , took a career - high 50 shots , making 22 field goals . He scored 38 in the second half as the Lakers overcame a 15 - point halftime deficit . The Lakers ' defense , which struggled all season , was surprsingly the key to the comeback , as it held the Jazz to just 39 points in the second half . The third - leading scorer in NBA history , Kobe_Bryant became the oldest player to score 50 points in a game as he posted the fifth - highest scoring game of his career . Trey_Lyles led the Jazz with 18 points , 11 rebounds and 5 steals . Gordon_Hayward , who finished with 17 points , had the unfortunate task of covering Kobe_Bryant
The Indiana Pacers ( 17 - 31 ) throttled the New_York Knicks ( 9 - 38 ) 103 - 82 Thursday at the Bankers_Life_Fieldhouse . The Knicks held a 5 - point deficit at halftime before having a complete meltdown in the third quarter . Roy_Hibbert scored 10 of his 18 points in the third and added 10 rebounds in the contest to notch his 12th double_double on the season . Carmelo_Anthony had n't scored less than 20 points in any game this month , but was held to 18 points on 7 - of - 16 shooting against the Pacers . George_Hill and CJ_Miles were both able to play , but were on minutes restrictions and only saw 12 and 13 minutes respectively . Rodney_Stuckey led the team in scoring , putting up 22 points on 8 - of - 13 shooting .
In a matchup with major implications for the Eastern_Conference playoffs , the surging Atlanta Hawks ( 44 - 30 ) took down the host Detroit Pistons ( 39 - 35 ) 112 - 95 . The absolutely unheard of ball security allowed Atlanta to control the game despite a 53 - 39 rebounding deficit . All-Star Andre_Drummond had a big 19 points and 17 rebounds on Saturday , but could n't do enough get the job done against the red - hot Hawks . The Pistons shot just 39 percent from the field , struggling to find their shot all night .
The San_Antonio Spurs ( 49 - 26 ) defeated the Orlando Magic ( 22 - 53 ) 103 - 91 on Wednesday . Tony_Parker led the San_Antonio starters with 22 minutes ; he had 7 points and 4 assists . Tim_Duncan played just 12 minutes and scored 6 points to go with 3 rebounds and 1 block . Aron_Baynes led the Spurs with 18 points in 24 minutes off the bench . Marco_Belinelli put in 12 points in a team - high 30 minutes . Nikola_Vucevic had 5 assists from the center position as well as 3 blocked shots . Victor_Oladipo put in a game - high 24 points to go along with 7 assists and 6 rebounds . Elfrid_Payton continued his stellar rookie season with 7 , assists , 7 rebounds , 4 steals and 1 block . His shot has been much improved over the past few months , he showed that against San_Antonio going 7 - for - 15 from the field .
The Dallas Mavericks ( 30 - 27 ) decimated the Philadelphia 76ers ( 8 - 47 ) 129 - 103 on Sunday . The stat sheet belied the severity of the beating that Dallas handed out , as Philadelphia actually shot a solid 48 percent from the field overall and outperformed the Mavs from three_point range , 43 percent to 38 percent . However , after Philadelphia surprised the Mavs out of the gate with a 30 - point first quarter , the home team took a lead they would never relinquish on the strength of winning the second quarter by a margin of 38 - 24 . Dallas countered Jahlil_Okafor 's career - high 31 points by having 4 members of the first unit tally double_digit scoring , and the remaining starter , Zaza_Pachulia , haul in double_digit boards . Jahlil_Okafor supplemented his scoring with 8 rebounds , 1 assist , 1 steal and 1 block . Robert_Covington was the only other member of the starting 5 to manage double_digit points , amassing 14 points , 5 boards and 1 steal . Isaiah_Canaan actually provided the second - best point tally on the night for Philadelphia while pacing the reserves , as he recorded 15 points , 1 rebound and 1 assist . Starters Ish_Smith and Nerlens_Noel particularly underwhelmed , with the former managing only three_points , 3 assists and 1 rebound , and the latter supplying 4 points , 5 boards , 2 assists , 1 steal and 1 block . Dallas ' cavalcade of productive offensive outings was led by a resurgent performance from the oft - maligned Wesley_Matthews , who contributed 21 points , 3 rebounds and 2 assists . Dirk_Nowitzki reached the 290 - point milestone for his career , and totaled 18 points , 7 rebounds , 2 assists and 1 steal . Chandler_Parsons added 4 rebounds , 2 assists , 1 steal and 1 block , while Deron_Williams dished out 8 dimes and brought in 3 rebounds . Zaza_Pachulia registered a modest 9 points , but added 10 boards , 1 assist and 1 steal . JJ_Barea paced the reserves with 12 points , 5 assists , 2 rebounds and 1 steal , while Raymond_Felton pitched in 10 points , 4 boards , 1 assist , 3 steals . In all , the Mavs ' second unit totaled a robust 51 points in the blowout .
The Boston Celtics defeated the host Indiana Pacers 105 - 99 at Bankers_Life_Fieldhouse on Saturday . Boston also held Indiana to 42 percent from the field and 22 percent from long distance . Isaiah_Thomas led the team in scoring , totaling 23 points and 5 assists on 4 - of - 13 shooting . He got most of those points by going 14 - of - 15 from the free_throw line . Kelly_Olynyk got a rare start and finished second on the team with his 16 points , 6 rebounds and 4 assists . Avery_Bradley also tallied 13 points , 8 rebounds and 5 assists , while Amir_Johnson finished with 14 points and 9 boards . Jeff_Teague led the team with 20 points and 4 assists , but shot just 4 - of - 13 from the field . Myles_Turner was a defensive stud , totaling 17 points , 8 rebounds , 4 steals and 3 blocks in the defeat . Monta_Ellis was back in the starting lineup , finishing with 15 points , 4 rebounds and 4 assists .

The Celtics were the superior shooters in this game , going 47 percent from the field and 42 percent from the three_point line , while the Jazz went 43 percent from the floor and 38 percent from beyond the arc . Enes_Kanter on the other hand scored 20 points ( 10 - 16 FG , 0 - 1 3PT ) , to go along with 6 rebounds before fouling out . Trey_Burke continued to come off the bench , and played really well offensively , finishing with 18 points ( 7 - 20 FG , 4 - 12 3PT ) in 32 minutes .
The Indiana Pacers ( 16 - 30 ) defeated the Orlando Magic ( 15 - 32 ) 106 - 99 on Sunday at the Amway_Center in Orlando . The Pacers were the superior shooters in this game , going 52 percent from the field and 40 percent from the three_point line , while the Magic went 49 percent from the floor and just 35 percent from beyond the arc . Hill had 17 points ( 7 - 15 FG , 1 - 6 3PT , 2 - 3 FT ) and 6 rebounds , while Damjan_Rudez had 18 points ( 7 - 10 FG , 4 - 7 3PT ) and 3 rebounds . The 18 points were a career - high for Damjan_Rudez . Nikola_Vucevic led all scorers , finishing with 27 points ( 11 - 17 FG , 5 - 5 FT ) and 7 rebounds . Victor_Oladipo on the other hand recorded 18 points ( 8 - 17 FG , 1 - 4 3PT , 1 - 1 FT ) of his own , to go along with 3 assists . He was about right on par with his season averages of 16 points and 3 assists per game . Tobias_Harris continued to come off the bench , but still played 30 minutes , finishing with 11 points and 7 rebounds . The only other Magic player to reach double_figures in points was Elfrid_Payton , who contributed 10 points and 8 assists .

The Clippers entered halftime with just a 2 - point lead , but their defense clamped down in the third quarter , as Dallas scored just 12 points and the lead swelled to 17 . The Mavericks made a spirited run with a 32 - point fourth quarter , but the cushion the Clippers built up proved to be too much , as the Mavericks couldn’t pull it any closer than 6 points in the final frame . Jamal_Crawford 's 22 points in 26 minutes off the bench led all scorers , as he shot 7 - 13 and a lights out 4 - 6 on three_point attempts . JJ_Redick hit all 4 of his three_point attempts and scored 20 points , part of the Clippers ' hot shooting night , as the club finished 49 percent from the field and 9 - 18 ( 50 percent ) from beyond the arc . Raymond_Felton 's 21 points ( 7 - 14 FG , 1 - 5 3PT , 6 - 7 FT ) off the bench led the Mavericks , who struggled mightily to find their shots . Deron_Williams led Mavericks starters with 15 points ( 6 - 11 FG ) , and Dirk_Nowitzki managed just 14 points ( 4 - 9 FG , 1 - 4 3PT , 5 - 5 FT ) . Dallas shot just 41 percent from the floor and 8 - 30 ( 27 percent ) from three_point land as even hack_a_DeAndre couldn’t get them back into this one .

The Los_Angeles Lakers ( 11 - 23 ) defeated the Indiana Pacers ( 13 - 22 ) 88 - 87 on Sunday at the Staples_Center in Los_Angeles . After ending the third quarter down 69 - 63 , the Lakers went on a 25 - 18 run in the fourth quarter to complete a comeback victory in front of their home crowd . Despite being out_rebounded 50 - 37 by the Pacers , the Lakers were able to force them into 16 turnovers , which may have been the difference in this one . Nick_Young did n't have his best shooting night of the year , but finished with 22 points ( 4 - 12 FG , 2 - 5 3PT ) and 3 rebounds off the bench . He was able to go a perfect 12 - of - 12 from the free_throw line , as he continually forced his way to the line . Kobe_Bryant on the other hand went 7 - for - 14 from the field and 2 - for - 3 from the three_point line to score 20 points , while also adding 6 rebounds , 6 assists and 3 steals . Carlos_Boozer was also productive off the bench , scoring 12 points ( 5 - 9 FG , 2 - 2 FT ) and grabbing 4 rebounds . Alongside Gordon_Hayward , each of the other 4 Utah starters managed to score in double_figures , and the starting unit accounted for 82 of the team 's 100 points . For Cleveland , a stingy Jazz defense led to an uncharacteristically poor shooting night , as they finished shooting just 37 percent from the field and 29 percent from behind the arc . The Memphis Grizzlies defeated the Cleveland Cavaliers , 93 - 85 , Wednesday at FedExForum . The Grizzlies ( 18 - 9 ) were back to full strength Wednesday after the return of Marc_Gasol ( rest ) , but the Cavaliers ( 18 - 6 ) were not , as head coach Tyronn Lue elected to rest his big 3 of Kevin_Love , LeBron_James and Kyrie_Irving . The Grizzlies seized control of the game from the very start and never let up , led by their big man in the middle Marc_Gasol , who posted a double_double of 17 points and 11 rebounds . However , the biggest performance of the night came unexpectedly off the bench from Troy_Daniels , who scored an efficient 20 points in just 22 minutes . As a team , Memphis shot just 43 percent from the field but were on fire from long range , hitting 12 of their 23 shots from behind the arc . Their 2 top scorers both came off the bench Wednesday , with veteran sharpshooter LeBron_James_Jones scoring a team - high 15 points and rookie Kay_Felder adding a career - high 14 points . Overall , though , it was a miserable shooting night for Cleveland , as they shot just 37 percent from the field overall and 65 percent from the free_throw line . On top of that , they managed just 10 assists to their 11 turnovers .

Sean_Kilpatrick was signed to a 10 - day contract Thursday and logged 10 minutes in this game as Kevin_Garnett , Justin_Hamilton , Gary_Neal , Ricky_Rubio , and Nikola_Pekovic were not in uniform . Chase_Budinger played 43 minutes off the bench and amassed 10 points , 6 rebounds , and 4 steals . Zach_LaVine got the start at point guard and finished with 20 points , 7 rebounds , and 4 assists over 37 minutes . Alexey_Shved and Langston_Galloway led the way with 20 and 21 points respectively .
The Golden_State Warriors ( 140 ) defeated the Chicago Bulls ( 8 - 4 ) at Oracle_Arena on Friday . Jimmy_Butler led the way and scored 28 points , to go along with 9 rebounds and 7 assists on 52 percent shooting . Kirk_Hinrich tallied 17 points , shot 3 - of - 4 from the three_point line and started in place of the injured Derrick_Rose ( ankle ) . Pau_Gasol ( 14 points , 10 rebounds and 5 assists ) and Nikola_Mirotic ( 18 points , 10 rebounds and 5 assists ) , both finished with double_doubles to round out the all around effort from the Bulls . Chicago forced 15 turnovers , most of which in the first half , and continuously disrupted the flow of the Warriors offense . However , they were not able to contribute enough points off the turnovers , and shot 40 percent from the field as a unit . Stephen_Curry provided 27 points , 17 of which came in the second half , to go along with 5 rebounds , 4 assists and 4 steals on 9 - of - 20 shooting . Harrison_Barnes was once again hitting clutch shots down the stretch and tallied 20 points and 9 rebounds on 7 - for - 13 shooting in 32 minutes . Klay_Thompson shot an efficient 50 percent from the field , scoring 15 points , and Andre_Iguodala added 12 points off the bench in 29 minutes played . Draymond_Green continues to flourish in the Warriors offense and finished with 9 points , 9 rebounds and 5 assists .
Julius_Randle recorded his second career triple_double , scoring 17 points , hauling in 14 rebounds , and dishing out 10 assists . The forward was able to score his points on an efficient 5 - of - 8 shooting , while seeing the free_throw line 10 times . D'Angelo_Russell , meanwhile , hit 7 three_pointers en route to a season - high 32 points . Brooklyn veteran Brook_Lopez had a big night of his own , scoring 30 points and pulling down 10 rebounds for a double_double . Brook_Lopez 's newly - added three_point shot was a focal point for the Nets , as the big man attempted 11 three_pointers on the night , making 4 . Guard Bojan_Bogdanovic delivered a big night of his own , scoring 29 points on the second half of a back - to - back .
The New_York Knicks ( 15 - 62 ) defeated the Philadelphia 76ers ( 18 - 60 ) 101 - 91 on Sunday at Madison_Square_Garden in New_York . They were the superior shooters in this one , going 52 percent from the field , while the Sixers ended at just 38 percent . While they committed 18 turnovers to just 10 from the Sixers , the Knicks made up for it in the rebounding department , holding a 48 - 36 advantage by game 's end . Andrea_Bargnani was the biggest reason for the Knicks ' success , as he finished with a game - high of 25 points , shooting 8 - for - 15 from the floor and 2 - for - 3 from the three_point line . He also chipped in with 8 rebounds , 4 assists and 4 blocked shots , doing a little bit of everything in the win . He finished with 15 points ( 4 - 8 FG , 7 - 8 FT ) , 11 rebounds and 7 assists , while playing 41 minutes . Lance_Thomas recorded 14 points ( 6 - 8 FG , 0 - 1 3PT , 2 - 2 FT ) and 9 rebounds , while Hardaway Jr added 12 points ( 5 - 11 FG , 0 - 5 3PT , 2 - 2 FT ) and 4 assists . The Sixers received most their most production from Ish_Smith , who finished with 17 points ( 8 - 18 FG , 1 - 4 3PT , 0 - 1 FT ) and 7 assists . Hollis_Thompson came off the bench for 17 points ( 6 - 11 FG , 5 - 6 3PT ) of his own over 26 minutes

It was his 13 - of - 13 night from the free_throw line that got him up to that total , as he went 0 - of - 5 from long distance .

The Toronto Raptors ( 31 - 15 ) defeated the Sacramento Kings ( 16 - 28 ) 119 - 102 on Wednesday at the Air_Canada_Centre in Toronto . While the game went into halftime tied 54 - 54 , the Raptors came out firing in the third quarter , out_scoring the Kings 39 - 22 and allowing themselves to coast to a 17 - point victory at home in front of their crowd . The Raptors were the superior shooters in this game , going 51 percent from the field and 50 percent from the three_point line , while the Kings went 48 percent from the field and 41 percent from beyond the arc . Greivis_Vasquez shot well , going 7 - for - 9 from the field and 4 - for - 5 from the three_point line to score 18 points , while also recording 4 rebounds and 6 assists . Coming just short of a double_double , Jonas_Valanciunas recorded 15 points ( 6 - 10 FG , 3 - 3 FT ) and 9 rebounds . He 's now averaging 13 points and 9 rebounds on the season . The Kings were led by Rudy_Gay , who recorded 22 points ( 8 - 17 FG , 2 - 5 3PT , 4 - 5 FT ) and 3 assists . Having 1 of his least productive games in awhile , DeMarcus_Cousins finished with only 13 points ( 5 - 10 FG , 3 - 4 FT ) , 4 rebounds and 2 blocked shots .

The Houston Rockets ( 39 - 18 ) defeated the Los_Angeles Clippers ( 37 - 21 ) 110 - 105 on Wednesday at the Toyota_Center in Houston . Coming out of the third quarter , the Rockets trailed 85 - 84 , but they had a great effort both offensively and defensively in the fourth , out_scoring the Clippers 26 - 20 to finish the game . The Rockets were able to force the Clippers into 15 turnovers , while committing only 10 of their own , which may have made the difference in this one . While he did n't have the monster line we 've come accustomed to , James_Harden still finished with 21 points ( 4 - 13 FG , 3 - 9 3PT , 10 - 12 FT ) and 10 assists as the leader of this team . It marked his second double_double in a row , combining for 52 points , 15 rebounds and 20 assists over those 2 games . Donatas_Motiejunas had hit just 3 three_pointers over his last 8 games , so it was good to see him finally start hitting some shots . He 's now posted 20 points or more in 3 out of his last 5 games , as he 's starting to heat up . Despite the loss , the Clippers saw 3 players break the 20 - point mark . Coming off the bench , Jamaal Jamal_Crawford led the charge , going 10 - for - 17 from the field and 3 - for - 7 from the three_point line to score 24 points in 33 minutes . In 37 minutes , he finished with 22 points ( 9 - 12 FG , 4 - 8 FT ) , 19 rebounds and 2 blocked shots , as the Rockets ' frontcourt just could n't matchup with him . Over his last 6 games he 's averaged 19 points and 19 rebounds , posing as 1 of the most consistent players for the Clippers recently . Chris_Paul was the final player reaching the 20 - point mark , as he finished with 22 points ( 8 - 18 FG , 2 - 4 3PT , 4 - 4 FT ) and 14 assists

Carmelo_Anthony and Kristaps_Porzingis tied the team - lead with 18 points , as Carmelo_Anthony added 11 rebounds , while Kristaps_Porzingis provided 4 rebounds and 3 blocks . Derrick_Rose finished with 13 points , 2 rebounds and 4 assists before departing in the third quarter with a leg injury . Brandon_Jennings stepped in for him off the bench to drop 15 points and add 3 rebounds and 3 assists to his tally . Courtney_Lee played 35 minutes and contributed 16 points , 3 rebounds and 4 assists .
The visiting Cleveland Cavaliers demolished the New_York Knicks at Madison_Square_Garden on Wednesday , 126 - 94 . The `` big 3 '' of LeBron_James , Kevin_Love , and Kyrie_Irving combined for 74 points and 15 assists , helping to lead the team to the blowout victory . Big man Tristan_Thompson , meanwhile , posted a goose egg in the scoring column but delivered a whopping 20 rebounds , including 6 offensive boards . Despite the absence of sharpshooting guard JR_Smith ( knee ) , the Cavs hit 22 three_pointers while rolling to the easy win . The Knicks saw below - average production almost across the board , as star Carmelo_Anthony scored just 8 points and rising star Kristaps_Porzingis shot just 5 - of - 15 . While Cleveland shot almost 49 percent , the Knicks barely cracked 40 from the field
The Dallas Mavericks ( 36 - 38 ) defeated the Denver Nuggets ( 31 - 44 ) 97 - 88 on Monday . It was the turnover differential , as the Nuggets committed 21 turnovers , with the Mavericks committing just 3 . Those 3 turnovers actually set a franchise record for the Mavericks , as their franchise - low was 4 before this game . Denver dominated the shooting and rebounding though , as they shot 44 percent to Dallas ' 41 percent and outrebounded them 44 to 34 . JJ_Barea was huge off the bench , as he tallied 18 points and 11 assists in the win . Dwight_Powell got a rare start and led the starters with 16 points , while also snatching down 7 boards . Emmanuel_Mudiay was 1 of the only bright spots , as he totaled 16 points , 6 rebounds and 7 assists . Will_Barton was solid off the bench , as he amassed a game - high 23 points and 8 rebounds . Kenneth_Faried made a return from a 6 - game absence to contribute 9 points and 11 rebounds .
Point guard Reggie_Jackson shot 10 - of - 20 and scored a team - high 26 points , while All-Star big man Andre_Drummond pulled down a whopping 17 rebounds . Forward Marcus_Morris stuffed the stat sheet with 14 points , 10 rebounds , and 7 assists on the night . The Pistons finished shooting almost 50 percent and held a massive 60 - 32 rebounding advantage over the Hawks . It was just a 39 percent shooting night for the Hawks in what was a dismal performance . All-Star big man Paul_Millsap scored 21 points to go with 8 rebounds and 4 assists . The Hawks finished with only 6 three_pointers on the night .
The Orlando Magic ( 25 - 53 ) defeated the Chicago Bulls ( 46 - 32 ) 105 - 103 on Wednesday at the Amway_Center in Orlando . Victor_Oladipo then came up clutch for the Magic , driving for a layup with just a second left in the game , therefore giving them a 2 point lead and eventually the victory . The Magic were superior shooters in this one , going 46 percent from the field , while the Bulls finished at 43 percent . Along with making the game - winning layup , Victor_Oladipo had 23 points ( 8 - 14 FG , 3 - 7 3PT , 4 - 6 FT ) , 5 assists and 3 steals over 41 minutes . Nikola_Vucevic played a big factor in the win as well , posting 22 points ( 9 - 16 FG , 4 - 4 FT ) and 7 rebounds . The third starter in double_figures was Elfrid_Payton , who nearly recorded a triple_double with 17 points ( 6 - 14 FG , 2 - 2 3PT , 3 - 3 FT ) , 9 rebounds and 9 assists . He 's been doing a little bit of everything for this team , averaging 13 points , 5 rebounds , 9 assists and 2 steals in his last 4 games . Jimmy_Butler did his best to keep the Bulls in this game , going 6 - for - 10 from the field and 3 - for - 4 from the three_point line to score a team - high of 19 points , while also adding 6 assists and 2 steals . He 's now pushed his season averages to 20 points , 5 rebounds and 3 assists per game . Pau_Gasol did n't have the best day shooting the ball , but got to the free_throw line a bunch to record 15 points ( 4 - 10 FG , 7 - 9 FT ) , 9 rebounds and 3 blocked shots . Taj_Gibson recorded an efficient 15 points ( 6 - 12 FG , 3 - 5 FT ) and 7 rebounds , while Nikola_Mirotic added 15 points ( 3 - 11 FG , 3 - 5 3PT , 6 - 7 FT ) of his own over 27 minutes .
The Detroit Pistons defeated the Dallas Mavericks , 98 - 91 , at Palace of Auburn Hills on Wednesday . Detroit actually took a game - high 27 - point lead headed into the half , but Dallas got it all the way down to a 7 - point deficit , which happened to be the final margin . It was a wire - to - wire win for the Pistons , as they led by at least 7 points for the final 44 minutes . Defense was key , as they held Dallas to 38 percent from the field and 27 percent from three_point range . Dirk_Nowitzki had a renaissance game though , as he led the team with 24 points and 10 rebounds . Harrison_Barnes finished second on the team with 16 points and 5 rebounds . Seth_Curry totaled 13 points , 2 rebounds , 3 assists and 2 steals , while Deron_Williams collected 12 points , and 6 assists . Reggie_Jackson put an end to his slump , as he led the team with 22 points , 4 assists and 2 steals . Jon_Leuer was second on the team , accruing 20 points and 8 rebounds . Kentavious_Caldwell-Pope amassed 16 points and 5 rebounds . Ish_Smith and Tobias_Harris combined for 23 points , 7 rebounds and 3 assists , with the rest of the bench scoring just 2 points in total .
In 5 of the 6 games that the Lakers have lost during their rough streak , Lou_Williams has scored at least 24 points , adding another 24 - point game against the Knicks . As for the Knicks , Kristaps_Porzingis played both ends of the floor effectively , racking up 26 points , to go along with 13 rebounds , 2 assists and 7 blocks on 8 - of - 15 shooting . While Carmelo_Anthony only managed 13 points on 16 shots , Derrick_Rose ( back ) bailed him out with 1 of his best performances in a Knicks uniform , scoring 25 points on 12 - of - 16 shooting .
The Jazz had no issues winning on Wednesday , as the team enjoyed a 33 - point blowout of the New_Orleans Pelicans . Utah saw strong play from its deep bench , as veteran sixth man Joe_Johnson led the team with 27 points , including 6 three_pointers . Center Rudy_Gobert led the team in rebounding with 16 , while All-Star forward Gordon_Hayward added 17 points to the winning effort . As a team , Utah shot over 55 percent and hit 14 three_pointers and held a 48 - 37 advantage in the rebounding column . Anthony_Davis blocked 5 shots but was just 4 - of - 12 for 12 points on a night when the Pelicans desperately needed offensive production
The Phoenix Suns ( 21 - 16 ) defeated the Milwaukee Bucks ( 18 - 18 ) 102 - 96 Tuesday at the BMO_Harris_Bradley_Center . Phoenix got a big game from Markieff_Morris , who posted a double_double with 26 points and 10 rebounds . Isaiah_Thomas made a big contribution , coming off the bench with 19 points in 31 minutes on the floor .
Defense was key , as Boston was held to 38 percent shooting . Isaiah_Thomas carried Boston , as he accrued 35 points and 5 assists . Jae_Crowder recorded a double_double , totaling 16 points and 10 rebounds . Eric_Bledsoe led the way for Phoenix , as he accumulated 28 points , 6 rebounds and 9 assists . Tyler_Ulis was huge off the bench , as he hit the game_winner , while providing 20 points and 5 assists . Alan_Williams also came off the bench to collect 11 points and 15 rebounds .
The Indiana Pacers defeated the Oklahoma_City Thunder , 115 - 111 , in overtime at Chesapeake_Energy_Arena on Sunday . Russell_Westbrook did everything he could to keep the Thunder ( 8 - 6 ) alive while hosting the Pacers ( 7 - 7 ) . Glenn_Robinson_III was the difference maker in overtime after bringing in an important defensive rebound and turning it into a strong dunk on the other end to take a 5 point lead with 1:28 remaining in the extra period . Russell_Westbrook finished with 31 points , 15 assists and 11 rebounds on 13 - of - 34 shooting in 40 minutes of action , while Victor_Oladipo was the only other starter to finish in doubles figures scoring with 14 points . Enes_Kanter drained a clutch three_pointer to close out the third quarter on his way to 16 points , 3 assists and 4 rebounds across 25 minutes off the bench . Jeff_Teague had his hands full with Russell_Westbrook on the defensive end of the floor , but made up that difference with an explosive offensive contest , as he scored 30 points , to go along with 9 assists and 5 rebounds on 9 - of - 16 shooting . The frontcourt was also impressive for Indiana throughout the game , evidence by the combination of Thaddeus_Young and Myles_Turner , who teamed up for 35 points , 20 rebounds , 2 blocks and 2 steals .
The Milwaukee Bucks defeated the Brooklyn Nets , 112 - 103 , at BMO_Harris_Bradley_Center on Saturday . The surging Bucks ( 10 - 8 ) utilized a balanced effort from their first unit to outlast a game Nets squad that received a game - high 24 points from Bojan_Bogdanovic . All 5 members of Milwaukee 's starting 5 scored in double_digit , led by a season - high 20 points from John_Henson . The Bucks shot 47 percent from the field overall while limiting the Nets ( 5 - 14 ) to a stingy 37 percent success rate . Sean_Kilpatrick checked in second behind Bojan_Bogdanovic with 19 points , 3 assists and 1 rebound , despite shooting just 3 - of - 13 from the field . Brook_Lopez had a down game by his standards , posting 13 points , 6 assists , 4 rebounds , 3 blocks and 1 steal . Anthony_Bennett got the start at power forward for Trevor_Booker and supplied a modest 7 points but did haul in 14 rebounds . Joe_Harris led the second unit with 17 points , 5 rebounds , 2 assists and 1 steal . Matthew_Dellavedova contributed a season - best 18 points , which he supplemented with 6 assists and 2 rebounds . Giannis_Antetokounmpo registered a 16 - point , 10 - rebound double_double that also featured 6 assists , 5 blocks and 2 steals . Jabari_Parker filled out the stat sheet with 15 points , 8 boards , 2 assists and 2 steals . Tony_Snell rounded out the starters ' strong night with 10 points , 3 rebounds , 1 assist and 1 block . Greg_Monroe paced the bench with 13 points , 7 boards , 1 assist , 4 steals and 1 block .
JJ_Barea has been equally as good , as he has at least 18 points and 5 assists across his last 3 games . Seth_Curry 's 23 points were a season - high , as he got plenty of run with Deron_Williams out of the lineup . Jordan_Clarkson scored his 22 points on just 12 shots , as he went 9 - of - 12 from the field .

The New_Orleans Pelicans ( 30 - 27 ) defeated the Brooklyn Nets ( 23 - 32 ) 102 - 96 on Wednesday at the Smoothie_King_Center in New_Orleans . Despite finishing with just a 6 - point victory , the Pelicans were much better with their shooting percentages . They went 51 percent from the field and 44 percent from the three_point line , while the Nets went 42 percent from the floor and 33 percent from deep . What really kept the Nets in this game was their ability to force the Pelicans into turnovers , as the Pelicans had 20 turnovers compared to just 12 from the Nets . Tyreke_Evans also had a strong showing , posting 15 points ( 5 - 13 FG , 1 - 4 3PT , 4 - 6 FT ) , 11 assists and 2 blocked shots . It was his third double_double over his last 4 games , a stretch where he 's averaged 14 points and 11 assists . Notching a double_double of his own , Omer_Asik recorded 12 points ( 5 - 6 FG , 2 - 2 FT ) and 13 rebounds . Both Norris_Cole and Alexis_Ajinca reached double_figures in points off the bench , with 11 and 10 points respectively . The Nets saw their most production from Joe_Johnson , who went 9 - for - 17 from the field and 3 - for - 5 from the three_point line to score 21 points , while adding 10 rebounds as well . He 's played well of late , averaging 19 points and 9 rebounds over his last 3 games . A big reason for the Nets keeping this game close was their bench though , who combined to score 49 of the teams 96 points . Thaddeus_Young was 1 of those players , as he went off for 19 points ( 8 - 12 FG , 1 - 1 3PT , 2 - 4 FT ) and 5 rebounds . Over his last 2 outings with the Nets , he 's combined for 34 points and 10 rebounds , as he looks to be getting more and more comfortable with his new team . Brook_Lopez had 15 points ( 7 - 14 FG , 1 - 1 FT ) , 7 rebounds and 4 blocked shots , while Jarrett_Jack posted 15 points ( 5 - 12 FG , 1 - 3 3PT , 4 - 4 FT ) and 3 assists .
The Boston Celtics ( 31 - 22 ) earned a home win Sunday over the Sacramento Kings ( 21 - 30 ) at TD_Garden , 128 - 119 . Boston scored 46 points in a frantic first quarter and was brilliant offensively all day , as they shot a sharp 56 percent from the field and 54 percent from 3 . Boston 's starting backcourt powered the Celtics offense , as Avery_Bradley led the team with 25 points ( 9 - 16 FG , 6 - 7 3PT ) and Isaiah_Thomas ( 8 - 18 FG ) added 22 . Jared_Sullinger ( 10 - 13 FG , 21 points ) and Tyler_Zeller ( 6 - 8 FG , 17 points ) gave Boston an efficient inside attack as well . DeMarcus_Cousins led the Kings with a game - high 31 points and added 7 rebounds and 6 assists . Rajon_Rondo scored 14 points and dished 15 assists and Willie_Cauley-Stein scored 15 behind sharp 7 - 9 shooting from the field .
The Cleveland Cavaliers ( 26 - 9 ) defeated the Philadelphia 76ers ( 4 - 36 ) 95 - 85 on Sunday . Philadelphia 's collective defensive effort may have been the most surprising aspect of the game overall , as they managed to hold a hot Cleveland offense to a mediocre 39 percent shooting performance from the field , and 28 percent from beyond the arc . Cleveland was able to pull out the hard - fought victory on the back of LeBron_James , who turned in a 37 - point , 7 - rebound , 9 - assist effort that also included 2 steals . However , Kevin_Love was outstanding on the glass against a vulnerable Philadelphia frontcourt , hauling in 15 rebounds and adding 6 assists and 2 steals . JR_Smith added 14 points , 3 rebounds and 1 steal , and drained another 4 three_pointers in the process . Tristan_Thompson had his own double_double in another start at center , collecting 10 points and grabbing 10 boards . Kyrie_Irving had a second consecutive quiet game , notching 8 points , 5 rebounds , 2 assists , 2 steals and 1 block over 31 minutes . Although his contributions in non - scoring categories were certainly solid , Kyrie_Irving notably struggled from the field , draining only 3 of 15 shot attempts . Philadelphia 's valiant effort was spearheaded by Jahlil_Okafor 's 21 points , which he supplemented with 7 rebounds . Ish_Smith put together a second straight strong performance after a string of relatively quiet games , tallying a double_double with 18 points and 10 assists . He also added 7 boards and 1 steal . Jerami_Grant and Nik_Stauskas could only put together a pair of 6 - point outings , while Hollis_Thompson paced the Philadephia bench with 8 points and 3 rebounds .
The Los_Angeles Clippers ( 18 - 13 ) defeated the Utah Jazz ( 12 - 16 ) 109 - 104 on Saturday . Los_Angeles was without Blake_Griffin ( quad ) , who is amongst the league 's best with 23 points per game and 9 rebounds per game , but that did not stop Chris_Paul and DeAndre_Jordan from running the pick and roll at an efficient rate . Paul_Pierce was equally impressive , finishing with 20 points on 5 - of - 7 behind the arc . Pure point guard Chris_Paul added 19 points and 11 assists , while DeAndre_Jordan completed another double_double , with 14 points and 13 rebounds . The first half defensive inefficiencies need to be addressed by the Clippers , but the team shot 50 percent from deep as a unit , which made up for the slow , turnover ridden start . Gordon_Hayward led all scorers with 28 points , to go along with 6 rebounds and 5 assists on 7 - of - 13 shooting . Alec_Burks finished with 11 points on a perfect 5 - of - 5 shooting in 18 minutes , while Michigan product Trey_Burke , added 5 points in the same amount of time .

The Cavaliers came out in a fury , as they outscored the Warriors 31 - 11 in the first quarter . The difference in the game was the shooting , as Golden_State were held to 40 percent shooting from the field , while the Cavaliers shot 52 percent on their end . The rebounding was a benefactor for the Cavs as well , with Cleveland recording 45 rebounds to Golden_State 's 35 . The Cavaliers recorded 12 steals and 7 blocks as well in 1 of their best team defensive performances of the season . The Chicago Bulls ( 34 - 20 ) handled the Cleveland Cavaliers ( 33 - 22 ) , 113 - 98 , on Thursday . Derrick_Rose led the way with 30 points , marking just the fourth time this season he 's surpassed that threshold . Meanwhile , Tony_Snell garnered his third starting nod in 6 contests due to the absences of Jimmy_Butler ( shoulder ) and Kirk_Hinrich ( toe ) , and the second - year pro responded with 22 points and a game - high 4 three_pointers in 38 minutes . Thursday 's defeat doubles as Cleveland 's second in 4 outings , but LeBron_James did everything in his power to keep the deficit somewhat close , accruing 31 points , 5 rebounds , and 4 assists . The Cavaliers ' foibles on offense were compounded by miserable success from three_point range , just 8 - for - 31 , or 26 percent , and subsequently , just 3 of LeBron_James ' teammates scored in double_figures , including Kyrie_Irving ( 17 ) , Timofey_Mozgov ( 13 ) , and Tristan_Thompson ( 10 ) .

The host Memphis Grizzlies shut down the powerhouse San_Antonio Spurs , 89 - 74 , at Fed_Ex_Forum_Arena on Monday . Defense was the key for the Grizzlies ( 32 - 22 ) , who held the Spurs to just 37 percent shooting and a season - low scoring output . Memphis forced an unusual 16 turnovers from the Spurs . In his absence , the team 's high scorer was bench veteran David_Lee , who contributed only 14 points in 17 minutes of play . It was a particularly off night for San_Antonio in terms of ball movement , as the team recorded only 11 assists on the night . The Spurs hit just 4 three_pointers and were unable to match the defensive intensity of their tough opponent .

In fact , the Sixers committed 25 fouls and allowed the Warriors to take 39 free_throw attempts , while converting on 33 of them . The Warriors ( 50 - 9 ) were the first team to clinch a playoff berth last week and this win guaranteed another 50 - win season . Ultimately , it was James_Harden 's remarkable effort , as well as the Rockets ' 52 and 46 percent tallies from the field and three_point range , respectively , that spearheaded the high - scoring victory . He managed 17 points , 8 rebounds , 3 assists and 2 steal . Dwyane_Wade was right behind him with a 16 - point , 4 - rebound , 4 - assist effort that also included 1 steal and 1 block . The Houston Rockets ( 31 - 14 ) defeated the Los_Angeles Lakers ( 12 - 33 ) 99 - 87 on Sunday at the Staples_Center in Los_Angeles . The Rockets came out hot right from the beginning Sunday , out_scoring the Lakers 52 - 36 in the first half alone . With such a huge lead at half , they were able to coast to any easy victory , securing the 12 - point victory in convincing fashion . While the teams shot similar percentages from the field , the Rockets had a huge advantage from beyond the arc , going 30 percent from deep , while the Lakers shot a meager 8 percent from the three_point line . James_Harden continued with his MVP-like numbers , finishing with 37 points ( 12 - 20 FG , 4 - 11 3PT , 9 - 10 FT ) , 8 rebounds and 5 assists in 32 minutes . With Dwight_Howard sitting out with an ankle injury , Joey_Dorsey got the start at center , but really struggled to get anything going , finishing with only 4 points ( 1 - 3 FG , 2 - 2 FT ) and 7 rebounds in 25 minutes . He recorded 11 points ( 5 - 10 FG , 1 - 2 3PT ) and 4 rebounds in 25 minutes . He 's averaging 12 points and 7 rebounds on the season . Starting at shooting guard with Kobe_Bryant done for the season , Wayne_Ellington had 13 points ( 6 - 12 FG , 1 - 3 3PT ) and 5 rebounds . Jordan_Hill added 10 points ( 5 - 9 FG ) and 7 rebounds

The Celtics were out of it early , as they scored just 7 points in the first quarter , the fewest in an opening quarter in the playoffs since the NBA adopted the shot clock in 1954 . The Golden_State Warriors defeated the visiting Oklahoma_City Thunder , 120 - 111 , in Game 5 of the Western_Conference finals at Oracle_Arena on Thursday . Kevin_Durant and Russell_Westbrook did not make it an easy 9 point win for the defending champions , as both players combined for 71 points and simply would not quit down double_figures late in the fourth quarter . The Thunder went into the half down 8 points , but Kevin_Durant went to another level by attacking the rim possession after possession and willed his way to the free_throw line . Kevin_Durant finished a perfect 13 - of - 13 from the charity stripe . Three of those free_throws came late in the fourth quarter , as the Thunder were on the brink of trimming a 10 point Warriors lead to 5 points . Russell_Westbrook finished with 31 points , 7 rebounds , 7 rebounds , 5 steals and 7 turnovers , while Kevin_Durant topped off the scoring column with 40 points . Serge_Ibaka has resurged himself in this series , and added 13 points and 8 boards . Golden_State was led by Stephen_Curry and Klay_Thompson , as the backcourt combined for 58 points , 11 rebounds , 8 assists and 5 steals ( 5 of which were Curry 's ) , on 17 - of - 41 shooting . Draymond_Green stuffed the stat sheet to the tune of 11 points , 13 rebounds , 4 assists and 4 blocks on 4 - of - 10 shooting , and added his best defense of the series when the Warriors needed it most .
The Oklahoma_City Thunder defeated the visiting Memphis Grizzlies 114 - 102 , at Chesapeake_Energy_Arena on Friday evening . The Grizzlies led by 4 after 3 quarters , but then Russell_Westbrook went absolutely ballistic in the fourth quarter , scoring 19 points in the quarter , including 15 points straight and unanswered , to take his team from down 102 - 99 to the final score of 114 - 102 . The Thunder ( 29 - 22 ) only scored 21 points in the first quarter , before outscoring the Grizz by 12 in the second , to take an 8 - point lead into half time . They were then outscored by 12 in the third , and entered the fourth down by 4 . The Thunder outscored the Grizz by 14 in the fourth , behind Russell_Westbrook and his takeover . Russell_Westbrook finished with 38 points , 13 rebounds , 12 assists and 3 steals to lead his squad to a big win . Russell_Westbrook also matched a career - best as he went 17 - of - 17 from the foul line . Three other players scored in double_digit for the Thunder , including Steven_Adams and Joffrey_Lauvergne , who pitched in 16 points each . Chandler_Parsons added 12 points on 3 - of - 6 shooting , in 25 minutes .

In a game of runs , the game came down to who could make their free_throws in the closing moments , with the Clippers ( 18 - 7 ) converting on just enough of their free_throw attempts to hold off the Trail_Blazers ( 12 - 14 ) , who refused to go away , in the end . Jeff_Green moved into the starting lineup , replacing Courtney_Lee , but Jeff_Green struggled , posting just 6 points and 2 rebounds in 26 minutes . Toronto scored 24 points off of 14 turnovers , but it was n't enough to overcome their deficiencies on offense . The shorthanded Memphis Grizzlies ( 38 - 25 ) shocked the Cleveland Cavaliers ( 44 - 18 ) in a 106 - 103 win on Monday . The backups somehow pulled out a miraculous win , thanks to forcing the Cavaliers to commit 25 turnovers , while committing just 16 of their own . Memphis started off hot , as they scored 33 points in the first quarter to take an 8 - point lead . Tony_Allen was especially good , as he tallied 26 points , 4 assists and 5 steals in the win for the third - highest point total of his career . JaMychal_Green totaled 16 points , 10 rebounds , 6 assists and 4 steals of his own . LeBron_James was 1 of the few motivated players , as he tallied 28 points , 9 rebounds and 5 assists in the loss . Kyrie_Irving also played well , as he amassed 28 points , 5 assists and 4 steals .

The Cleveland Cavaliers defeated the Boston Celtics 128 - 122 on Thursday at Quicken_Loans_Arena . The score indicates a closer game than it actually was , as after the Cavaliers ( 50 ) took a 17 - point lead headed into the final period , the Celtics ( 3 - 2 ) came roaring back to at least make the game interesting , but 6 points was as close as they were going to get . After being rather passive scoring - wise through the first 4 games of the regular season , LeBron_James exploded going for a game - high 30 points on top of 12 assists and 7 rebounds in 36 minutes . The other 2 members of Cleveland 's big 3 also put together big nights , with Kevin_Love recording 26 points and 8 rebounds , as he continues his hot start to the season , and Kyrie_Irving scoring 23 points of his own . As a team , the Cavaliers managed to do plenty of damage from behind the arc — where they shot 41 percent from — and the free_throw line — where they shot an incredible 37 shots from , making 32 of them . Isaiah_Thomas recorded a game - high 30 points while scoring nearly half of his points from the free_throw line , as he shot 14 - of - 14 from the charity stripe . Avery_Bradley was n't too far behind , recording a double_double of 26 points and 10 rebounds over 39 minutes . It was rookie Jaylen_Brown , however , who had the game 's breakout performance , scoring a career - high 19 points and grabbing 5 rebounds after getting the start in place of the injured Crowder .
The Denver Nuggets ( 8 - 13 ) won their second straight close game , defeating the Philadelphia 76ers ( 1 - 20 ) 108 - 105 on Saturday . Down 59 - 52 at the half , the Nuggets flipped the switch in the fourth quarter , outscoring the Sixers 30 - 19 in the final period to secure their second consecutive victory . Danilo_Gallinari , as he has often done this season , spearheaded the Nuggets ' offensive attack with a 24 - point , 7 - rebound performance , his second consecutive game over the 20 - point mark . Will_Barton contributed 16 points , and added 9 rebounds , 1 assist and 1 steal over 33 minutes to come in second behind Danilo_Gallinari in team scoring . For the starters , Randy_Foye turned in another solid start in place of Gary_Harris , notching 11 points , 5 rebounds , 1 assist and 1 steal . Rookie Emmanuel_Mudiay only shot 33 percent but managed to pitch in 10 points , 6 assists , 5 rebounds and 1 steal . He did commit 7 turnovers , underscoring an area of his game he must continue to focus on . Kenneth_Faried came off the bench for 22 minutes and was 1 rebound shy of a double_double , pouring in 12 points and hauling in 9 boards . Jameer_Nelson was the third Denver player to manage double_digit points in a reserve role , posting 10 points , 3 assists and 2 rebounds . All 5 starters notably turned in double_digit scoring performances , led by Robert_Covington 's 18 - point , 10 - rebound double_double . The starting backcourt duo of Isaiah_Canaan and TJ_McConnell were also solid contributors , tallying 15 and 10 points , respectively . TJ_McConnell in particular stuffed the stat sheet by adding 8 rebounds , 6 assists and 3 steals . Nerlens_Noel ( 14 points , 5 rebounds , 2 blocks ) and Jerami_Grant ( 10 points , 2 assists , 1 rebound , 4 steals and 2 blocks ) pitched in all over the court as well . JaKarr_Sampson ( 13 points ) and Richaun_Holmes ( 10 points ) also got in on the act from the bench , making it 1 of the best team efforts for Philadelphia in what has been a miserable campaign to date .

The Hornets ( 13 - 9 ) have often counted on their standout guard combo of Kemba_Walker and Nicolas_Batum this season to serve as the foundation of their offense , and their contributions came in particularly handy Wednesday against the Pistons ( 12 - 12 ) . Despite the trio of remarkable performances , it was largely a defensive - minded contest , with both teams shooting under 40 percent from the field , and with the Pistons posting a particularly unsightly 15 percent success rate from behind the arc . The Utah Jazz ( 26 - 36 ) defeated the Brooklyn Nets ( 25 - 36 ) 95 - 88 on Sunday at the Barclays_Center in Brooklyn . Despite the loss , the Nets actually were the superior shooters in this one , going 50 percent from the field and 53 percent from the three_point line , while the Jazz finished at 47 percent from the floor and 46 percent from deep . It was his second impressive performance in a row , as he 's combined for 49 points , 14 rebounds , 5 assists and 3 steals over his last 2 . He 's now averaging 20 points and 5 rebounds on the year . Derrick_Favors , on the other hand , posted 22 points ( 8 - 16 FG , 6 - 8 FT ) , 8 rebounds and 4 assists in 38 minutes . He 's also played very well of late , averaging 19 points and 8 rebounds over his last 4 games . Rookie Dante_Exum had 1 of the better games of his career , notching double_figures in points for just the seventh time this season and first since the end of January . He went 5 - for - 6 from the field and a perfect 4 - for - 4 from the three_point line to score 14 points , while adding 4 assists as well . The only other Jazz player to reach double_digit points was Trey_Burke , who came off the bench for 12 points ( 5 - 11 FG , 2 - 5 3PT ) and 4 assists in 20 minutes . In 36 minutes , Brook_Lopez scored 19 points ( 8 - 17 FG , 0 - 1 3PT , 3 - 5 FT ) , to go along with 10 rebounds and 2 blocked shots . He 's now averaging 16 points and 7 rebounds on the season . He matched a team - high with 19 points ( 8 - 17 FG , 0 - 1 3PT ) , while also adding 3 rebounds and 4 steals in 32 minutes . Coming off the bench , Bojan_Bogdanovic added 11 points ( 4 - 7 FG , 3 - 4 3PT ) in 21 minutes . Both Joe_Johnson and Deron_Williams struggled in this one , scoring 9 and 6 points respectively .

The Toronto Raptors ( 36 - 17 ) defeated the Washington Wizards ( 33 - 21 ) 95 - 93 on Wednesday at the Air_Canada_Centre in Toronto . The Wizards got the ball back after the block , and John_Wall had 1 more shot to win the game , but he missed a three_pointer at the buzzer , giving the Raptors the close 2 - point victory in front of their home crowd . While the Wizards ( 46 percent ) shot better than the Raptors from the field ( 41 percent ) , the Raptors took the advantage from the three_point line , going 42 percent from deep , while the Wizards went just 24 percent . Along with the go - ahead bucket that helped give the Raptors a victory , DeMar_DeRozan also posted 23 points ( 6 - 18 FG , 1 - 2 3PT , 10 - 10 FT ) , 3 rebounds and 3 steals in the victory . He 's on an impressive stretch of 3 games where he 's averaging 22 points , 5 rebounds and 3 steals per game . The Raptors also received a huge contribution off the bench , as Louis Lou_Williams went 8 - for - 16 from the field and 4 - for - 8 from the three_point line to score 27 points in 34 minutes . Along with the block of John_Wall in the final seconds , Kyle_Lowry also added 13 points ( 5 - 12 FG , 3 - 7 3PT ) , 4 rebounds and 6 assists . Greivis_Vasquez recorded 11 points ( 4 - 7 FG , 3 - 5 3PT ) in just 19 minutes as well . He finished with 21 points ( 7 - 15 FG , 1 - 6 3PT , 6 - 8 FT ) , 4 rebounds and 8 assists . Paul_Pierce also played a factor , going 7 - for - 12 from the field and 2 - for - 4 from the three_point line to score 17 points . Nene had a solid showing , posting 14 points ( 7 - 8 FG , 0 - 2 FT ) , 4 rebounds and 4 steals . It was his second straight night with 14 points , while the 4 steals matched a season - high . The high scorer off the bench was Drew_Gooden , who notched a double_double with 10 points ( 5 - 12 FG , 0 - 1 3PT ) and 12 rebounds .
The Toronto Raptors defeated the Miami Heat , 99 - 91 , on Wednesday night at the Air_Canada_Centre to take a 3 - 2 lead in the Eastern_Conference semifinals . The Raptors built a 28 - 18 cushion after 1 quarter that the Heat spent the majority of game trying to chip away at , but ultimately , Toronto kept pulling away just enough to ultimately secure the victory . Luol_Deng had to exit the game after 24 minutes due to a left wrist injury , completing the decimation of a Heat frontcourt that previously lost Chris_Bosh ( clots ) and Hassan_Whiteside ( knee ) . Meanwhile , DeMarre_Carroll mirrored Luol_Deng 's misfortune , leaving with his own left wrist contusion after 26 minutes . However , the standout 2 - guard finished the game and did n't allow the ailment to slow him , as he scored a team - leading 34 points and added 4 rebounds , 2 assists and 2 steals . Miami was led by Dwyane_Wade , who scored 20 points , along with 7 rebounds , 4 assists and 1 block . Joe_Johnson pitched in 11 points , 8 rebounds and 1 assist . Josh_Richardson paced the reserves with 13 points , 3 rebounds , 1 assist , 1 steal and 1 block over 22 minutes . Josh_McRoberts and Udonis_Haslem , who both stand to see an uptick in playing time if Luol_Deng is forced to miss a do - or - die Game 6 , tallied 6 points and 3 boards apiece off the bench . He finished with 25 points , 10 rebounds , 6 assists , 3 steals and 1 block . Bismack_Biyombo acquitted himself well in his second start in Jonas_Valanciunas ' ( ankle ) stead , tallying 10 points , 6 rebounds , 2 steals and 4 blocks . Corey Cory_Joseph paced the second unit with 9 points , 5 assists , 1 rebound and 2 steals .

Carmelo_Anthony had his best game of the season statistically speaking , as he tallied 28 points and 12 rebounds in the loss . Jose_Calderon also had his best game in years , as he totaled 25 points , 4 assists and 3 rebounds in the defeat . Victor_Oladipo scored a team - high 24 points off the bench and did that damage in just 26 minutes of action
The Clippers ( 12 - 5 ) extended their winning streak to 5 games Monday night , knocking off the Timberwolves 127 - 101 at the Staples_Center . The Wolves were led Monday by second - year swingman Shabazz_Muhammad , who scored 18 points to go with 10 rebounds and 4 assists in 27 minutes off the bench . Minnesota shot just 43 percent as a team and was out_rebounded 50 - 32 . The Clippers were led by 23 points and 8 rebounds from Blake_Griffin , who converted 8 - of - 14 field goal attempts . JJ_Redick added 23 points of his own , and DeAndre_Jordan had an 11 - point , 13 rebound double_double . Spencer_Hawes provided a solid 20 minutes off the bench , knocking down 4 threes en route to 14 points , 4 rebounds and 2 assists .
The Los_Angeles Clippers ( 21 - 13 ) held on for a road victory Thursday over the New_Orleans Pelicans ( 10 - 22 ) at the Smoothie_King_Center , 95 - 89 . JJ_Redick 's hot shooting night , including 9 - 15 from the field and 4 - 7 from three_point land , gave him 26 points to lead all scorers . Chris_Paul still scored 9 points , grabbed 5 rebounds and dished out 12 assists despite his awful shooting night . DeAndre_Jordan was a monster on the glass , as he grabbed 20 rebounds — including 8 on the offensive end — and scored 11 points as he owned the paint in Blake_Griffin 's absence . The Pelicans had 6 players finish in double_figures , but Ryan_Anderson was the only 1 to find his groove , as he led the club with 17 points on an efficient 7 - 11 shooting . Anthony_Davis and Tyreke Evens scored 14 points each and Norris_Cole scored 15 , but none managed to shoot 50 percent from the floor . The Pelicans shot 44 percent as a team and needed to be more accurate to overcome their rebounding disadvantage .
The Orlando Magic ( 26 - 32 ) took care of the Philadelphia 76ers ( 8 - 51 ) in a 130 - 116 win on Sunday . They really took control in the first half , as the Magic led 77 - 51 at the half . The shooting was stellar for Orlando , as they shot 57 percent from the field , 88 percent from the free_throw line and 63 percent from three_point range . Jahlil_Okafor had yet another good game though , as he scored 26 points in the loss . Ish_Smith also had a nice game , as he tallied 17 points , 5 rebounds and 7 assists . Victor_Oladipo and Nikola_Vucevic tied for the team - lead with 28 points in the win . Aaron_Gordon continued his good play , as he amassed 22 points , 7 rebounds and 3 assists in the victory . Elfrid_Payton got out of his recent slump , as he scored 11 points and dished out 10 assists in the win .
The Cleveland Cavaliers defeated the visiting New_York Knicks , 117 - 88 , at Quicken_Loans_Arena on Tuesday . The new - look Knicks ( 0 - 1 ) , who added Joakim_Noah , Derrick_Rose and Courtney_Lee in a makeover of their starting 5 this offseason , had their moments at various points until the middle of the third quarter , at which point LeBron_James , Kyrie_Irving and rest of the defending NBA champions started to exert their dominance . New_York managed just 37 percent shooting from the field , was out_rebounded on the defensive glass by a 40 - 29 margin , was outscored 52 - 28 in the paint , and allowed 21 points to the Cavs off 18 turnovers , all pivotal factors in a 29 - point defeat . New_York was led by Carmelo_Anthony , who played only 30 minutes in the blowout but managed 19 points , 5 rebounds , 3 assists and 1 steal . Derrick_Rose put together a 17 - point effort in his Knicks debut after missing most of the preseason , but could only supplement the scoring with 3 rebounds , 1 assist and 1 block . Kristaps_Porzingis was solid with 16 points , 7 rebounds , 1 steal and a pair of rejections , with more than half his scoring coming on 3 made three_pointers on 5 attempts . However , Joakim_Noah and Courtney_Lee were shut out on the scoreboard altogether , with the former making up somewhat for his lack of points with 6 boards , 3 assists and 1 steal in a modest 20 minutes . Kyrie_Irving , often matched up against a rusty Derrick_Rose , paced the Cavs with 29 points , 4 assists , 2 rebounds and 2 steals . LeBron_James posted a triple_double , totaling 19 points , 14 assists , 11 rebounds and 1 block in just 32 minutes . Kevin_Love contributed a double_double with 23 points , 12 boards , 2 assists and a trio of steals . The recently re - signed JR_Smith supplied 8 points on 3 - for - 13 shooting against his former Knicks teammates .
CJ_McCollum led the way for Portland in the overtime victory with 35 points , 3 assists , 2 rebounds and 3 steals . Damian_Lillard provided 28 points , 2 of which on free_throws came with a second left in overtime to seal the win . Meyers_Leonard led the second unit with 17 points , while Evan_Turner went for 12 . Mason_Plumlee generated 10 - point , 11 - rebound double_double and Al-Farouq_Aminu tallied 11 points off the bench . Isaiah_Thomas scored a game - high 41 points , which he supplemented with 6 assists and 3 rebounds . Al_Horford and Marcus_Smart posted matching 17 - point efforts , while Jae_Crowder managed 16 . Kelly_Olynyk was productive as a reserve with 10 points .
Brooklyn shot a respectable 46 percent from the field and committed a relatively modest 12 turnovers , but Mike_Conley took the reins of the Grizzlies offense with a 32 - point , 6 - assist , 1 - rebound , 1 - steal performance over 37 minutes . Five players hit double_digit in the scoring column for the visitors , and they shot 51 percent from the field overall . Marc_Gasol had a near triple_double of 19 points , 9 rebounds and 8 assists . Brandan_Wright posted a season - high 17 points to lead the bench . Vince_Carter supplied 14 points , while JaMychal_Green totaled 10 . Brook_Lopez and Spencer_Dinwiddie led Brooklyn with matching 17 - point efforts . Sean_Kilpatrick led the bench with 15 points , while Rondae_Hollis-Jefferson collected 13 points . Trevor_Booker matched Rondae_Hollis-Jefferson 's scoring total , and Bojan_Bogdanovic submitted 11 points , 5 rebounds and 2 assists .
The Portland Trail_Blazers ( 8 - 12 ) took the lead with a 41 - point third quarter Thursday night against the Indiana Pacers ( 12 - 6 ) and held on for the 123 - 111 victory at the Moda_Center . Damian_Lillard 's 26 points led Portland , and his 9 assists were a game high . Backcourt mate CJ_McCollum added 21 points , 5 rebounds and 5 assists . Pacers guard CJ_Miles caught fire from 3 as well , as he poured in 27 points to lead Indiana , fueled by 8 three_pointers . Paul_George_Hill scored 18 points and Ian_Mahinmi notched a double_double with 10 points and 11 rebounds , but Pacers superstar Paul_George was quiet , scoring 11 on a poor 4 - 17 shooting night . Despite shooting 43 percent from 3 , the Pacers shot just 43 percent from the floor overall .
The Memphis Grizzlies ( 5 - 6 ) defeated the Minnesota Timberwolves ( 5 - 6 ) 114 - 106 on Sunday . Zach_LaVine tallied an incredible 25 points in just 17 minutes of court time , shooting 8 - for - 15 from the field , including 4 - for - 7 from three_point range . Andrew_Wiggins amassed 21 points , while Karl-Anthony_Towns ( 14 points , 9 boards ) came within 1 rebound short of a double_double for the second straight game . The Timberwolves also enjoyed an extremely balanced effort from their bench , with 4 players ( Shabazz_Muhammad , Andre_Miller , Nemanja_Bjelica , and Gorgui_Dieng ) all pitching with 8 - point efforts . Mike_Conley tallied his first 20 - point effort since Nov 7 , and chipped in 7 assists and 2 steals . Frontcourt mates Marc_Gasol and Zach_Randolph had strong games of their own , with Marc_Gasol holding his own against the rookie sensation Karl-Anthony_Towns to the tune of 16 points , 7 rebounds , 4 assists , and 2 blocks . Even new acquisition Mario_Chalmers got into the act , pitching in 16 points off the bench over 18 minutes for his best game yet in a Grizzlies uniform . JaMychal_Green also represented the Memphis reserves well , with a 12 - point outing .
The Oklahoma_City Thunder ( 44 - 37 ) defeated the Portland Trail_Blazers ( 51 - 30 ) 101 - 90 on Monday at Chesapeake_Energy_Arena in Oklahoma_City . Despite finishing with worse shooting percentages than the Trail_Blazers , the Thunder came out with a huge advantage on the boards , out - rebounding them 58 - 35 . Russell_Westbrook went 13 - for - 27 from the field and 2 - for - 5 from the three_point line to score a game - high of 36 points , to go along with 11 rebounds and 7 assists . He 's been absolutely phenomenal throughout the whole second half of this season and he continues to put all the pressure on his own shoulders here in the final stretch , as he 's averaging a ridiculous 39 points , 7 rebounds and 7 assists over his last 3 games . Enes_Kanter , on the other hand , finished with 27 points ( 13 - 20 FG , 1 - 2 FT ) and 13 rebounds over 36 minutes . Enes_Kanter has scored over 20 points in 5 of his last 7 games , a 7 - game stretch where he 's averaging 21 points . Dion waiters ( 4 - 21 FG , 0 - 5 3PT , 5 - 5 FT ) and Anthony_Morrow ( 4 - 10 FG , 2 - 7 3PT , 1 - 2 FT ) were the only other 2 players in double_figures with 13 and 11 points respectively . Meyers_Leonard posted a season - high of 24 points ( 9 - 17 FG , 5 - 9 3PT , 1 - 1 FT ) , while also adding 4 rebounds and 1 blocked shot over 32 minutes . Damian_Lillard did n't have his best showing of the season , posting just 10 points ( 3 - 9 FG , 1 - 4 3PT , 3 - 4 FT ) and 6 assists in the loss . Joel_Freeland added 16 points ( 8 - 13 FG ) and 5 rebounds off the bench , while Chris_Kaman chipped in with 14 points ( 7 - 9 FG ) and 4 rebounds .
The key to victory for Houston was the rebounding , as they won that differential , 52 - 38 . LeBron_James carried the Cavs , as he tallied 30 points , 7 rebounds and 5 assists . Kyrie_Irving accumulated 28 points , 3 rebounds , 8 assists and 2 blocks . Richard_Jefferson was the only other Cleveland player in double_figures , as he dropped 16 points on 6 - of - 6 shooting . Ryan_Anderson finished second on the team , totaling 16 points and 6 rebounds . Eric_Gordon led the bench with 13 points , 3 rebounds and 3 assists .

The Denver Nuggets defeated the host Orlando Magic , 121 - 113 , at Amway_Center on Saturday . While the defense struggled all night , Denver held Orlando to just 18 points in the fourth quarter , while scoring 29 points on their end . The Nuggets offense was on point , as they shot 57 percent from the field and recorded 25 assists in the victory . Denver ( 9 - 15 ) rode 1 of their best offensive performances here to an impressive road win . Danilo_Gallinari led the team in scoring , tallying 21 points , 6 rebounds and 3 assists . Jusuf_Nurkic scored 17 points and grabbed 8 boards on 8 - of - 11 shooting in just 21 minutes of action . Kenneth_Faried was huge off the bench , dropping 19 points and 10 rebounds on 9 - of - 10 from the field . Evan_Fournier did all he could against his former team , as he led the Magic with 24 points , 4 rebounds and 6 assists . Serge_Ibaka was n't far behind , accumulating 22 points , 4 rebounds and 4 blocks in the defeat . Jeff_Green was questionable coming in to this game with an ankle injury , but provided 17 points off the bench .
Defense was key for Orlando , as they held Dallas to 34 percent shooting from the field and dominated the rebounding , 50 - 34 . Dallas ( 2 - 10 ) is in a historically bad stretch offensively right now and a 34 percent night just adds to those struggles . Newly-acquired , Jonathan_Gibson , was the Mavericks best player , as he tallied 26 points , 6 rebounds and 3 assists off the bench . Harrison_Barnes went just 3 - of - 13 from the field , en route to an 11 - point night . DJ_Augustin led the team in scoring , totaling 18 points and 6 assists off the bench . Serge_Ibaka was second in scoring , tallying 15 points , 9 rebounds and 3 blocks in the win . Nikola_Vucevic amassed 12 points and 12 rebounds , despite going 5 - of - 16 from the field . Bismack_Biyombo recorded a double_double off the bench , accruing 13 points , 10 rebounds and 3 blocks in the win .
Kevin_Durant 's 29 - point first half is easily his best performance of the season , but it 's even better when you consider he single - handedly outscored the Thunder in the second quarter . While Draymond_Green and Zaza_Pachulia failed to reach double_figures in scoring , their combined 20 rebounds , 2 steals and 7 blocks played a huge factor on the other end of the floor . Despite leading the team with 21 points , Victor_Oladipo provided just 3 rebounds , no assists and no steals or blocks in the blowout loss
Heading into the fourth quarter with an 87 - 73 deficit , the Bucks outscored their hosts by a 32 - 17 margin in the final 12 minutes , capping off the comeback with a 15 - foot bucket from Giannis_Antetokounmpo as time expired . The aptly - named Greek Freak led the Bucks with 27 points , 13 rebounds , 4 assists , 1 steal and 3 blocks . Greg_Monroe posted a near double_double off the bench with 18 points and 9 boards . Jabari_Parker contributed 15 points , Malcolm_Brogdon went for 12 , and Mirza_Teletovic was productive in a reserve role as well , generating 13 points . Joakim_Noah mustered a modest 8 points but hauled in 16 boards . Mindaugas_Kuzminskas paced the second unit with 15 points .

Isaiah_Thomas also managed to get to the line with some frequency , going 10 - for - 10 from the charity stripe . The only other Celtic with more than 3 free_throw attempts was Evan_Turner , who was 3 - of - 4 . There were some positives on the defensive end for Boston , however , as it forced 18 turnovers and held Cleveland to 24 percent from beyond the arc . Cleveland 's stars were the story once again as LeBron_James and Kyrie_Irving combined for 56 of the Cavaliers ' 99 points . Tristan_Thompson finished with 11 rebounds , with 6 of those boards coming on the offensive end . Timofey_Mozgov was also effective before fouling out with 16 points , 7 rebounds , and 5 blocks .

The Magic ( 18 - 13 ) pulled away in the second half to defeat the Pelicans ( 10 - 21 ) 104 - 89 at Amway_Center on Monday . Orlando has found success the past month largely due to the effort of Nikola_Vucevic , who posted a season - high 28 points on 14 - of - 21 shooting from the field while adding 8 rebounds and 7 assists over 37 minutes . Evan_Fournier has hit at least 3 three_pointers in his past 4 games and is shooting 46 percent from downtown in his past 5 .

The impressive performance from Denver 's power forward also fell just 1 assist shy of a big triple_double , as he finished with 14 rebounds and 9 assists on 13 - of - 17 shooting . Jamal_Murray saw 14 minutes of action after dealing with soreness , but only contributed three_points on 4 shots . Deron_Williams led the team with 23 points , to go along with rebound and 8 assists . Harrison_Barnes also contributed an efficient effort with 19 points on 9 - of - 15 shooting . Impressively , both teams shot above 50 percent as a unit , but the strong 52 percent effort from the Mavericks was overshadowed by the even more powerful 56 percent effort from the Nuggets .
Golden_State saw an unusual off night from beyond the arc , hitting only 9 threes on 28 percent shooting . Reigning MVP and scoring champ Stephen_Curry had more rebounds than points , ending with a line of 8 points , 8 assists , and 10 rebounds . Stephen_Curry shot just 3 - of - 14 on the night . Fellow All-Star Draymond_Green had a strangely similar line , shooting 2 - of - 12 for 5 points to go along with 7 assists and 11 rebounds . Former MVP Kevin_Durant added 17 points , a team - high 14 rebounds , and yet another 8 assists . Golden_State finished with a ridiculous 41 assists on 45 shots , just the sixth game ever in which a team assisted on over 90 percent of its shots . Point guard Brandon_Jennings had 10 points to go along with 6 rebounds and 6 assists , while bench guard Justin_Holiday led the team with 15 points and 6 steals

The Houston Rockets ( 27 - 25 ) narrowly defeated the struggling Suns ( 14 - 37 ) in Phoenix on Thursday , 111 - 105 . Corey_Brewer unexpectedly provided a team - high 24 points for Houston , helping lead the balanced offensive effort the Rockets took in Phoenix . Superstar James_Harden scored 17 points , below his average , but also pulled down 9 rebounds and dished out 6 assists . Big man Dwight_Howard , meanwhile , was not particularly present in the scoring column ( 5 points ) , but made his presence felt on the boards , tallying 16 rebounds on the night . Overall , Houston had a strong offensive showing , racking up points and hitting 15 three_pointers on the night . Despite holding major advantages at the line and on the boards , the Suns struggled offensively , recording 24 turnovers and shooting just 39 percent from the field . Even in the loss , however , rookie standout Devin_Booker made himself known with 17 points and 4 assists .
The Detroit Pistons ( 36 - 34 ) defeated the visiting Brooklyn Nets ( 19 - 50 ) 115 - 103 , at The_Palace_of_Auburn_Hills , Saturday . The Nets put up a good fight but the Pistons were more determined down the stretch as they scored 38 points in the final quarter to seal the deal and improve their home record to an impressive 21 - 12 . Seven players scored in double_digit for Detroit , as the bench chipped in 52 points to help get over the hump on the second night of a back - to - back . Aron_Baynes finished with a team - high 21 points ( 8 - 13 FG , 5 - 5 FT ) , along with 7 rebounds , 1 assist and 1 blocked shot , in only 19 minutes off the bench . Kentavious_Caldwell-Pope tied a career - high with 8 assists , to go along with 11 points and 4 rebounds , in 39 minutes , while Stanley_Johnson finished with 10 points , 7 rebounds , 6 assists and 4 steals , in 31 minutes off the bench . The Pistons totaled 30 assists on 46 made field goals , while giving up only 8 turnovers . Despite shooting 53 percent from the field , the Nets could not find the momentum to get passed the Pistons . Thaddeus_Young led the way for Brooklyn , with 24 points ( 12 - 17 FG , 0 - 1 3PT , 0 - 2 FT ) , 9 rebounds , 2 assists , 2 blocked shots and 1 steal , in 26 minutes . Five other players scored in double_digit for Brooklyn , including Bojan_Bogdanovic , who finished with 19 points , along with 5 rebounds and 2 assists , in 33 minutes . Sean_Kilpatrick chipped in 15 points and 2 rebounds , in 21 minutes off the bench .
The Dallas Mavericks ( 34 - 33 ) defeated the Charlotte Hornets ( 37 - 29 ) 107 - 96 on Monday . The Mavericks played stingy defense against a Charlotte team that had been essentially hitting on all cylinders , holding them to a 42 percent success rate from the field , and a 30 percent figure from three_point range . They also elicited 15 turnovers on the night from the home squad , and hung on for the win despite a furious Hornets comeback in the third quarter . Chandler_Parsons led the way for Dallas with 24 points , 9 rebounds , 4 assists , 3 steals and 1 block . Dirk_Nowitzki was right behind him with a 23 - point , 11 - rebound double_double against the Hornets ' vulernable frontcourt . He also added 1 assist and 2 blocks . Deron_Williams pitched in 15 points , 5 assists , 1 steal and 1 block . Devin_Harris and David_Lee paced the bench with a pair of 12 - point efforts . As customary , Kemba_Walker spearheaded the Hornets ' attack , tallying 25 points , 9 assists , 4 rebounds , 2 steals and 1 block . He did , however , commit 5 turnovers , the sole blemish on an otherwise typically remarkable performance . Nicolas_Batum followed with 20 points , 7 assists , 3 rebounds , 2 steals and 2 blocks , although he also was guilty of 4 miscues . Marvin_Williams continued his stretch of productive play at power forward , contributing 19 points , 7 rebounds and 1 block . Courtney_Lee registered 12 points , 3 rebounds and 2 steals .
The Dallas Mavericks defeated the Los_Angeles Lakers , 122 - 111 , at American_Airlines_Center on Tuesday . That feat came in a relatively easy win too , as it was a wire - to - wire victory for Dallas , with them leading by double_digit for the final 35 minutes . The Mavericks actually took a 29 - point lead into the fourth quarter , but the Los_Angeles starters used that garbage time to cut it to a respectable scoreline . Dallas was lights out from the field , as they shot 52 percent from the field and 55 percent from three_point range . The Lakers ( 19 - 45 ) have been 1 of the worst teams in the league over recent months and this loss was much worse than it looks in the box score . Julius_Randle was a bright spot , as he accumulated 13 points , 18 rebounds and 10 assists en route to a triple_double . D'Angelo_Russell led the starters with 22 points , 4 assists and 4 steals . Jordan_Clarkson led the bench , as he provided 22 points and 2 assists . The Mavericks ( 27 - 36 ) now find themselves within 2 games of the 8 - seed in the West and wins like this show just how hard they 're fighting for that spot . Dirk_Nowitzki not only reached the 300 - point threshold , he scored a game - high 25 points to go along with 11 rebounds . Seth_Curry finished second on the team , collecting 18 points , 2 rebounds and 5 assists . Yogi_Ferrell finished with 16 points and 7 assists , while Harrison_Barnes accrued 14 points and 6 rebounds . Nerlens_Noel came off the bench to amass 11 points , 13 rebounds and 3 blocks .
The Grizzlies ended up taking the win 102 - 93 . The Rockets continued their early_season struggles and fell to 5 - 10 , while the Grizzlies improved to 9 - 7 . Courtney_Lee added a spark off the bench scoring 17 points on 8 - 14 shooting from the field . The only player to touch the court and not score was veteran Vince_Carter , who did help out with 6 rebounds , 2 assists , and 3 steals . He did finish the night with an impressive 40 points ( 12 - 19 FG , 5 - 9 3PT , 11 - 11 FT ) , 4 rebounds , 5 assists , 3 steals , and 0 block in 41 minutes . Jason_Terry and Dwight_Howard also chipped in with double_figures , scoring 13 and 12 points respectively .
The San_Antonio Spurs defeated the Brooklyn Nets , 130 - 101 , at AT_&_T_Center on Saturday . Their futility away from Barclays_Center unsurprisingly continued against the stingy Spurs ( 19 - 5 ) , who elicited 16 turnovers from the visitors and held them to 41 percent and 26 percent success rates from the field and three_point range , respectively . Pau_Gasol was second on the Spurs with 15 points , 5 rebounds , 4 assists and 1 block .
