Patty_Mills paced the second unit with 16 points over 16 minutes , while Jonathon_Simmons was right behind him with 14 points .
The Cleveland Cavaliers defeated the Minnesota Timberwolves 116 - 108 Tuesday at Target_Center . The Timberwolves ( 21 - 35 ) managed to keep pace with the East-leading Cavaliers ( 38 - 16 ) for a majority of Tuesday 's contest , and they were well within striking distance down the final stretch of the game . LeBron_James finished with 25 points on an efficient 10 - of - 14 shooting from the field to go along with 14 assists and 8 rebounds as the Cavaliers walked out of the Target_Center with their second straight victory and their sixth win in their last 7 games . Kyrie_Irving added 25 points of his own , Channing_Frye posted a double_double of 21 points and 10 rebounds as Kevin_Love 's replacement and the newest Cavalier , Derrick_Williams , came off the bench to score 13 points Tuesday . After scoring 20 points in the third quarter , Andrew_Wiggins finished the game with 41 points on 16 - of - 29 shooting from the field . Karl-Anthony_Towns had yet another productive night as well , scoring 26 points and grabbing 8 rebounds , but besides those 2 , Minnesota failed to get much else offensively from their team . Ricky_Rubio did manage to dish out a game - high 16 assists and grab 8 rebounds , but he was n't able to produce enough in the scoring column , ending with just 5 points on 2 - of - 8 shooting from the field .
The Charlotte Hornets defeated the Indiana Pacers , 122 - 100 , at Spectrum_Center on Monday . The Hornets ( 5 - 1 ) improved their sterling start to the season with a blowout win against the strong conference opponent in the Pacers ( 3 - 4 ) . Cody_Zeller and Marvin_Williams had the hot hand in the first quarter , as they both powered their team to an early 18 - point lead with 6:30 remaining in the first quarter . Paul_George and CJ_Miles aided the Pacers in cutting that lead to 9 points by the end of the first quarter , but Charlotte got back into their groove after pulling away by another 18 - point margin halfway through the second quarter . The Charlotte point guard finished with 24 points , 10 assists , 3 rebounds , 2 steals and 1 block in an all around fantastic performance that included 7 - of - 11 shooting from the field . Kemba_Walker buried 5 three_pointers in the win to go along with his game leading stats . Before exiting , Michael_Kidd-Gilchrist was a perfect 4 - of - 4 from the field with 13 points , 1 board and 1 assist , while Marvin_Williams and Cody_Zeller pitched in with a combined 25 points and 9 rebounds . Paul_George finished with 10 points , 6 assists and 7 rebounds , while CJ_Miles had a standout performance off the bench with 23 points in 25 minutes .
The San_Antonio Spurs ( 45 - 26 ) blew out the Oklahoma_City Thunder ( 41 - 31 ) 130 - 91 on Wednesday . Tony_Parker outplayed Russell_Westbrook and led his team to victory with 21 points , 6 assists , 6 rebounds and 3 steals in 28 minutes . The Spurs led by 4 after the first quarter and then increased that lead to 21 points at halftime after a phenomenal 39 - point second quarter . With the game in hand , the Spurs were able to deploy their bench players into the game early , every San_Antonio player played at least 10 minutes . He matched Russell_Westbrook 's 16 points to go along with 10 rebounds in 22 minutes . Mitch_McGary had 8 points , 7 assists , 3 steals and 1 block in 23 minutes .
The Detroit Pistons ( 24 - 43 ) defeated the Memphis Grizzlies ( 47 - 21 ) 105 - 95 on Tuesday at the Palace of Auburn Hills . Coming close to playing themselves completely out of the playoffs after losing 10 games in a row , the Pistons gave themselves some hope Tuesday , as they came out with a 10 - point win over the Grizzlies . A big part of the win should be attributed to the Pistons ' defense , as they forced the Grizzlies into 18 turnovers , while committing just 9 of their own . Reggie_Jackson led the way on the offensive side of the ball though , scoring 23 points ( 10 - 18 FG , 2 - 5 3PT , 1 - 1 FT ) , while also handing out a ridiculous season - high of 20 assists . Andre_Drummond notched a double_double of his own , finishing with 16 points ( 6 - 12 FG , 4 - 6 FT ) , 16 rebounds and 5 blocked shots . He took advantage of the start and recorded 15 points ( 4 - 12 FG , 4 - 9 3PT , 3 - 4 FT ) and 7 rebounds . Kentavious_Caldwell-Pope had a solid shooting effort as well and added 24 points ( 10 - 16 FG , 2 - 7 3PT , 2 - 3 FT ) in 37 minutes . Marc_Gasol posted a double_double with 17 points ( 6 - 11 FG , 1 - 1 3PT , 4 - 4 FT ) , 11 rebounds and 6 assists . Jeff_Green was locked in with his shot , going 7 - for - 12 from the field and 3 - for - 3 from the three_point line to score a team - high of 21 points . He 's now pushed his season averages to 15 points and 4 rebounds on the year . Zach_Randolph finished with 13 points ( 6 - 13 FG , 1 - 1 FT ) and 5 rebounds , while Vince_Carter had 14 points ( 4 - 8 FG , 4 - 6 3PT , 2 - 2 FT ) and 3 rebounds off the bench .
The Los_Angeles Cippers ( 2 - 2 ) defeated the San_Antonio Spurs ( 2 - 2 ) 114 - 105 on Sunday in game 4 of the first round of the Western_Conference playoffs . The Clippers were the superior shooters in this outing , going 54 percent from the field and 28 percent from the three_point line , while the Spurs finished at 44 percent from the field and 24 percent from deep . Blake_Griffin was also dominant in the win , finishing with 20 points ( 9 - 17 FG , 2 - 5 FT ) , 19 rebounds and 7 assists . Austin_Rivers came off the bench for 16 points , as he shot nearly perfect from the field , going 7 - for - 8 from the floor over 17 minutes . Jamal_Crawford also played well off the bench though , scoring 15 points ( 6 - 13 FG , 0 - 3 3PT , 3 - 3 FT ) in 29 minutes . Kawhi_Leonard finished with 26 points ( 10 - 19 FG , 3 - 6 3PT , 3 - 4 FT ) , 7 rebounds and 5 assists , while Tim_Duncan recorded an efficient 22 points ( 8 - 13 FG , 6 - 10 FT ) , 14 rebounds and 3 blocked shots . Tim_Duncan had only 4 points in their game 3 win over the Clippers , so he was able to have much more success this time around despite playing the very tough defensive bigs of the Clippers . Tony_Parker has had to play through an Achilles injury over the past few games , but he was able to fight through the pain in this one and posted 18 points ( 7 - 15 FG , 0 - 3 3PT , 4 - 8 FT ) , to go along with just 1 assist over 29 minutes . With Tony_Parker playing a smaller amount of minutes , Patty_Mills saw some increased playing time off the bench , as he recorded 14 points , while shooting 4 - for - 10 from the field and 2 - for - 5 from the three_point line .
The Houston Rockets ( 30 ) escaped with a 130 - 128 win over the Dallas Mavericks ( 0 - 3 ) . Dwight_Howard played 38 minutes and grabbed 26 rebounds , more than half the team 's 46 boards . He was 1 of 5 players on the Rockets not names Bernard_James_Harden to score at least 12 points , a unit led by Josh_Smith 's 18 points in 27 minutes off the bench . Monta_Ellis recorded playoff career - highs of 34 points and 9 assists in 39 minutes . Raymond_Felton started for the ailing Rondo , but he was held scoreless in 13 minutes with the team deferring to Monta_Ellis as the primary ballhandler . After converting 91 percent of their free_throws in the first 2 contests , the Mavericks sank 27 - of - 35 from the charity stripe .
All-Star forward Kawhi_Leonard led the team with 26 points and had 6 assists . The reigning Defensive_Player_of_the_Year hit 9 - of - 17 from the field and all 7 of his free_throws . Veteran big man Pau_Gasol , meanwhile , had 17 points and a team - high 13 rebounds . Pau_Gasol shot 7 - of - 12 and also dished out 6 assists . Point guard Tony_Parker also scored 16 points . Avery_Bradley scored 25 points , had 10 rebounds , and passed for 6 assists .
The Los_Angeles Clippers defeated the visiting Portland Trail_Blazers , 115 - 95 , in Game 1 of the Western_Conference first - round playoffs Sunday at Staples_Center . Los_Angeles built upon a 5 point first quarter lead incrementally through the remainder of the game . The second half proved to be on the side of interminable length after Terry Stotts elected to foul DeAndre_Jordan , and although the big man finished 8 - of - 18 from the charity stripe , the strategy failed after the Trail_Blazers shooters could not get a clean look at the basket . Chris_Paul finished with 28 points , 6 rebounds and 11 assists on 10 - of - 19 shooting , while Blake_Griffin played the best game since returning from injury and contributed 19 points , 12 rebounds and 6 assists . DeAndre_Jordan had 1 block party while he patrolled the paint and added 18 points , 12 rebounds and 4 blocks . JJ Reddick played more inside the arc , but the strategy paid off , as he shot 8 - of - 12 from the floor on only 3 attempts from the three_point line on his way to 17 points in the contest . The Clippers shot 54 percent from the floor as a unit and outrebounded the Trail_Blazers 48 - 40 in the win . Damian_Lillard finished with 21 points and 8 assists , while CJ_McCollum could only pitch in 9 points on 11 shots . Gerald_Henderson showcased his athleticism , but even the acrobatic forward could found it tough to finish at the rim , as he added 16 points on 7 - of - 12 shooting in just under 30 minutes off the bench .
The San_Antonio Spurs defeated the Toronto Raptors 108 - 106 Tuesday at AirCanada Centre . Even without 3 regular starters , San_Antonio was able to hold off a struggling Raptors ( 28 - 17 ) team , who remains without their All-Star shooting guard DeMar_DeRozan ( ankle ) . In the absence of 3 stars , LaMarcus_Aldridge stepped up with a solid performance , recording a team - high 21 points on 6 - of - 14 shooting from the field to go along with 7 rebounds . Patty_Mills then added 18 points in 30 critical minutes off the bench . Overall , it was n't the prettiest performance from San_Antonio , as they shot just 45 percent from the field and 29 percent from behind the arc , but they still managed to notch their fifth straight victory . Kyle_Lowry finished with a game - high 30 points and 4 rebounds , while Terrance Terrence_Ross and Norman_Powell added 21 and 16 points , respectively

The Portland Trail_Blazers defeated the Los_Angeles Lakers 97 - 81 at Staples_Center on Sunday . Depth made the difference for Portland , as their bench ran 7 players deep , while the Lakers ( 21 - 52 ) totaled 9 players in rotation . Damian_Lillard and CJ_McCollum were not spectacular , but did enough on the offensive end to keep the Trail_Blazers ahead , while the Lakers 39 percent shooting effort was far from enough to match that of Portland . Damian_Lillard finished with 22 points , 5 assists , 7 rebounds and 3 steals and CJ_McCollum added 13 points on 5 - of - 13 shooting . Allen_Crabbe totaled 29 minutes off the bench and pitched in 18 points and 6 boards , while Al-Farouq_Aminu fell 1 points shy of a double_double and went for 9 points and 10 rebounds across 26 minutes of action . D'Angelo_Russell matched Damian_Lillard 's 22 points . Jordan_Clarkson did not find a rhythm at any point and finished with just 10 points on 4 - of - 16 shooting , while Tyler_Ennis led the bench with 14 points , 5 assists and 3 rebounds .

What the Cavaliers did especially well was limit mistakes , as they committed just 8 turnovers and allowed the Pacers to record just 3 combined blocks and steals . The Pacers ( 29 - 27 ) have now lost 5 - straight , as the All-Star break could n't come at a better time . Glenn_Robinson_III led the team in scoring , as he dropped 19 points to go along with 6 rebounds . In fact , they trailed by 20 headed into the half and proceeded to outscore the Bucks , 70 - 46 , over the final 2 quarters . Milwaukee actually led for over 42 minutes of this game , as Atlanta 's only leads were in the first 6 minutes and final 4 minutes . The Hawks offense was extremely efficient , as they shot 48 percent from the field and assisted on 32 of their 40 made baskets . Dennis_Schroder was the catalyst of the comeback , as he dropped a career - high 33 points in the win . Paul_Millsap was also huge , accumulating 23 points , 14 rebounds , 6 assists and 3 blocks . Tim_Hardaway_Jr. got a rare start and accrued 18 points , 4 rebounds and 4 assists in the win . Jabari_Parker continued his great form though , tallying 27 points , 4 rebounds , 4 assists and 3 steals in the defeat

They also held the Suns to a 21 percent tally from long distance and forced 14 turnovers . On Saturday , they got the definition of a `` team win '' , with 8 players scoring in double_figures , and Monta_Ellis leading the charge with 30 points ( 11 - 21 FG , 3 - 7 3PT , 5 - 5 FT ) . While Monta_Ellis played 35 minutes , he was the only starter to see more than 29 minutes , as Dirk_Nowitzki played just 23 and Tyson_Chandler played only 24 . Another name that fans had to be happy to hear was Shabazz_Muhammad , who put up 18 points ( 6 - 7 FG , 1 - 1 3PT , 5 - 5 FT ) to go with 4 rebounds and 2 assists in only 14 minutes .

He also matched a season - high with 3 blocks , as he did a little bit of everything in this game . The Philadelphia 76ers defeated the Brooklyn Nets , 106 - 101 , at Barclays_Center on Tuesday evening . The Sixers ( 28 - 46 ) continue to push for as many victories as possible after such a considerable degree of futility over the last several seasons , and their fighting spirit helped them prevail against an equally feisty Nets ( 16 - 58 ) squad on Tuesday . Philadelphia had forged a razor - thin 58 - 57 lead by halftime but had to fight until the closing seconds to pull out the win . Dario_Saric paced Philadelphia with 23 points , which he supplemented with 7 rebounds , 1 assist and 1 block . Robert_Covington produced a 21 - point , 13 - rebound double_double that also included 1 assist , 2 steals and 2 blocks . Timothe_Luwawu-Cabarrot produced a near double_double with 17 points , 9 boards , 3 assists , 1 steal and 1 block . Richaun_Holmes generated 13 points , 5 boards and 2 assists . TJ_McConnell supplied a full stat line of 8 points , 10 assists , 2 rebounds , 3 steals and 1 block . Nik_Stauskas led the bench with 11 points , 4 rebounds , 2 assists and 1 block . Brook_Lopez led Brooklyn with 26 points , 9 rebounds , 6 assists and 2 blocks . Jeremy_Lin filled out the stat sheet with 11 points , 7 assists , 6 rebounds and 4 steals . Rondae_Hollis-Jefferson matched Jeremy_Lin 's point total and added 7 rebounds , 2 assists , 3 steals and 2 blocks . Caris LaVert turned in 9 points and 4 rebounds , while Spencer_Dinwiddie led the bench with 10 points , 5 assists , 4 rebounds and 1 steal .
The Toronto Raptors defeated the host Washington Wizards 113 - 103 at Verizon_Center on Wednesday . In a game that was never separated by more than 12 points , the Raptors were able to prevail by getting to the basket at will . Both teams shot very efficiently , as they both shot over 56 percent from the field . Turnovers were an issue for Washington as well , as they committed 21 and allowed the Raptors to score 31 points off those turnovers . Kyle_Lowry was the only other starter with more than 10 , as he scored 18 points and recorded 4 steals in the win . John_Wall did everything he could to pull out a win though , as he tallied a season - high 33 points , 11 assists and 5 rebounds in the loss . It was n't all sunshine and roses though , as John_Wall also committed 9 turnovers and missed 2 late crucial free_throws . Bradley_Beal and Marcin_Gortat finished with 15 points a piece as well .
The Cleveland Cavaliers defeated the Toronto Raptors , 121 - 117 , at Quicken_Loans_Arena on Tuesday . As usual , Cleveland ( 9 - 1 ) was led by the Big Three of Kyrie_Irving , LeBron_James and Kevin_Love , who combined for 71 of the Cavs ' 121 points , which included double_doubles from the latter 2 . The Raptors ( 7 - 3 ) were led by Kyle_Lowry , who posted a near double_double with 28 points , 9 assists , 5 rebounds and 4 steals . DeMar_DeRozan followed with 26 points , 6 rebounds , 4 assists and 3 steals , but struggled from the field , going just 10 - of - 27 . Jonas_Valanciunas compiled 14 points , 9 rebounds and a pair of dimes . Norman_Powell drew the start at small forward and contributed 12 points , 3 rebounds , 3 assists and 1 block . Terrence_Ross paced the reserves with an 18 - point effort that he complemented with 3 rebounds and 2 steals . His impressive performance included a 4 - of - 7 tally from three_point range . LeBron_James scored a team - high 28 points and added 15 assists , 9 boards and 1 steal , but committed a game - high 5 turnovers as well . Kyrie_Irving supplied 24 points , 5 rebounds , 4 assists and 2 steals , although he also handed the ball to the opposition on 5 occasions . Kevin_Love registered a 19 - point , 13 - rebound double_double that also included 1 assist and 3 blocks . Tristan_Thompson got in on the act with 15 points , 11 boards and 1 block , while Channing_Frye paced the bench with 21 points in just 20 minutes .
The San_Antonio Spurs ( 46 - 9 ) took care of the Los_Angeles Lakers ( 11 - 45 ) in a 119 - 113 win on Friday . Despite allowing the Lakers to score 113 , the Spurs recorded 30 assists and won every significant statistic in this game , including shooting , rebounding , assisting and turnovers . San_Antonio 's shooting was especially impressive , as they shot 55 percent from the field , 94 percent from the free_throw line and 50 percent from long distance . Tony_Parker had a renaissance game , as he scored 25 points and dished out 6 assists in the win . Tim_Duncan also turned back the clock , as he double_doubled in a 12 - point , 13 - rebound outing . Nine players scored at least 7 points for the Spurs , with the bench accumulating 50 points of their own . Kobe_Bryant showed up big time in this game , as he scored 25 points in the loss . Julius_Randle double_doubled in the loss , as he amassed 11 points and 15 rebounds as well .
The Cleveland Cavaliers ( 31 - 12 ) held on Wednesday night to defeat the Minnesota Timberwolves ( 14 - 32 ) at Quicken_Loans_Arena , 114 - 107 . The Cavaliers took an 8 - point lead into the fourth quarter and led by as many as 15 in the final frame , but a furious comeback effort by the Wolves closed the gap to 94 - 91 with just 6:5 to go . LeBron_James finished with 25 points to lead the Cavaliers on a brutally efficient 11 - 15 shooting night . He completed his offensive dominance with a game - high 9 assists , and he added 4 rebounds , 1 steal and 1 block . Tristan_Thompson was a wrecking ball inside , as he scored 19 points on 8 - 10 shooting and pulled down 12 rebounds ( 7 offensive ) . Matthew Dellevadova scored 18 as he knocked down 4 three_pointers , and he added 7 assists to serve as a spark off the bench . Karl-Anthony_Towns was fantastic in the losing effort , as he scored 26 points on 11 - 16 shooting and grabbed 11 rebounds for his third double_double in the past 4 contests . Andrew_Wiggins added 20 and Zach Lavine came off the bench with an electric 21 points , 6 assists and 4 rebounds
The Golden_State Warriors defeated the host Memphis Grizzlies , 122 - 107 , at Fed_Ex_Forum_Arena on Friday . Defense was key for the Warriors , with Memphis being held to 39 percent shooting and committing 18 turnovers . Golden_State were efficient on their end , as they shot 51 percent from the field and recorded 31 assists to just 12 turnovers . The Warriors ( 45 - 8 ) were clearly not happy with the first 2 losses against the Grizzlies , as they took it to them in this effort - filled performance . Draymond_Green was the player of the game , despite scoring just 4 points , as he provided 11 rebounds , 10 assists , 10 steals and 5 blocks in an all - around gem . Klay_Thompson led the team in scoring , as he dropped 36 points on 8 - of - 15 from three_point range . Stephen_Curry finished with 18 points , 4 rebounds and 5 assists . Kevin_Durant accumulated 24 points , 5 rebounds and 4 assists . Andre_Iguodala was a nice spark off the bench , amassing 22 points and 4 assists on 6 - of - 7 from the field . Mike_Conley carried the load , as he collected 20 points , 5 rebounds and 9 assists . Marc_Gasol shot just 4 - of - 14 from the field , but still totaled 17 points , 6 rebounds and 7 assists . Zach_Randolph was a bright spot off the bench , contributing 17 points and 13 rebounds .
The Washington Wizards took game 1 of their series with the Toronto Raptors , 93 - 86 , in overtime Saturday at the Air_Canada_Centre . Paul_Pierce finished with a game - high 20 points on 7 - of - 10 shooting , including the go - ahead three_pointer in overtime . Toronto mustered just 4 points in overtime to finish with just 86 points , which is well below its season average of 104 points . Nene Hilario , who had been hampered by an ankle injury , posted a double_double with 12 points and 13 rebounds . Toronto was stifled on the offensive end , shooting just 38 percent from the floor as it dropped the opening game of the series . Kyle_Lowry had a frustrating game with just 7 points on 2 - of - 10 shooting before fouling out . Outside of DeMar_DeRozan 's 15 points , the Raptors ' starters combined for just 23 points .
Jimmy_Butler scored 52 points on 15 - of - 24 from the field and a ridiculous 21 - of - 22 from the free_throw line . Chicago as a team shot just 47 percent and had no other player score over 12 . Jimmy_Butler , however , was able to single - handedly carry his team to victory , as he also recorded a team - high 12 rebounds and 6 assists . Kemba_Walker scored 34 points , including 6 three_pointers , and also grabbed 11 rebounds
The Houston Rockets defeated the Oklahoma_City Thunder , 137 - 125 , at Toyota_Center on Sunday . The Rockets offense was unstoppable , shooting 63 percent from the field ( 50 - of - 79 ) and 51 percent from three_point range ( 20 - of - 39 ) . Russell_Westbrook was though , as he collected 39 points , 11 rebounds and 13 assists en route to his 36th triple_double of the season . Enes_Kanter finished second on the team , dropping 23 points , 4 rebounds and 2 assists off the bench . Victor_Oladipo finished with 15 points , 4 rebounds and 4 assists . The Rockets ( 51 - 22 ) have now won 4 - straight , as the offense continues to set records . Lou_Williams was the star of this one , as he provided 31 points , 3 rebounds and 4 assists on 11 - of - 15 shooting off Houston 's bench . James_Harden accrued 22 points , 5 rebounds and 12 assists . Trevor_Ariza accumulated 24 points , 6 rebounds , 6 assists and 3 steals on 9 - of - 11 shooting . Eric_Gordon started for Ryan_Anderson ( ankle ) and contributed 24 points and 2 rebounds . Nene Hilario was a nice spark off the bench , amassing 17 points , 4 rebounds and 3 assists .
The Utah Jazz ( 4 - 6 ) defeated the New_York Knicks ( 2 - 8 ) 102 - 100 on Friday . Gordon_Hayward scored a season - high 33 points in 38 minutes . Carmelo_Anthony 's 46 points were impressive , but they were n't enough to earn the win for the Knicks . Pablo_Prigioni finished with 13 points in 29 minutes off the bench .
The Dallas Mavericks ( 38 - 20 ) defeated the Charlotte Hornets ( 22 - 32 ) 92 - 81 on Sunday . Richard_Jefferson started in Parsons ' place , putting up 10 points , 10 rebounds , and 4 assists in 33 minutes . The Mavs welcomed Amar'e_Stoudemire to the team , and he put up 14 points and 3 rebounds in just 11 minutes off the bench in his debut
The host Philadelphia 76ers defeated the Phoenix Suns , 120 - 105 , at Wells_Fargo_Center on Saturday . They did just that , as they came out early with a 32 - 19 first quarter . The Sixers ' offense was very efficient , as they shot 52 percent from the field and assisted on 33 of their 45 made baskets . Their defense was n't bad either , as they held Phoenix to 42 percent from the field , 62 percent from the free_throw line and 29 percent from three_point range . Eric_Bledsoe did all he could though , accumulating 27 points , 5 rebounds and 6 assists in the defeat . Devin_Booker was the only other starter in double_figures , scoring 10 points on 4 - of - 13 shooting . Alan_Williams recorded his second - straight double_double , scoring 12 points and grabbing 11 rebounds off the bench . Tyler_Ulis had 1 of his best games as well , accruing 9 points , 4 rebounds , 5 assists and 4 steals in the defeat . Philadelphia ( 3 - 10 ) saw an opportunity to win here as a 1 - point underdog and they did n't let up . Joel_Embiid played just 20 minutes , but led the team with a career - high 26 points and 7 rebounds . Sergio_Rodriguez flirted with a triple_double , accumulating 8 points , 8 rebounds and 11 assists . Nik_Stauskas was a nice spark off the bench , dropping 21 points on 8 - of - 9 shooting . Dario_Saric provided 10 points , 7 rebounds and 5 assists of his own off the bench as well .
The Cleveland Cavaliers defeated the visiting Atlanta Hawks , 104 - 93 , in Game 1 of the Eastern_Conference semifinals Monday at Quicken_Loans_Arena . The Hawks had whittled the Cleveland down to 74 - 70 by that point , and found themselves with an 80 - 79 lead , their first of the game , after an Al_Horford dunk of an alley - oop pass from Dennis_Schroder with 8 minutes remaining in regulation . The Hawks received an outstanding effort off the bench from Dennis_Schroder , who tallied a game - high 27 points , and added 6 assists and 3 rebounds . It was an encouraging sign for Atlanta , who saw their valuable sixth man held to 6 points per game in last year 's conference finals against Cleveland . Paul_Millsap paced the starters with a 17 - point , 13 - rebound double_double that also included 3 assists , 4 blocks and 2 steals . Kent_Bazemore continued his stellar stretch of postseason performances in a tough matchup against LeBron_James , collecting 16 points , 12 boards , 4 assists and 2 steals . Al_Horford supplied 10 points , 6 rebounds , 1 assist , 3 blocks and 2 steals . LeBron_James paced the Cavs ' attack with 25 points , 9 assists , 7 rebounds , 5 steals and 1 block . Kyrie_Irving was right behind him with 21 points , 8 assists , 1 rebound , 2 blocks and 1 steal . Kevin_Love checked in with 17 points , 11 rebounds , 1 assist , 1 steal and 1 block . JR_Smith registered 12 points , 5 rebounds , 3 assists and 1 steal . He encouragingly drained 4 of his 7 three_point attempts as well . Tristan_Thompson was productive in his start at center , producing 8 points but hauling in 14 rebounds , handing out 2 assists and blocking a pair of shots .
The Charlotte Hornets ( 30 - 27 ) defeated the Indiana Pacers ( 31 - 27 ) 96 - 95 on Friday . Paul_George led the Pacers ' effort with 32 points , while Marvin_Williams continued his outstanding campaign with a 26 - point effort for Charlotte . Marvin_Williams added 13 rebounds , 1 assist , 1 steal and 2 blocks to his team - leading scoring tally . Kemba_Walker was right on his heels with his own double_double , consisting of 22 points , 10 assists , 3 rebounds and 1 steal . Cody_Zeller amassed 14 points , 5 rebounds and 1 block . Paul_George nailed a 40 - footer to close out the first half as part of his team - high point total , and also supplied 6 rebounds , 4 assists , 3 steals and 1 block . Rookie Myles_Turner had a difficult time defensively against Marvin_Williams , but did turn in a solid 15 points and 4 boards . Jordan_Hill led the reserves with a modest 6 points , 5 rebounds and 1 assist .
The Boston Celtics defeated the Portland Trail_Blazers , 120 - 111 , at Moda_Center on Thursday . Portland got off to a strong start and led the game at the half 55 - 49 , but an explosive offensive outburst by the Celtics in the final period where Boston scored 43 points was enough to tilt the matchup in their favor . Boston was down as many as 15 points at 1 point earlier on , however , Isaiah_Thomas , who has built upon his league - leading fourth quarter points total , put up another big 15 points in the final period . Isaiah_Thomas went on to lead all scorers with 34 points in the contest . Unsurprisingly , the backcourt duo of Damian_Lillard and CJ_McCollum combined for 48 points on 38 shots , while Al-Farouq_Aminu poured in 26 points on 8 - of - 12 shooting off the bench . Celtics rookie Jaylen_Brown had an all - around solid performance with 14 points , 7 rebounds , 2 assists and 2 three_pointers made .
Russell_Westbrook scored a game - high 36 points , had 17 assists , and pulled down 11 rebounds . The triple_double was Russell_Westbrook 's sixth of the season , and his 17 assists were the NBA 's single - game season high thus far . Russell_Westbrook 's dominance helped contribute to Oklahoma_City 's 50 percent shooting both from the field and from beyond the arc . The Nuggets are the number 1 rebound ing team in the NBA , and showed it with 5 1 rebound s against a strong OKC team
The New_York Knicks ( 7 - 36 ) defeated the Philadelphia 76ers ( 8 - 34 ) 98 - 91 on Wednesday at the Wells_Fargo_Center in Philadelphia . The Knicks were the better shooters in this game , going 41 percent from the field and 35 percent from the three_point line , while the Sixers went just 37 percent from the floor and 35 percent from beyond the arc . The Knicks also out_rebounded the Sixers 52 - 43 , even furthering their advantage in this one . For the Knicks , Carmelo_Anthony came out firing Wednesday , scoring 27 points ( 8 - 24 FG , 2 - 7 3PT , 9 - 10 FT ) , while also recording 11 rebounds and 4 assists . It was his fourth double_double of the season , while he 's averaged 25 points and 8 rebounds per game over his last 3 matchups . He went 5 - for - 10 from the field and 2 - for - 7 from the three_point line to score 15 points , while adding 7 assists as well . In just his sixth game and second start of the year , rookie Langston_Galloway had a solid day , filling up the stat sheet with 11 points ( 5 - 11 FG , 1 - 2 3PT , 0 - 1 FT ) , 7 rebounds , 4 assists , 2 steals and 1 block . Coming off the bench , Tim_Hardaway_Jr. added 13 points ( 5 - 13 FG , 0 - 3 3PT , 3 - 4 FT ) in 20 minutes . Michael_Carter-Williams had himself a day , finishing with 27 points ( 10 - 26 FG , 0 - 1 3PT , 7 - 8 FT ) , 6 rebounds , 7 assists and 5 steals . Robert_Covington on the other had finished with 17 points ( 5 - 11 FG , 3 - 8 3PT , 4 - 4 FT ) and 4 assists . Henry_Sims was able to notch a double_double , contributing 11 points ( 4 - 12 FG , 3 - 4 FT ) and 12 rebounds . The only other Sixer to reach double_figures in points was KJ_McDaniels who had 12 points ( 4 - 13 FG , 2 - 3 3PT , 2 - 2 FT ) in 25 minutes .

As a whole , the Mavericks shot an impressive 48 percent from the field and buried 15 three_pointers . Even in the face of the loss , however , Phoenix was able to attain a stellar advantage on the boards , out - rebounding Dallas , 47 - 32 .

They really turned it on in the second half , as they dropped 75 points and outscored Minnesota by 20 to complete the comeback . The Timberwolves ( 28 - 41 ) needed this win to keep their playoff hopes alive , as they now sit 5 games behind the 8 - seed in the west . Karl-Anthony_Towns did all he could for Minnesota , as he led the way with 33 points and 6 rebounds . The Chicago Bulls defeated the Washington Wizards 106 - 95 at United_Center on Saturday . Both teams really struggled shooting , as the Wizards shot 42 percent to the Bulls ' 40 percent . Markieff_Morris did all he could though , leading the team with 24 points and 15 rebounds . Marcin_Gortat also recorded a double_double , totaling 18 points and 14 rebounds . Sheldon_McClellan and Tomas_Satoransky filled - in for Wall and Bradley_Beal , combining for 27 points , 6 rebounds and 9 assists in pleasantly surprising performances . Chicago ( 6 - 4 ) has now won 3 of their last 4 after losing 3 - straight , so it appears they 've steadied the ship . Jimmy_Butler had 1 of the best games of his career , accumulating 37 points , 8 rebounds and 9 assists in the win . Robin_Lopez finished with 10 points and 13 rebounds , despite going 5 - of - 16 from the field . Rajon_Rondo and Dwyane_Wade struggled with their shots as well , combining for 14 points on 5 - of - 23 shooting . Nikola_Mirotic was huge off the bench , scoring 17 points and grabbing 11 boards en route to a double_double .
The San_Antonio Spurs ( 34 - 6 ) extended their winning streak to 9 with a victory Wednesday over the Detroit Pistons ( 21 - 17 ) at The_Palace_of_Auburn_Hills , 109 - 99 . The Spurs exploded for a 29 - 19 second quarter to take a 9 - point halftime lead , a lead they would hold for the rest of the game . San_Antonio point guard Tony_Parker had scored 20 points just 3 times all season , but he exploded for a season - high 31 points on a brilliant 13 - 19 shooting to lead the Spurs to victory . Tony_Parker was supported by a double_double from power forward LaMarcus_Aldridge , who dropped 22 points and grabbed 13 rebounds . Manu_Ginobili came off the bench to score an efficient 15 points ( 5 - 12 shooting ) and collect 5 rebounds in 27 minutes . The Spurs shot a healthy 41 - 85 ( 48 percent ) from the field despite an off game from Kawhi_Leonard ( 7 points , 1 - 7 shooting ) . Kentavious_Caldwell-Pope knocked down 4 three_pointers and led the Pistons with 25 points in the losing effort . Andre_Drummond picked up his fourth double_double in the past 5 games with 17 points and 10 rebounds , and backup big man Aron_Baynes scored 15 points and grabbed 9 rebounds in just 19 minutes . The Pistons shot poorly , however , 42 percent from the floor and just 6 - 23 ( 26 percent ) from 3 , and were n't able to overcome the Spurs efficient attack .
Kawhi_Leonard scored a team - high 31 points and pulled down a team - high 9 rebounds . He went 11 - of - 22 from the field , while no other Spur attempted more than 9 field goals . He also added 3 steals on the defensive end in a performance that may help to add fuel to his MVP campaign . Paul_George shot just 5 - of - 18 , though he still managed a team - high 22 points . Sophomore big man Myles_Turner shot 7 - of - 11 for 16 points and added 3 steals . Indiana managed to hold an advantage in the rebounding column despite no Pacer coming up with more than 6 boards .

Tyson_Chandler wowed the crowd with a 25 - rebound performance , and he even chipped in on offense , putting up 17 points in his 43 minutes . Dirk_Nowitzki scored a game - high 30 points . Jose_Calderon , in just his third game back from a calf injury , put up 21 points and 10 rebounds against his former team .
The Memphis offense was especially good , as they shot 51 percent from the field , 90 percent from the free_throw line and 42 percent from three_point range . The second quarter was the difference in the game , with the Grizzlies outscoring the Jazz , 26 - 16 , in that quarter . Zach_Randolph was the player of the game , as he dropped 28 points and 9 rebounds off the bench . Mike_Conley led the starters , as he tallied 23 points , 3 rebounds and 3 assists . Marc_Gasol was n't far behind , accumulating 18 points , 4 rebounds and 5 assists . Rodney_Hood led the Jazz in scoring , as he scored 20 points . Gordon_Hayward did n't shoot well , but he accrued 13 points , 7 rebounds and 5 assists . George_Hill collected 16 points , 3 rebounds and 5 assists , while Rudy_Gobert totaled 15 points and 10 boards .
The Los_Angeles Lakers ( 3 - 9 ) defeated the Houston Rockets ( 9 - 3 ) 98 - 92 on Wednesday at the Toyota_Center in Houston . Without Dwight_Howard , who sat out with a knee injury , the Rockets did n't have their usual presence inside the lane , and were out_rebounded 47 - 38 . Kobe_Bryant shot 10 - for - 28 from the field and a dismal 1 - for - 7 from the three_point line , but still scored 29 points , while adding 7 assists . He scored 16 points off the bench , as he shot 6 - for - 15 from the field and 1 - for - 7 from beyond the arc . He 's now averaging 24 points , 7 rebounds and 7 assists on the year . Starting at point guard , Patrick_Beverley was able to score 15 points , equaling a season - high for him . He went 6 - for - 10 from the field and 3 - for - 8 from the three_point line to score 19 points , while also grabbing 6 rebounds . Trevor_Ariza was the only other player in double_digit , as he had 13 points and 7 rebounds .

Chicago also committed 18 turnovers , further hampering their chances at keeping matters competitive . The Golden_State Warriors ( 35 - 2 ) defeated the Sacramento Kings ( 15 - 22 ) 128 - 116 on Saturday . Stephen_Curry is making the strongest case to defend his MVP title and led all scorers with 38 points , 11 assists and 6 rebounds on 12 - of - 21 shooting . Klay_Thompson is currently second amongst all deep threats , but was not nearly as effective as his backcourt partner , and finished 1 - of - 7 from behind the arc . Thompson was effective late in the game , hooking up with Andrew_Bogut for some devastating backdoor cuts and added 15 points , 5 rebounds and 6 assists . Draymond_Green is becoming accustomed to rounding out the box score , and although Draymond_Green did not capture his ninth triple_double of the season , he did finish with 25 points , 9 assists and 4 rebounds on 8 - of - 12 shooting in 34 minutes . The UNC product shot the ball much better in his 24 minutes , adding 10 points on 4 - of - 7 shooting . Sacramento mounted a late comeback to pull the game within striking distance in the 4th quarter to pad the 12 points loss , as DeMarcus_Cousins found his stroke from beyond the arc . DeMarcus_Cousins went 2 - of - 6 from three_point territory , but the 2 that fell came at clutch moments . Rudy_Gay contributed on the scoring front and poured in 23 points in a game high 39 minutes , while Darren_Collison and Marco_Belinelli scored double_figures off the bench . Willie_Cauley-Stein ( finger ) was probable before the game , but suited up and added 10 points in 9 minutes .

The Utah Jazz ( 8 - 7 ) held off the New_Orleans Pelicans ( 4 - 13 ) 101 - 87 on Saturday . Utah had a 16 - point lead going into the fourth quarter and it 's nearly impossible to beat this stingy defense with that sort of deficit . The rebounding was the big difference in the game , as the Jazz snatched 49 boards compared to 35 for the Pelicans . New_Orleans got a fantastic game out of Anthony_Davis though , as he tallied 36 points , 11 rebounds , 3 blocks and 2 steals in the loss . Trevor_Booker amassed 13 points , 15 rebounds , 3 assists , 3 blocks and 2 steals in the win . Alec_Burks was also fantastic off the bench , as he led the team with 21 points and provided an additional 5 rebounds and 4 assists .
The key for the Celtics here was their shooting , as they hit 51 percent of their shots , while holding the Pacers to under 44 percent . Paul_George carried Indiana , as he accrued 37 points , 5 rebounds , 2 assists and 3 steals . Jeff_Teague was the only other Pacer in double_figures , as he tallied 25 points , 2 rebounds and 7 assists on 10 - of - 15 from the field . Isaiah_Thomas led Boston with 25 points and 5 assists . Avery_Bradley amassed 18 points and 8 rebounds . Jae_Crowder and Al_Horford both scored 15 points , with Al_Horford also providing 8 rebounds and 8 assists .
Defense was key , as they held Brooklyn to 40 percent shooting , while forcing 17 turnovers . Much of that was attributed to the 11 steals and 12 blocks the Hawks recorded . Dennis_Schroder led Atlanta , tallying 20 points and 10 assists . Dwight_Howard played just 28 minutes , but totaled 14 points and 16 rebounds . Paul_Millsap provided 14 points , 8 rebounds , 4 assists and 3 blocks . Brook_Lopez led the Nets in scoring , as he dropped 20 points in an otherwise empty stat line . Bojan_Bogdanovic was Brooklyn 's best player , accruing 16 points , 6 rebounds and 4 assists .
Rebounding was the biggest difference in the game , with Miami winning that battle , 45 - 38 . Anthony_Davis led the way for New_Orleans , as he collected 27 points , 8 rebounds , 3 steals and 3 blocks . DeMarcus_Cousins amassed 19 points and 9 rebounds . E'Twaun_Moore led the bench , as he dropped 18 points . Goran_Dragic returned from his eye injury to tally 33 points and 5 rebounds to lead the team . Hassan_Whiteside totaled 20 points and 17 rebounds on 9 - of - 11 shooting . The bench was huge , as Wayne_Ellington , James_Johnson and Tyler_Johnson all scored in double_figures , while combining for 39 points , 9 rebounds , 14 assists and 4 steals .

Rodney_Stuckey exited early due to a sore left calf , playing just 13 minutes in the first half . As a team , the Nets shot 61 percent and scored 123 points 1 night after scoring 129 points in triple - overtime . Bojan_Bogdanovic supplied 21 points off the bench for the second time in 4 games . David_West scored 13 points and played 28 minutes after exiting Friday 's game early due to an illness .
The Detroit Pistons ( 20 ) won their second game in a row to start the regular season , defeating the Utah Jazz ( 0 - 1 ) 92 - 87 on Wednesday . The meeting stayed close wire - to - wire , and the Pistons held just a 5 - point lead at the start of the fourth quarter . For the second game in a row to start the season , Andre_Drummond led the way for the Pistons , recording a double_double of 18 points ( 5 - 11 FG , 8 - 11 FT ) and 10 rebounds on top of 2 blocks in 36 minutes . Andre_Drummond has recorded a total of 36 points and 29 rebounds to start the season and has clearly established himself as the focal point down low for this Pistons team following the departure of Greg_Monroe . Reggie_Jackson led all Pistons scorers Wednesday night , scoring 19 points ( 7 - 14 FG , 1 - 3 3PT , 4 - 7 FT ) on top of 4 assists in 31 minutes . Kentavious_Caldwell-Pope ( 16 ) and Marcus_Morris ( 14 ) were the other 2 Detroit starters to score in double_figures , while rookie Stanley_Johnson added 11 points and 5 rebounds of his own in 20 minutes off the bench . For the Jazz , Derrick_Favors got off to a very strong start to the season and lead the way in the losing effort , scoring a game - high 26 points ( 10 - 15 FG , 6 - 8 FT ) and 6 rebounds in 35 minutes . Alec_Burks served as a solid contributor off the bench , scoring 18 points ( 6 - 14 FG , 6 - 7 FT ) and grabbing 6 rebounds in 26 minutes . Rodney_Hood , who started in favor of Alec_Burks at shooting guard , scored just 12 points ( 6 - 15 FG , 0 - 7 3PT ) in 29 minutes , but managed to dish out a team - high 6 assists and grab 4 rebounds . Gordon_Hayward rounds out the Utah players in double_figures , scoring 13 points ( 5 - 11 FG ) in 35 minutes , while Rudy_Gobert remained active on the boards and on defense , recording a team - high 12 rebounds and 3 blocks while managing just 6 points .

Gerald_Green filled in at small forward for Luol_Deng for a second consecutive contest and propelled the Heat to a road victory with a team - high , game - high , and season - high 25 points . However , a second - half offensive barrage that included 3 of his 4 three_pointers on the night helped Miami significantly extend what had been a razor - thin 50 - 49 halftime lead , and cruise to an eventual 21 - point win . Gerald_Green 's effort was complemented nicely by Chris_Bosh , who managed 20 points , 5 rebounds , 3 assists and 1 block . Dwyane_Wade pitched in with 17 points , 5 rebounds and a trio of assists . Hassan_Whiteside had his worst shooting night of the season , going only 1 - for - 6 from the field , making it his first single - digit scoring night in over 2 weeks and only the fourth game in which he has scored under 10 points . However , the standout center did haul in 14 boards , the third consecutive game in which he 's hit double_digit rebounds . Rookie Justice Justise_Winslow received a robust 35 minutes off the bench , and although he was n't terribly efficient with them , he did round out the stat sheet nicely . The Heat 's 2015 first - round pick finished with 9 points , 8 rebounds , 1 assist and 1 steal . The Knicks were thoroughly stymied by Miami 's suffocating defense , shooting only 38 percent from the field for the game and barely seeing 2 of 5 starters crack double_digit scoring . Carmelo_Anthony was 1 of those players , but the superstar small forward could only muster 11 points , 3 rebounds , 1 assist and 1 steal over 34 minutes . Kristaps_Porzingis matched Carmelo_Anthony 's 11 points and added 8 rebounds , 2 steals and 3 blocks . Reserve forward Kevin_Seraphin was the only other New_York player to reach double_figures , tallying 10 points , 3 rebounds and 1 assist over a very efficient 17 minutes .
DeMar_DeRozan once again carried the Raptors , as he tallied 26 points , 7 rebounds and 4 assists . Kyle_Lowry finished with 19 points , 5 rebounds and 6 assists , hitting numerous big shots late to cap the win . Giannis_Antetokounmpo continued his MVP form for the Bucks , accumulating 29 points , 6 rebounds and 11 assists in the defeat
The assist - to - turnover ratio was the big difference , as the Grizzlies recorded 25 assists to just 8 turnovers , while the Pistons matched their assists to turnovers at 17 a piece . Marc_Gasol was the only Memphis player with more than 10 points , as he tied a career - high with 38 points . Marc_Gasol also added 5 rebounds , 4 assists , 2 steals and 2 blocks on 14 - of - 17 shooting to his impressive stat line . Reggie_Jackson departed the game in the first 3 minutes due to a leg injury , but returned to lead the Pistons with 18 points and 7 assists . Jon_Leuer also dropped 18 points , as he added 5 rebounds off the bench . Andre_Drummond recorded another double_double , totaling 13 points and 19 rebounds in the defeat .
The impressive numbers came on what was a relatively `` off '' night for the star , as he shot just 8 - of - 21 from the field and 5 - of - 8 from the free_throw line with 6 turnovers . Sixth man Ty_Lawson was dominant off the bench , posting 19 points and 6 assists in just 23 minutes . Two starters posted double_doubles , as center Andre_Drummond scored 14 with 12 rebounds , and point guard Reggie_Jackson scored 18 to go with 11 assists .
DeMar_DeRozan compiled a game - high 37 points , while Serge_Ibaka was a distant second with 15 points . Jonas_Valanciunas totaled 10 points , while DeMarre_Carroll supplied 9 . Cory_Joseph , now presumably the starting point guard for the remainder of the campaign due to Kyle_Lowry 's wrist injury , contributed a modest 6 points , 4 assists , 3 rebounds and 2 steals over 34 minutes . Carmelo_Anthony paced the Knicks with 24 points . Lance_Thomas drew another start for Kristaps_Porzingis and registered 12 points . Willy_Hernangomez posted 8 points , 9 boards and 2 assists .
All 5 members of the starting 5 reached double_digit scoring , led by Tobias_Harris ' 19 points . The remainder of the first unit , Marcus_Morris , Andre_Drummond , Ish_Smith and Kentavious_Caldwell-Pope , combined for another 55 points , while Jon_Leuer posted a 14 - point , 10 - rebound double_double off the bench . All of the strong offensive performances led to a 51 percent success rate from the field for Detroit . The Nuggets received double_digit scoring efforts from Danilo_Gallinari , Emmanuel_Mudiay and Gary_Harris , but also saw Jusuf_Nurkic held scoreless over 17 minutes . Jameer_Nelson was the only bench player to hit double_digit in the scoring column , although forward Wilson_Chandler did manage to haul in 10 rebounds .
The Toronto Raptors ( 39 - 18 ) defeated the visiting Cleveland Cavaliers ( 41 - 16 ) 99 - 97 , Friday night at Air_Canada_Centre . DeMar_DeRozan had a tough game , starting 1 - 11 from the field before leaving mid - way through the third with flu - like symptoms . Kyle_Lowry then put the team on his shoulders , scoring 16 of his career - high 43 points in the fourth quarter . DeMar_DeRozan finished with 6 points , 6 rebounds , 2 assists and 1 steal , in 32 minutes . Kyle_Lowry was lights out as he tallied a career - high 43 points on 15 - of - 20 shooting from the field , including 2 - 5 from deep and 11 - 15 free_throws . He also contributed 9 assists , 5 rebounds and 4 steals , in 43 minutes . Terrence_Ross chipped in 15 points ( 6 - 11 FG , 3 - 6 3PT ) , 2 rebounds and 1 assist , in 27 minutes off the bench while , Jonas_Valanciunas was solid in the middle as he racked up 11 points and 9 rebounds , in 28 minutes . LeBron_James led the Cavs in scoring with 25 points ( 9 - 18 FG , 2 - 4 3PT , 5 - 9 FT ) , along with 8 rebounds , 7 assists but gave up 6 turnovers , in 40 minutes . Kevin_Love added 20 points ( 5 - 15 FG , 2 - 5 3PTs , 8 - 10 FT ) , 9 rebounds and 5 assists , in 35 minutes while , JR_Smith chipped in 13 points ( 5 - 8 FG , 3 - 6 3PT ) , along with 3 rebounds , in 32 minutes . The Cavs shot 50 percent from long distance and 47 percent from the field over all but it was not enough to avoid their fifth loss under coach Lue .
The Dallas Mavericks proved to be too much to handle for the Sacramento Kings Tuesday night at the America Airlines Center , winning 106 - 98 . Dallas promptly responded though , battling back to cut the deficit to 9 , as the buzzer sounded signifying the end of the second quarter . Rudy_Gay tallied a line of 26 points ( 7 - 14 FG , 1 - 3 3PT , 11 - 13 FT ) , 8 rebounds , 8 assists , and 2 steals while turning the ball over 7 times . Monta_Ellis was held scoreless in the first half , but was a huge factor in the second half finishing with 16 points ( 7 - 16 FG , 1 - 4 3PT , 1 - 3 FT ) . Maverick 's superstar Dirk_Nowitzki registered a team - high 23 points ( 7 - 12 FG , 2 - 3 3PT , 7 - 8 FT ) , 7 rebounds , 3 assists , and 1 block with 2 turnovers .

The Kings looked to be on their way to closing this game out late in the fourth quarter after surrendering just 10 points to the Mavericks through the first 10 minutes of the period . The Indiana Pacers ( 37 - 43 ) defeated the Oklahoma_City Thunder ( 43 - 37 ) 116 - 104 on Sunday at Bankers_Life_Fieldhouse in Indianapolis . Notching a double_double of his own was Roy_Hibbert , who finished with 17 points ( 7 - 12 FG , 3 - 4 FT ) , 10 rebounds and 2 blocked shots . The double_double was his third in a row , a stretch where he 's averaging 13 points and 10 rebounds per game . He finished with a monster line of 54 points ( 21 - 43 FG , 5 - 15 3PT , 7 - 11 FT ) , 9 rebounds and 8 assists over 40 minutes , but he just did n't get enough help from his teammates to convert those impressive numbers into a win . Dion_Waiters posted 16 points ( 7 - 16 FG , 2 - 5 3PT , 0 - 4 FT ) and 2 rebounds , while Enes_Kanter recorded 13 points ( 5 - 11 FG , 1 - 1 3PT , 2 - 3 FT ) , 5 rebounds and 1 block . The Thunder received only 14 points from their bench .
The Golden_State Warriors ( 51 - 12 ) defeated the Detroit Pistons ( 23 - 41 ) 105 - 98 on Wednesday in Oakland . The Warriors were able to open up their lead in the fourth quarter behind Klay_Thompson , who finished with 27 points on 11 - of - 19 shooting . Klay_Thompson 's running mate in the backcourt , MVP-candidate Stephen_Curry , struggled shooting the ball in the victory and finished with just 9 points on 11 - of - 10 shooting , but was still able to dish out 11 assists . Andre_Drummond was a force in the paint for the Pistons in the losing effort , scoring 22 points on 11 - of - 25 shooting and grabbing 27 rebounds , 17 of them offensive , in 34 minutes . Greg_Monroe also had a solid outing , recording 20 points on 7 - of - 18 shooting and 8 rebounds in 32 minutes . After having just 2 points and 3 assists in his last outing , Reggie_Jackson bounced back to put up 14 points on 7 - of - 15 shooting and 9 assists . Caron_Butler replaced Tayshaun_Prince in the starting lineup , but only scored 4 points in 20 minutes .

For the Raptors , Kyle_Lowry went 6 - for - 20 from the field and 2 - for - 4 from the three_point line to match a team - high of 16 points , while also recording 6 rebounds and 4 assists . The Detroit Pistons ( 40 - 35 ) defeated the Oklahoma_City Thunder ( 52 - 23 ) Tuesday night at the Palace of Auburn Hills , 88 - 82 . Their offense clearly suffered in their absence , as the Thunder committed more turnovers ( 19 ) th 1 assists ( 16 ) and scored a meager 9 points in the third quarter , which allowed Detroit to turn a 48 - 46 halftime deficit into a 71 - 57 lead heading into the fourth quarter , more than enough to stave off a final push from the Thunder . Andre_Drummond added his league - leading 62nd double_double with 13 points ( 6 - 9 FG ) and 15 rebounds . Detroit shot just 4 - 19 ( 21 percent ) from three_point land and 38 percent overall , but they pulled down 16 offensive rebounds to produce just enough offense to win . The scoring load for the Thunder fell squarely on Russell_Westbrook 's shoulders , as he hoisted up 28 shots and tied Marcus_Morris 's game - high 24 points ( 8 - 28 FG , 2 - 8 3PT , 6 - 9 FT ) . Enes_Kanter added a double_double with 14 points and 14 rebounds ( 6 offensive ) , but not a single other Thunder player reached double_figures . Oklahoma_City shot just 38 percent from the floor and missed 8 free_throws ( 14 - 22 , 64 percent ) as they clearly missed Kevin_Durant 's presence .

The Sacramento Kings ( 21 - 37 ) defeated the New_York Knicks ( 12 - 47 ) 124 - 86 on Tuesday at Madison_Square_Garden in New_York . The Kings dominated this game offensively right from the beginning , out_scoring the Knicks 65 - 39 by half , and reaching the 100 - point mark after just the third quarter . Their superior shooting was a big reason for this , as they went 49 percent from the field and 56 percent from the three_point line , while the Knicks finished at 37 percent from the floor and just 18 percent from deep . Rudy_Gay led the way , going 9 - for - 15 from the field and 3 - for - 4 from the three_point line to score a team - high of 25 points , to go along with 7 rebounds and 4 assists in just 27 minutes . He 's now shot 40 percent or higher in each of his last 4 games , a span where he 's averaging 23 points and 7 rebounds . DeMarcus_Cousins also was a big factor in the win , finishing with 22 points ( 5 - 10 FG , 1 - 1 3PT , 11 - 11 FT ) , 10 rebounds and 2 blocked shots . Ben_McLemore was also very efficient with his time , scoring 20 points ( 6 - 12 FG , 2 - 4 3PT , 6 - 7 FT ) in just 23 minutes . He 's picked up his game of late , recording 2 20 - point games over his last 3 , despite averaging just 12 points on the season . Coming off the bench , Derrick_Williams and Nik_Stauskas reached double_figures as well with 17 and 15 points respectively . Alexey_Shved led the team in scoring , posting 15 points ( 4 - 11 FG , 0 - 4 3PT , 7 - 9 FT ) , to go along with 7 rebounds and 3 assists in 33 minutes . It was a season - high in minutes for the guard , as he took advantage of the extra time with his second 15 - point showing in a row . He went 5 - for - 9 from the field and 1 - for - 3 from the three_point line to finish with 13 points , while adding 6 assists and 2 steals as well . The only other Knick to reach double_figures was Jason_Smith , who posted 13 points ( 6 - 10 FG , 0 - 1 3PT , 1 - 2 FT ) , 4 rebounds and 3 blocked shots in 22 minutes .

The New_York Knicks snapped a 6 - game losing streak as they defeated the host Milwaukee Bucks 116 - 111 , at BMO_Harris_Bradley_Center on Friday evening . The Knicks ( 17 - 19 ) used a monstrous fourth quarter , including an 80 run in final 2 minutes in order to take a 5 - point lead and earn their revenge against the Bucks ( 18 - 17 ) , who had defeated them in the first game of this home - and - home series , in new York earlier this week . Ron_Baker finished with 4 assists and 0 turnovers , as he helped fuel a 33 - 15 fourth quarter that saw the Knicks take their first lead since they led 34 - 33 early in the second quarter . Melo was the high - point man for New_York , with 26 points to go along with 10 assists and 6 rebounds , while Kristaps_Porzingis followed up with 24 points , 6 rebounds and 3 blocks . Giannis added 5 blocks , 6 rebounds , 2 assists and 2 steals , while Jabari_Parker added 5 assists and 4 steals . Greg_Monroe was solid in 28 minutes off the bench , as he poured in 19 points , along with 7 rebounds and 4 assists , in his fourth consecutive game scoring in double_digit . The Bucks shot 50 percent from the field , including 55 percent from long range but were not able to hang on for the full 48 , as the Knicks surged back to get their revenge .
The Atlanta Hawks defeated the Philadelphia 76ers , 110 - 93 , at Philips_Arena on Saturday . Shooting was also a key difference , with Atlanta shooting 50 percent , while the Sixers hit just 42 percent of their shots . The Sixers ( 15 - 27 ) have the worst plus - minus in the NBA without Joel_Embiid in the lineup and losses like this show how much of a difference he makes . Ersan_Ilyasova led Philly in scoring , tallying 21 points , 3 rebounds and 4 assists . Robert_Covington scored 15 points and grabbed 10 rebounds en route to a double_double . TJ_McConnell stuffed the stat sheet by providing 8 points , 6 rebounds , 11 assists and 3 steals . The Hawks ( 26 - 18 ) have now won 9 of their last 11 games , as they continue to climb up the standings . Paul_Millsap was the player of the game , collecting 22 points , 10 rebounds and 2 blocks on 9 - of - 14 shooting . Dwight_Howard also recorded a double_double , totaling 13 points , 15 rebounds and 3 assists . Dennis_Schroder scored 15 points , while handing out a team - high 9 assists . Tim_Hardaway_Jr. was a nice spark off the bench , providing 12 points , 3 rebounds , 6 assists and 2 steals .
The shooting was n't any better , as they shot 41 percent from the field , 67 percent from the free_throw line and 22 percent from three_point range . Bradley_Beal was the best player in this game , tallying 26 points , 3 rebounds and 5 assists . John_Wall went just 5 - of - 14 from the field , but still finished with 15 points , 7 rebounds , 5 assists and 3 steals . Markieff_Morris also scored 15 points , as all 5 starters played at least 33 minutes . Nikola_Jokic was the only effective Nugget on offense , finishing with 17 points and 11 rebounds . Wilson_Chandler had a game to forget , as he went just 2 - of - 16 from the field , en route to 5 points .
John_Wall finished with a team - high 29 points , 13 assists , 5 rebounds and 3 steals in 37 minutes . As a team , all things were clicking offensively from the Wizards , with the team as a whole shooting 50 percent from the field and 41 percent from 3 as they notched their fourth straight victory . Carmelo_Anthony finished with a game - high 34 points on 13 - of - 27 shooting on top of 10 rebounds , while Derrick_Rose had his second straight solid game , as he finished with 20 points . In the end , however , it was New_York 's inability to hit an outside shot that ultimately led to their demise , as they made just 7 of their 24 attempts from long range ( 29 percent ) .

The Brooklyn Nets ( 5 - 13 ) defeated the Phoenix Suns ( 8 - 10 ) 94 - 91 on Tuesday . Brandon_Knight scored a game - high 26 points , and added 7 rebounds and 4 assists . Backcourt mate Eric_Bledsoe had a quiet first half , but came on in the third and fourth quarters to finish with 17 points , 7 assists , a 2 rebounds and 4 steals . Meanwhile , Alex_Len turned in an outstanding performance while making his second start in place of Tyson_Chandler ( hamstring ) , posting a 13 - point , 14 - rebound double_double , and filling out the stat sheet with 2 assists , 2 steals and 3 blocks . However , starting power forward Markieff_Morris and high - usage reserve TJ_Warren could only muster 6 - point performances each , leaving a sizable void in the Suns ' offensive effort . Mirza_Teletovic did post another strong outing to lead the Suns ' bench , collecting 12 points and 5 rebounds in his third consecutive game with double_digit points . Jarrett_Jack supported Brook_Lopez as the only other double_digit scorer in Brooklyn 's starting 5 , stuffing the stat sheet with 11 points , 8 assists , 4 rebounds and 3 steals . Thaddeus_Young pitched in 8 points , 4 rebounds and 2 assists for only his second single - digit scoring night of the entire season . Impressive rookie Rondae_Hollis-Cory_Jefferson ( 8 points ) and veteran Joe_Johnson ( 9 points ) made modest contributions , although the former did add 9 rebounds . Shane_Larkin and Wayne_Ellington paced the Brooklyn bench with a pair of 11 - point efforts , and made key contributions in the victory by scoring 6 and 7 , respectively , in the final period .
The Cleveland Cavaliers ( 3 - 3 ) took down the New_Orleans Pelicans ( 3 - 3 ) 118 - 111 on Monday night at the Quicken_Loans_Arena . The Cavaliers were led by none other than LeBron_James , who had an impressive triple_double , with 32 points ( 9 - 17 FG , 1 - 3 3PT , 13 - 17 FT ) , 12 rebounds and 9 assists in 40 minutes . Kyrie_Irving had an impressive game as well , putting up 32 points ( 11 - 21 FG , 4 - 7 3PT , 6 - 7 FT ) , with 9 assists and 5 rebounds in 41 minutes . The Pelicans received a big boost off of the bench from Ryan_Anderson on Monday night , as he scored 32 points ( 11 - 19 FG , 8 - 12 3PT , 2 - 2 FT ) , with 5 rebounds , 3 assists and 1 steal in 34 minutes off the bench . We ca n't overlook the strong play of Anthony_Davis once again either , as he had 27 points ( 12 - 21 FG , 0 - 2 3PT , 3 - 4 FT ) , with 14 rebounds , 4 assists , 4 steals and 3 blocks in 40 minutes .
The Splash Brothers Oracle_Arena roaring throughout the blowout over the Charlotte Hornets on Wednesday , as both players scored 26 points each in the first half . Stephen_Curry went on to finish with a game high 39 points on 11 - of - 15 shooting from behind the arc . Klay_Thompson scored 29 points and cooled off in the second half , while Kevin_Durant was not as effective but still managed 18 points on 17 shots , but added 8 assists and 8 boards . As for the Hornets , the bright spot came from Frank_Kaminsky 's bench performance where he scored 24 points on 9 - of - 14 shooting , to along with 7 rebounds and 2 assists . Kemba_Walker was silenced to just 7 points in 25 minutes and Nicolas_Batum was also held to a lowly 13 points , however , he did hit 3 - of - 4 from behind the arc .
The Memphis Grizzlies ( 21 - 18 ) slid past the Boston Celtics ( 19 - 18 ) 101 - 98 on Sunday . The 25 - year - old managed 14 points , 2 rebounds and 2 steals over a robust 38 minutes , but notably came up empty with respect to his trademark three_pointers . Isaiah_Thomas almost single - handedly was too much for the Grizzlies , as he posted a game - high 35 points , 3 rebounds , 8 assists and 1 steal . Like Avery_Bradley , Amir_Johnson also pitched in 14 points , and added 9 rebounds , 4 assists and 1 block . Jae_Crowder with the other Celtics starter with double_digit scoring , managing 10 points , 2 rebounds , 2 assists and 4 steals . Jared_Sullinger led the reserves with 11 points , 4 rebounds and 1 steal . As has been the case recently , it was a backup that spearheaded Memphis ' offensive charge , as Zach_Randolph took advantage of the Celtics ' vulnerable frontcourt with a 25 - point , 13 - rebound double_double that also included 2 assists , 1 steal and 2 blocks . Four of those buckets from the charity stripe came in the fourth quarter , when the Grizzlies managed to overcome the 76 - 68 deficit they 'd entered the period with . Tony_Allen was also highly efficient in his second start in place of Lee , posting a 15 - point , 10 - rebound double_double that also included 2 steals and 1 block . Not to be outdone , Marc_Gasol poured in 11 points and hauled in 11 boards , with almost half his scoring haul ( 5 points ) coming during the Grizzlies ' comeback in the final period . Matt_Barnes came just 1 rebound shy of joining the double_double parade himself , registering 12 points , 9 boards , 2 assists and 2 blocks .
The Cleveland Cavaliers ( 56 - 22 ) took care of the Milwaukee Bucks ( 32 - 46 ) in a 109 - 80 win on Tuesday . In fact , the Cavaliers had a 24 - point lead at half and were able to rest their starters for long periods of this game . Cleveland shot 55 percent from the field , 90 percent from the free_throw line and 50 percent from three_point range . They also held the Bucks to under 40 percent shooting . The benches were a huge difference as well , with Clevelad getting 35 points off the bench compared to Milwaukee 's 9 . JR_Smith led the team with 21 points , with all of those points coming from three_point range . LeBron_James tallied 17 points , 5 rebounds and 9 assists on 7 - for - 9 shooting . Giannis_Antetokounmpo did continue his great form though , as he accumulated 22 points , 14 rebounds and 8 assists . Jabari_Parker scored 19 of his own , while also grabbing 4 rebounds .
The Golden_State Warriors ( 29 - 1 ) defeated the Sacramento Kings ( 12 - 19 ) 122 - 103 on Monday . A wild and event filled night went down at Oracle_Arena , as Stephen_Curry went lights out for a 3 minute span that included 17 points in the last 3 minutes of the first half . Curry 's night did not start until the end of the first half , but he continued the hot shooting trend in the 3rd quarter , and finished with his first triple_double of the season , going for 23 points , 14 rebounds and 10 assists . Klay_Thompson poured in 29 points and Draymond_Green added 25 points of his own , as the Warriors big 3 contributed over 60 percent of the team 's points . At this point of the season , we have grown accustomed to the Warriors impressive three_point shooting , and tonight was no different , as Golden_State shot 48 percent from deep as a unit . Omri_Casspi went for a career high 36 points , including Curry like three_pointers from 32 - plus feet , and finished 9 - of - 12 from deep . Rajon_Rondo got into foul trouble early , picking up 3 in the first quarter and played a total of 18 minutes . Rajon_Rondo finished with 4 points and 2 assists , far below his season averages . Rudy_Gay contributed 17 points , while Darren_Collison did his best to aid the bench , adding 13 points , 11 assists and 6 rebounds .
The Rockets ( 36 - 18 ) fell to the Mavericks ( 37 - 20 ) 111 - 100 in Dallas on Friday . Houston , which is still without Dwight_Howard , managed just 41 percent shooting , while Dallas shot 47 percent from the field and forced 21 turnovers . The Rockets were led by 26 points from Bernard_James_Harden , who shot 6 - of - 14 from the field and 11 - of - 13 from the line . Trevor_Ariza added 16 points , and Josh_Smith chipped in 15 points off the bench . Corey_Brewer added 10 points but shot 0 - of - 5 from beyond the arc . Tyson_Chandler had a 10 - point , 9 - rebound double_double , while Chandler_Parsons and Rajon_Rondo each finished with 13 points . Dirk_Nowitzki and Monta_Ellis had 12 points apiece , and Charlie_Villanueva chipped in 12 points off the bench . Dallas was led by Al-Farouq_Aminu and Devin_Harris , who both scored 17 points . Al-Farouq_Aminu , who played 30 minutes , also pulled down 12 rebounds .
James_Harden scored 37 points on a ridiculous 18 - of - 18 from the free_throw line in the Rockets ' win over the Celtics Monday . Amidst MVP chants from his home crowd , the league 's fourth - leading scorer dropped 37 points , 8 rebounds , and 7 assists . James_Harden had 10 turnovers on the night , exceeding his assist total and putting him ahead of Russell_Westbrook for the highest average in the league . Sixth man Eric_Gordon , who left the game late with what appeared to be an ankle sprain , scored 19 points and made 4 three_pointers . As a whole , Houston hit 12 threes , continuing their dominance from beyond the arc . For Boston , a nagging injury appeared to hobble All-Star guard Isaiah_Thomas , who shot just 7 - of - 19 from the field . Center Al_Horford led the team with 21 points to go along with 6 rebounds and 9 assists . Guard Avery_Bradley had 16 points and a team - high 10 rebounds , but had his first game of the season without a three_pointer made .

On the other hand , 5 players scored in double_digit for the Sixers , led by Joel_Embiid , who finished with 15 points on 5 - of - 14 shooting , along with 4 rebounds , 2 assists and 2 blocks , in 29 minutes . Jahlil_Okafor added 14 points on 4 - of - 7 shooting , along with 8 rebounds and 1 steal , in 24 minutes .

Both teams shot well , as the Bucks shot 51 percent from the field and the Suns hit 48 percent of their shots . Bench production was decisive as well , with Milwaukee winning that battle , 49 - 33 . TJ_Warren led the way for Phoenix , as he dropped 23 points on 11 - of - 14 shooting . Eric_Bledsoe finished with 11 points , 4 rebounds , 9 assists , 2 steals and 2 blocks . Devin_Booker finished second among starters , totaling 15 points , 4 rebounds and 3 assists . Alan_Williams was a huge spark off the bench , as he provided 17 points , 15 rebounds , 3 assists and 3 steals . The Bucks ( 26 - 31 ) have now won 4 of their last 5 games , as their January swoon seems to be far in the rear view mirror . Giannis_Antetokounmpo carried the load for Milwaukee , as he accumulated 28 points , 8 rebounds , 6 assists and 2 blocks on 11 - of - 13 shooting . Greg_Monroe came off the bench to collect 13 points , 8 rebounds , 3 assists , 3 steals and 2 blocks . Michael_Beasley led the bench in scoring , as he dropped 17 points on 8 - of - 10 from the field .
The Golden_State Warriors ( 30 - 5 ) defeated the Utah Jazz ( 13 - 26 ) 116 - 105 on Wednesday at EnergySolutions_Arena in Salt_Lake_City . The Warriors were the superior shooters in this game , going 51 percent from the field and 52 percent from the three_point line , while the Jazz went 48 percent from the floor and just 33 percent from beyond the arc . While the Jazz out_rebounded the Warriors 44 - 31 , the Warriors made up for it by forcing the Jazz into 17 turnovers , while committing only 10 of their own . Stephen_Curry was very tough to stop in this game , as he went 10 - for - 16 from the field and 4 - for - 9 from the three_point line to finish with a game - high of 27 points . He also handed out 11 assists , notching his fourth double_double in his last 5 games . Over those last 5 outings , Stephen_Curry is averaging 24 points and 11 assists per game , as he continues to have the hot hand . Draymond_Green also had a strong showing in this one , scoring an efficient 15 points ( 6 - 9 FG , 3 - 4 3PT ) . Surprisingly , he only recorded 1 rebound though , which was a season - low for him . Klay_Thompson only shot the ball 8 times , converting on 5 of those 8 attempts . It was the least amount of shots he 's gotten off all year , but he was still able to add 12 points . Derrick_Favors led the charge , going 10 - for - 16 from the field to score 22 points , while adding 11 rebounds as well . Enes_Kanter was another double_double contributor , with 13 points ( 6 - 13 FG , 1 - 1 3PT ) and 10 rebounds of his own . The Jazz received an impressive bench performance from Rudy_Gobert , who recorded 16 points ( 4 - 9 FG , 8 - 11 FT ) and 11 rebounds . It was arguably 1 of his best games of the season , as the 16 points were a season - high , and he also had a significant defensive presence with 2 steals and 3 blocks . Gordon_Hayward finished with 17 points ( 5 - 11 FG , 1 - 4 3PT , 6 - 6 FT ) as well .
The Utah Jazz hung on to earn their sixth straight win , as they defeated the visiting Indiana Pacers 109 - 100 , at Vivint_Smart_Home_Arena on Saturday evening . The Jazz started out with a strong 34 - 21 first quarter and led 60 - 50 at halftime . George_Hill led the way with a game - high 30 points , to go along with 6 rebounds and 5 assists , while Gordon_Hayward finished with 27 points on solid 8 - of - 13 shooting . Rudy_Gobert was huge late in the game , and finished with 19 points and 11 rebounds , as he helped the Jazz seal the deal , with some key offensive boards . Alec_Burks had 1 of his best games of the season , as he finished with 13 points on 5 - of - 8 shooting , and 4 rebounds , in 19 minutes off the bench . Meanwhile , the Pacers ( 22 - 21 ) fell short despite 5 players scoring in double_digit . Thaddeus_Young , Jeff_Teague and Paul_George each had a team - high 19 points , while Monta_Ellis added 15 off the bench . Myles_Turner was the only other player to score in double_digit , as he chipped in 13 , on 5 - of - 9 shooting . The Pacers shot 51 percent from the field and 50 percent from long range , but lacked the closing power , as their star Paul_George was ejected .

The Golden_State Warriors defeated the visiting Cleveland Cavaliers , 104 - 89 , in Game 1 of the NBA_Finals at Oracle_Arena on Thursday . Shaun_Livingston had 1 of his best games of the playoffs , and poured in 20 points on a lights out 8 - of - 10 shooting , specifically with floaters and close range jumpers . The Cavaliers were able to grind out a handful of lead changes on the back of Kyrie_Irving and LeBron_James , but their bench was unable to help out in the scoring department , as they finished with only 10 points combined from the reserves . LeBron_James finished with 23 points , 12 rebounds and 9 assists , while Kyrie_Irving added 26 points on 7 - of - 22 shooting . Draymond_Green returned to his stat stuffing ways and scored 16 points , 11 rebounds , 7 assists and 4 steals , while causing nightmares in transition for Cleveland . Harrison_Barnes got working early on in the first quarter and was part of the reason his team was able to get off to a quick lead in the first half , as he finished with 13 points on 6 - of - 10 shooting .

The Boston Celtics ( 13 - 23 ) defeated the New_Orleans Pelicans ( 18 - 19 ) 108 - 100 on Monday at the TD_Garden in Boston . After coming out of the third quarter down 76 - 72 , the Celtics did n't look to be in the best of positions . With a huge fourth quarter though , where the Celtics out - scored the Pelicans 36 - 24 , they were able to secure the 8 point victory at home in front of their home crowd . The Celtics forced the Pelicans into 18 turnovers , while committing only 11 of their own , which may have been the difference in this game . Jared_Sullinger led the team , scoring 27 points ( 9 - 17 FG , 1 - 4 3PT , 8 - 9 FT ) and grabbing 10 rebounds in 32 minutes . The 27 points were a season - high for him , while it marked his second double_double in as many games . Jae_Crowder on the other hand posted 22 points ( 9 - 14 FG , 2 - 4 3PT , 2 - 2 FT ) , 3 assists , 4 steals and 2 blocks . While the 22 points were a season - high for him , so were the blocks and steals , as he was a huge contributor on both the offensive and defensive side of the ball Monday . Marcus_Thornton had 13 points ( 2 - 8 FG , 1 - 3 3PT , 8 - 9 FT ) in only 14 minutes , while Brandon_Bass had 12 points ( 4 - 10 FG , 1 - 2 3PT , 3 - 3 FT ) in 24 minutes . Both Avery_Bradley and Evan_Turner also reached double_figures with 10 points apiece . Anthony_Davis went 10 - for - 23 from the floor to score 34 points , while also adding 9 rebounds and 3 blocked shots . He 's had the hot hand lately , averaging 29 points and 9 rebounds per game over his last 3 outings . Eric_Gordon had arguably his best game of the season , going 7 - for - 12 from the field and 3 - for - 5 from the three_point line to score 21 points . He chipped in with 19 points ( 7 - 15 FG , 1 - 3 3PT , 4 - 6 FT ) and 8 rebounds , playing just under 35 minutes because Jrue_Holiday was forced from the game after only 16 minutes with a right ankle injury .
The host Memphis Grizzlies took down the visiting Minnesota Timberwolves , 102 - 98 , in their season opener Wednesday . While reigning Rookie of the Year Karl-Anthony_Towns scored 9 points in the first 5 minutes of the contest , the Grizzlies were able to keep him relatively quiet during the second and third quarters . Karl-Anthony_Towns still finished with a respectable 21 points . Veteran center Marc_Gasol , who Karl-Anthony_Towns has called his toughest matchup , made this no easy feat , however , recording 4 blocks to go along with 18 points . Third-year wing Andrew_Wiggins led the team in scoring , posting 25 points , while high - flying young guard Zach_LaVine dropped in 19 . Karl-Anthony_Towns , meanwhile , added 5 assists and 4 rebounds to complement his scoring output . Kris_Dunn played behind Zach_LaVine and Ricky_Rubio , clocking just 15 minutes of game time . He contributed 8 points and 4 rebounds during that time on the floor .
The Miami Heat defeated the Minnesota Timberwolves , 115 - 113 , at Target_Center on Monday . In the end , it was the Goran_Dragic show in Minneapolis , with the point guard hitting nearly everything he threw up and finishing with a team - high 33 points on 13 - of - 17 shooting from the field and 7 - of - 9 shooting from behind the arc on top of 9 assists . And that hot shooting was contagious , as the rest of the Miami players launched from three_point land with plenty of confidence and the team shot an astounding 54 percent from long range , solidifying them as 1 of the hottest teams in basketball . Karl-Anthony_Towns finished with a game - high 35 points and 8 rebounds , while Andrew_Wiggins ' late - game heroics and a 21 - point second half led to him finishing with 27 points on 11 - of - 23 shooting from the field . Ricky_Rubio also had yet another double_double , scoring 14 rebounds and dishing out 13 assists . Overall , it was an efficient game for the Timberwolves , who shot 54 percent from the field , but it ended up just being too little too late .
The Detroit Pistons ( 30 ) defeated the Chicago Bulls ( 2 - 1 ) 98 - 94 in overtime Friday . The Bulls ' Derrick_Rose was actually held scoreless until the fourth quarter , and finished with only 8 points . The Pistons ' Kentavious_Caldwell-Pope was similarly frustrated on offense , totaling only 6 points on 2 - for - 12 shooting . Andre_Drummond notched 20 points and complemented it with 11 rebounds , while Marcus_Morris poured in a game - high 26 points on outstanding 67 percent shooting ( 10 - for - 15 ) from the field . Reggie_Jackson posted his best performance of the young season as well , chipping in 22 points , 7 assists , and 7 boards .
Russell_Westbrook shot just 5 - of - 16 and scored just 14 points , well below his average , but posted a double_double with 11 assists . A more efficient double_double came off the bench , with center Enes_Kanter scoring a team - high 24 points on 10 - of - 12 shooting to go with 10 rebounds . Enes_Kanter played only 21 minutes but still made a significant impact in the scoring column . Forward James_Johnson led the team with 18 points , while guard Tyler_Johnson and forward Willie_Reed scored in double_digit as well .
