The Milwaukee Bucks defeated the Detroit Pistons , 102 - 89 , at BMO_Harris_Bradley_Center on Monday . The second quarter was the decisive stretch , with Milwaukee winning that quarter , 28 - 15 . Shooting was the key , as the Bucks shot 51 percent , while holding the Pistons to just 44 percent . The assist - to - turnover differential was decisive as well , with Milwaukee recording 26 assists to 11 turnovers , while Detroit matched their assists and turnovers at 17 a piece . Andre_Drummond was Detroit 's best player , as he collected 21 points , 12 rebounds and 3 steals . Marcus_Morris led the team in scoring , as he tallied 26 points , 5 rebounds and 3 assists on 10 - of - 17 shooting . Jon_Leuer recorded a 15 - point , 9 - rebound double_double , while going 6 - of - 9 from the field . The Bucks ( 24 - 30 ) have now won 2 - straight , as they hope this is the start of a big run . Greg_Monroe abused his former team , as he led Milwaukee with 25 points , 13 rebounds and 3 steals on 12 - of - 15 shooting off the bench . Michael_Beasley led the starters , as he accrued 23 points , 3 rebounds , 4 assists , and 3 steals on 10 - of - 13 from the field . Tony_Snell finished third on the team with 16 points and 2 rebounds .
The Toronto Raptors defeated the Milwaukee Bucks , 122 - 100 , at Air_Canada_Centre on Monday . However , Monday , it was another sharpshooting guard that helped supplement a team - high 30 points from DeMar_DeRozan , as Terrence_Ross came off the bench to pour in 25 points for Toronto ( 17 - 7 ) . The pair went a combined 17 - of - 28 from the field , leading the Raptors to outstanding 51 and 56 percent success rates from the field and three_point range , respectively . The Bucks ( 11 - 12 ) got their own stellar 30 - point performance from Giannis_Antetokounmpo , who complemented his haul with 9 rebounds , 5 assists and 3 steals . However , only 1 other Bucks player managed to get into double_digit in the scoring column , and that effort came from the bench in the person of Greg_Monroe ( 11 points ) . Tony_Snell ( 8 points ) , John_Henson ( 7 points ) and Matthew_Dellavedova ( 2 points ) considerably underwhelmed on the first unit . DeMarre_Carroll supplied 13 points , 6 rebounds , 2 assists and 1 steal . Jonas_Valanciunas registered an 11 - point , 12 - rebound double_double that also included 1 assist . The Milwaukee Bucks ( 2 - 3 ) defeated the Philadelphia 76ers ( 0 - 4 ) by a score of 91 - 87 on Wednesday at the BMO_Harris_Bradley_Center in Milwaukee Despite being the expected favorite coming in , the Bucks were n't able to get any sort of lead through the first 3 quarters , as time and again , the Sixers held strong . The Sixers eventually had an 85 - 82 lead with 2 and half minutes left in regulation , but the Bucks went on to outscore them 9 - 2 in the final 2 minutes to pull out the 4 - point victory in front of their home crowd . The Bucks were outrebounded 51 - 37 in this one , but forced the Sixers into 18 turnovers , which ended up making the difference . Greg_Monroe finished with 18 points ( 7 - 14 FG , 4 - 5 FT ) , 8 rebounds , and 3 steals over 36 minutes . Giannis_Antetokounmpo chipped in with an efficient 17 points ( 7 - 11 FG , 1 - 1 3PT , 2 - 3 FT ) and 5 rebounds of his own . Jahlil_Okafor recorded 21 points ( 9 - 13 FG , 3 - 3 FT ) , 6 rebounds , and 2 blocked shots , while Nerlens_Noel finished with 17 points ( 8 - 16 FG , 1 - 2 FT ) , 12 rebounds , and 1 blocked shot . Nik_Stauskas was the only other Sixer in double_figures with 14 points , but went a dreadful 3 - of - 14 from behind the three_point line .
Shooting killed the Clippers , as they shot 18 percent from three_point range and 54 percent from the free_throw line . Karl-Anthony_Towns was a presence , as he tallied 37 points , 12 rebounds and 5 assists on 17 - of - 24 shooting . Andrew_Wiggins was n't far behind , totaling 27 points , 4 rebounds and 4 assists . DeAndre_Jordan carried the Clippers , as he dropped a career - high 29 points to go along with 16 rebounds . Austin_Rivers was second on the team , providing 20 points and 2 assists .

The Toronto Raptors defeated the Boston Celtics , 107 - 97 , at Air_Canada_Centre on Friday evening . The tightly - contested affair saw the Celtics ( 37 - 21 ) enter the fourth period holding a slim 77 - 74 lead , but the home team mounted a comeback , outscoring their visitors by a 33 - 20 margin over the final 12 minutes . Isaiah_Thomas once again led Boston , posting 20 points , 5 assists and 3 rebounds . However , he struggled with his shot , going 6 - of - 17 overall from the field , including 3 - of - 10 from behind the arc . Jae_Crowder and Marcus_Smart followed with matching 19 - point efforts , with the former adding 4 rebounds and 1 assist , and the latter supplying 5 rebounds and 4 assists over 32 minutes off the bench . Jaylen_Brown drew another start at shooting guard for Avery_Bradley ( Achilles ) and produced 13 points , 2 assists , 1 steal and 1 block . Al_Horford turned in a modest stat line of 8 points , 5 rebounds , 1 assist and 1 steal . DeMar_DeRozan paced the Raptors with a spectacular career - high 43 - point tally that he supplemented with 5 rebounds and 5 assists , With Lowry out of the lineup , DeMar_DeRozan took 28 shot attempts overall , draining 15 , and also visited the charity stripe a game - high 12 times . Serge_Ibaka was impressive in his debut , supplying 15 points , 7 rebounds , 1 steal and 1 block . Cory_Joseph did a solid job filling in at point guard , amassing 11 points , 6 assists , 1 rebound and 3 steals . Patrick_Patterson led the bench with 11 points , 2 rebounds and 1 assist , while PJ_Tucker , also making his Raptors debut , generated 9 points , 10 boards , 1 assist and a trio of steals .
The Washington Wizards ( 31 - 15 ) defeated the Los_Angeles Lakers ( 12 - 34 ) 98 - 92 on Tuesday at the Staples_Center in Los_Angeles . Coming into halftime , the Lakers had taken a 57 - 46 lead and were playing quite well against a tough opponent . The Wizards were the better shooters in this game , going 49 percent from the field , while the Lakers shot just 43 percent . John_Wall came 1 rebound shy of a triple_double , finishing with 21 points ( 8 - 12 FG , 5 - 12 FT ) , 9 rebounds , 13 assists and 3 steals . Bradley_Beal on the other hand recorded 19 points ( 9 - 18 FG , 1 - 6 3PT ) , 4 rebounds and 2 assists . Marcin_Gortat reached double_figures as well with 11 points ( 5 - 7 FG , 1 - 1 FT ) and 7 rebounds of his own . Wayne_Ellington finished with a game - high of 28 points ( 12 - 20 FG , 3 - 9 3PT , 1 - 1 FT ) , while also adding 3 assists and 3 steals . He recorded a season - high of 18 points ( 8 - 18 FG , 1 - 5 3PT , 1 - 1 FT ) , to go along with 3 rebounds and 3 assists . The only other Laker to reach double_digit points was Ed_Davis , who came off the bench for 14 points ( 6 - 7 FG , 2 - 2 FT ) .
The Utah Jazz defeated the Memphis Grizzlies , 82 - 73 , at Fed_Ex_Forum_Arena on Sunday . The 2 teams were called for a total of 48 personal fouls , with the Grizzlies ( 18 - 11 ) guilty of 28 of those . After combining for just 69 points in the first half , both offenses picked it up in the third period , and the Jazz ( 18 - 10 ) was able to finally separate in the fourth quarter . Gordon_Hayward and Rudy_Gobert led the way for the visitors with 22 and 21 points , respectively , and Utah was able to limit Memphis to 30 percent shooting from the field and a minuscule 9 percent tally from beyond the arc . Gordon_Hayward added 7 rebounds , 6 assists , 3 blocks and 2 steals to his team - high scoring total . Rudy_Gobert turned in a double_double , as he hauled in 12 rebounds in addition to his aforementioned 21 points . He also recorded a trio of blocks and 1 steal . Boris_Diaw checked in with 11 points , 6 rebounds and 3 assists , while Rodney_Hood poured in 10 points and supplemented them with 4 boards and 1 assist . Shelvin_Mack paced the second unit with 10 points , 5 rebounds , 5 assists and 1 steal . The Grizzlies saw Mike_Conley lead the way with 14 points , which he complemented with 4 dimes and 1 steal . JaMychal_Green was second amongst the starters with a 10 points , 11 rebounds , 2 steals and 1 block . Tony_Allen contributed a full stat line of 9 points , 8 boards , 1 assist and 2 steals . Marc_Gasol had a forgettable night from the field , posting only 8 points on 4 - of - 22 shooting . He did add 7 rebounds , 4 assists and 1 steal . Veteran Zach_Randolph continued his strong work off the bench with a 12 - point , 11 - rebound double_double .

The Dallas Mavericks ( 1 - 3 ) defeated the Houston Rockets ( 3 - 1 ) 121 - 109 on Sunday in Dallas in game 4 of their first round matchup for the Western_Conference playoffs . It was the Mavericks who came out hot in the second though , as they out - scored the Rockets by 17 in that quarter to take an 8 - point lead into the break . They got to within 9 points , but the Mavericks were able to seal the deal and keep their playoff hopes alive by avoiding elimination with a win . The Mavericks shot 54 percent from the field and 36 percent from the three_point line , while the Rockets went 47 percent from the floor and just 23 percent from deep . Monta_Ellis has been very effective over the last 2 games of this series , combining for 65 points and 12 assists , while shooting over 60 percent from the field . He was coming off a 15 - point performance in game 3 , so he did n't disappoint with another impressive outing . Dirk_Nowitzki added 16 points ( 7 - 14 FG , 0 - 1 3PT , 2 - 2 FT ) and 8 rebounds as well . He went 7 - for - 14 from the field , but just 1 - for - 7 from the three_point line to score 24 points , while also adding 5 rebounds and 4 assists . He went 8 - for - 10 from the floor and 4 - for - 5 from deep to score 23 points , to go along with 5 rebounds and 3 assists . Corey_Brewer , on the other hand , chipped in with 22 points ( 9 - 15 FG , 1 - 3 3PT , 3 - 4 FT ) and 5 rebounds while playing 32 minutes . The Rockets ' bench out - scored the Mavericks ' bench 49 - 31 , but it was n't enough to give them the win . That included 16 offensive rebounds for the Mavericks , which gave them multiple second chance opportunities .

The Trail_Blazers were the much better shooting team in this one , going 49 percent from the field and 36 percent from the three_point line , while the Timberwolves finished at 38 percent from the floor and just 27 percent from deep . Coming off the bench , CJ_McCollum chipped in with 13 points ( 6 - 12 FG , 1 - 5 3PT ) over 25 minutes . With a ton of injuries causing a depleted roster for the Timberwolves , it turned into the Andrew_Wiggins show , as he finished with a game - high of 29 points ( 9 - 22 FG , 0 - 1 3PT , 11 - 15 FT ) , to go along with 5 rebounds and 4 assists . Zach_LaVine posted 18 points ( 6 - 12 FG , 0 - 1 3PT , 6 - 7 FT ) , 6 assists and 2 steals , while playing 38 minutes . Kevin_Martin also added 17 points ( 5 - 15 FG , 1 - 3 3PT , 6 - 6 FT ) and 3 rebounds . Coming off the bench , Chase_Budinger was the final Timberwolves player to reach double_figures , as he finished with 12 points and 5 steals .
The Houston Rockets ( 24 - 11 ) defeated the Cleveland Cavaliers ( 19 - 17 ) 105 - 93 on Wednesday at Quicken_Loans_Arena in Cleveland . The Rockets were able to out - rebound the Cavaliers 50 - 37 , only furthering their advantage in this one . Trevor_Ariza was able to do it on both sides of the ball , recording 13 points ( 5 - 13 FG , 3 - 10 3PT ) , 6 rebounds and 5 steals . The Rockets did have solid contributions off their bench as well with Josh_Smith scoring 16 points ( 7 - 10 FG , 1 - 2 3PT , 1 - 4 FT ) and Corey_Brewer adding 12 points ( 4 - 8 FG , 2 - 3 3PT , 2 - 2 FT ) . Kyrie_Irving had the biggest contribution , going 15 - for - 26 from the field and 4 - for - 8 from the three_point line to score a game - high of 38 points . Kevin_Love on the other hand notched another double_double , finishing with 17 points ( 7 - 19 FG , 0 - 3 3PT , 3 - 6 FT ) and 16 rebounds . It marked his third double_double in a row , where he 's averaged 25 points and 16 rebounds between those games . The only other Cavalier to reach double_digit points was Tristan_Thompson , who added 11 points ( 2 - 7 FG , 7 - 7 FT ) and 6 rebounds of his own
It was only the third time this season that the Miami Heat were able to capture a win , and currently own a weak 3 - 8 record . The Bucks threw some curveballs at Hassan_Whiteside , but no matchup proved to be too much after posting a final line of 12 points , 17 rebounds , 6 blocks and 2 steals on 5 - of - 12 shooting . Goran_Dragic ( ankle ) contributed a fine game in his return to the starting lineup and added 16 points , 6 rebounds and 4 assists , while Jason Josh_Richardson and Dion_Waiters joined them in double_figures . The bench was led by Tyler_Johnson , who added 8 points and 8 rebounds , to go along with 5 assists on 3 - of - 8 shooting , including 1 three_pointer .
Shooting was key , as Atlanta went 52 percent from the field , while Toronto hit just 40 percent from the field and 16 percent from three_point range . DeMar_DeRozan went just 12 - of - 30 from the field , but he led the team with 28 points , 8 rebounds and 6 assists . Serge_Ibaka totaled 18 points and 3 rebounds . Cory_Joseph started yet again and contributed 15 points , 8 assists and 4 steals . Dennis_Schroder led the way for Atlanta , as he collected 26 points , 6 rebounds and 5 assists . Tim_Hardaway_Jr. started and tallied 20 points , 6 assists and 2 steals . Paul_Millsap provided 21 points , 6 rebounds and 4 assists .
The Atlanta Hawks ( 55 - 17 ) clinched the number 1 seed in the Eastern_Conference with their win over the Miami Heat ( 33 - 39 ) , 99 - 86 . The Hawks recorded 31 assists , led by Dennis_Schroder 's 11 , topping the 31 - assist plateau for the 14th time this season . DeMarre_Carroll led the team with 24 points on 8 - of - 12 shooting in 33 minutes , falling 2 shy of his career high . Kyle_Korver hit 2 three_pointers to tie Mookie Blaylock for third most in Hawks ' single - season history . Paul_Millsap grabbed a team - high 9 rebounds to go along with 21 points , 4 assists , 2 blocks , and 1 steal in 33 minutes . Luol_Deng led the team with 17 points and 11 rebounds , but missed all 4 three_point tries in an effort to record his 500th make from downtown . Goran_Dragic , who admitted back spasms have slowed him down recently , registered 6 points on 3 - of - 11 shooting in 27 minutes
The Utah Jazz defeated the Sacramento Kings , 104 - 84 , at Vivint_Smart_Home_Arena on Saturday . Utah also dominated down low , as they won the rebounding battle , 54 - 34 , and recorded 10 team blocks in the win . The Jazz shot 48 percent from the field and 94 percent from the free_throw line . On the other hand , the Kings shot just 38 percent from the field and 54 percent from the charity stripe . DeMarcus_Cousins did finish the game with 16 points , 10 rebounds and 4 assists , but went just 7 - of - 22 from the field , as he was clearly frustrated by the Jazz defense . Rudy_Gay led the team in scoring , dropping 20 points and 5 rebounds on 7 - of - 15 shooting . Darren_Collison provided 17 points and 2 assists as the starting point guard or the Kings . Omri_Casspi led the bench in scoring , accruing 12 points , 5 rebounds and 2 steals in the defeat . Fortunately , Gordon_Hayward was able to return here from a finger issue , as he led the team with 26 points , 7 rebounds and 3 assists . Rudy_Gobert continued his stellar form , as he contributed 17 points , 15 rebounds and 6 blocks on 5 - of - 6 shooting . Joe_Ingles got another start and provided 11 points , 6 rebounds and 5 assists . Trey_Lyles was the only bench player in double_figures , totaling 14 points and 5 rebounds .
The Cleveland Cavaliers defeated the host Golden_State Warriors , 93 - 89 , in Game 7 on Sunday at Oracle_Arena to win their first NBA championship in franchise history and bring Cleveland it 's first pro sports title since 1952 . The first half was the Draymond_Green show , as the Warriors swiss army knife of a big man was strong in and out of the paint , and was perfect from behind the arc on his way to 32 points . The Warriors rallied behind Draymond_Green , as Stephen_Curry and Thompson were unable to find their stroke , but still entered the half with a 7 point lead . The second half became an intense back - and - forth , evidenced by the 20 lead changes throughout the game , which included 11 times that the game was tied . Kevin_Love was effective under the rim , especially on the rebounding end where he racked up 14 boards . With the game tied at 89 points a piece in the fourth quarter , both the Cavs and Warriors traded failed shot attempts and sloppy transition play with under 5 minutes remaining . LeBron_James finished with 27 points , 11 rebounds and 11 assists , while Kyrie_Irving added 26 points on 10 - of - 23 shooting . The Warriors were led by Draymond_Green , who scored 32 points , grabbed 15 rebounds and dished out 9 assists
The Phoenix Suns ( 15 - 14 ) defeated the Washington Wizards ( 19 - 7 ) 104 - 92 on Sunday . Eric_Bledsoe led the way with 17 points and 9 rebounds in 29 minutes , while the Suns had 6 players finish in double - figures for scoring . Rasual_Butler scored 17 points off the bench , filling his role well , but the Wizards struggled putting the ball in the basket as a team . They shot 41 percent from the field and 21 percent from beyond the arc . Though Washington only committed 11 turnovers , they allowed 20 easy points off the giveaways , putting the game out of reach given their lack of efficiency on offense .

Chris_Paul is now averaging 19 points , 8 assists and 6 rebounds despite only playing 30 minutes per game to start the year . Additionally , after getting off to a rough start of the season , JJ_Redick notched his first 20 - point game of the season , as he hit 3 - of - 4 shots from behind the arc and 6 - of - 9 from the field overall . As a team , the Clippers shot a scorching 52 percent from long range . For the Pistons ( 4 - 3 ) , there was n't much to be excited about , as Andre_Drummond was their leading scorer on the night with just 15 points on top of 12 rebounds . In fact , given how poorly the team played , Detroit 's reserves ended up outscoring their starts 42 - 40 with Jon_Leuer leading the way for the bench mob by recording 14 points and 6 rebounds in 29 minutes
The Lakers tallied success rates of 52 and 50 percent from the floor and three_point range , respectively , and their bench managed 58 points . Nick_Young 's 26 points led Los_Angeles , and Lou_Williams followed with a bench - leading 21 points . Ivica_Zubac managed 15 points , 6 rebounds , 2 assists and 1 block in 21 minutes . Nance and Jordan_Clarkson turned in matching 11 - point efforts off the bench . Giannis_Antetokounmpo registered 41 points , 8 rebounds , 6 assists , 3 blocks and 2 steals to lead the Bucks . Malcolm_Brogdon paced the bench with 18 points . Michael_Beasley turned in 15 , and Thon_Maker turned in 7 points in his first start for Jabari_Parker ( knee )
The Boston Celtics ( 29 - 36 ) snapped the Indiana Pacers ' ( 30 - 35 ) 7 - game winning streak , extending their own streak to 4 wins in the 93 - 89 victory . Wearing their St. Patrick 's Day sleeved jerseys , the Celtics held the Pacers to 40 percent shooting and pulled to within a half game of the 8 seed in the East Even though Evan_Turner was unable to replicate his 30 - point outing from Friday , Tyler_Zeller used his speed against Roy_Hibbert to compile 18 points and 7 rebounds . Avery_Bradley , Brandon_Bass , and Jae_Crowder all added 16 points . The Celtics out - assisted the Pacers , 28 - 16 , and held them to 37 first - half points . The Pacers allowed a team to shoot better than 40 percent for the first time in 8 games . Also , it 's the first time all season they lost when George_Hill led in scoring , registering 30 points , 8 assists , 5 rebounds , 1 steal and 2 three_pointers in 35 minutes . Their bench , which had been instrumental in their recent success , was limited to 30 points .
Golden_State shot 50 percent from the field , buried 11 three_pointers , and recorded 31 assists . Former MVP Kevin_Durant scored 19 points and had a triple_double , grabbing 11 rebounds and dishing 10 assists . All-Star guard Klay_Thompson was the team 's top scorer with 29 points . Reigning MVP Stephen_Curry , meanwhile , had only 14 points and 5 assists , shooting only 5 - of - 12 on the night . Veteran Dirk_Nowitzki shot just 3 - of - 12 and scored only 11 points while playing just 23 minutes . Harrison_Barnes , meanwhile , provided a bright spot , scoring 25 points and coming away with 2 steals .
The Bucks forged a 60 - 43 halftime lead , with 6 players tallying double_digit in the scoring column and respective success rates of 49 percent from the field and 42 percent from three_point range . The Sixers hurt their own cause with an 8 - for - 30 effort from downtown and a subpar 63 percent tally from the free_throw line . Giannis_Antetokounmpo led the way with 24 points , and Tony_Snell followed with 21 . Malcolm_Brogdon and Khris_Middleton offered matching 13 - point efforts . Greg_Monroe paced the bench with 12 points , while Matthew Delladedova turned in 10 . Justin_Anderson 's 19 points off the bench led Philadelphia . Robert_Covington totaled 15 points and Dario_Saric provided a full line of 14 points , 8 rebounds , 6 assists and 2 steals . Richaun_Holmes managed 8 points and 9 rebounds in a start for Jahlil_Okafor ( knee ) .
The Minnesota Timberwolves ( 17 - 37 ) defeated the visiting Toronto Raptors ( 35 - 17 ) 117 - 112 , Wednesday night at Target_Center . The Raptors came in winners of 14 of their last 15 games and started this one off looking like they would improve on that stat , as they were up 68 - 55 going into the half . The Timberwolves however , came out of the locker room on a mission and out - scored Toronto 62 - 44 the rest of the way . Rookie Karl-Anthony_Towns was a monster in this game as he tied DeMar_DeRozan to lead all scorers with 35 points ( 12 - 19 FG , 11 - 13 FT ) , along with 11 rebounds and 3 blocked shots , in 35 minutes . Andrew_Wiggins was huge as well , finishing with 26 points ( 8 - 18 FG , 0 - 2 3PT , 10 - 13 FT ) , 3 rebounds , 2 steals and 1 block , in 37 minutes . Ricky_Rubio was flirting with a triple_double as he finished 19 points ( 5 - 9 FG , 3 - 6 3PT , 6 - 6 FT ) , 8 rebounds and 8 assists , in 37 minutes . Gorgui_Dieng had a big impact with 14 points , 10 rebounds , 6 assists and 2 steals , in 41 minutes . The Timberwolves shot 46 percent from the field and hit 43 - of - 53 free_throws . DeMar_DeRozan tallied 35 points ( 11 - 19 FG , 3 - 3 3PT , 10 - 13 FT ) to match Karl-Anthony_Towns for the game - high , along with 4 assists , 3 rebounds , 0 steal and 1 block , in 37 minutes . Kyle_Lowry struggled from the field as he hit only 4 of his 15 shots . Jonas_Valanciunas was perfect shooting as he chipped in 12 points ( 4 - 4 FG , 4 - 4 FT ) , 7 rebounds , 2 assists , 1 steal and 1 block , in 24 minutes . Toronto only assisted on 19 of its 39 field goals and racked up 34 personal fouls , as the Raptors were unable to hold any type of momentum .
The host Dallas Mavericks defeated the New_Orleans Pelicans , 91 - 81 , at American_Airlines_Center on Sunday . Dallas had 1 of their best defensive games of the season though , holding New_Orleans to just 39 percent from the field and 25 percent from three_point range . The Mavericks shot 42 percent from the field on their end and 37 percent from three_point range . The Mavericks really turned it on late , outscoring New_Orleans , 31 - 21 , in the fourth quarter . Anthony_Davis still finished with a game - high 36 points and 13 rebounds in the defeat . Jrue_Holiday had another nice game off the bench , totaling 17 points , 4 rebounds and 6 assists . Harrison_Barnes led the Mavericks in scoring , tallying 23 points , 7 rebounds and 4 assists . Wesley_Matthews was the only other starter in double_figures , totaling 21 points , 3 rebounds and 3 assists . Justin_Anderson provided 14 points and 8 rebounds off the bench . Andrew_Bogut scored just 5 points on 3 shots , but grabbed 14 rebounds as the starting center .
The Washington Wizards defeated the New_York Knicks , 117 - 101 , at Verizon_Center on Tuesday . The Knicks ( 21 - 29 ) checked in to Tuesday 's game without 2 of their most important pieces , as Derrick_Rose ( ankle ) and Kristaps_Porzingis ( illness ) were unable to take the court . All 5 members of the first unit managed double_digit scoring , and Washington posted a stellar 56 percent success rate from the floor . They were solid on the defensive end as well , limiting the visitors to 37 and 21 percent tallies from the field and three_point range , respectively . New_York was paced by Carmelo_Anthony , who managed 26 points and 5 rebounds in the absence of his aforementioned teammates . Brandon_Jennings supplied 21 points , 5 rebounds , 2 assists and 4 steals . Willy_Hernangomez posted a 15 - point , 14 - rebound double_double that also included 4 assists . Courtney_Lee mustered a modest 5 points on 2 - of - 10 shooting , along with 5 rebounds and 1 assist . Joakim_Noah went scoreless over 15 minutes , contributing just 4 rebounds , 1 assist and 1 steal overall . Kyle_O'Quinn made up for Joakim_Noah 's shortfall with a 13 - point , 10 - rebound double_double that led the second unit . Bradley_Beal set the high - water mark on offense for the Wizards , registering 28 points on 12 - of - 18 shooting . He added 4 assists , 2 rebounds and 1 steal . Markieff_Morris took advantage of Kristaps_Porzingis ' absence to generate a 24 - point , 10 - rebound double_double that also included 2 assists . Marcin_Gortat accomplished the feat as well , posting 15 points , 10 rebounds , 2 assists , 1 steal and 1 block . John_Wall made it a double_double hat trick by going for 15 points , 13 assists and 4 rebounds . Otto_Porter_Jr. filled out the stat sheet with 10 points , 6 rebounds , 3 assists and 1 steal . Kelly_Oubre_Jr. paced the bench with 14 points and a pair of boards .
The Bulls ( 23 - 10 ) held off the Denver Nuggets ( 13 - 20 ) on Thursday by a score of 106 - 101 . The Nuggets saw a seemingly comfortable 12 - point lead in the third quarter evaporate as the Bulls stormed back to take the lead just before the fourth quarter began . Chicago 's Jimmy_Butler shined again as he had a game - high 26 points in the Bulls ' victory over the Nuggets . Wilson_Chandler led the Nuggets in scoring with 22 points in 34 minutes on the floor . He was a perfect 4 - for - 4 from the floor , including 2 - for - 2 from beyond the arc as he scored 10 points in 27 minutes .
Reigning Rookie of the Year Karl-Anthony_Towns led the team with 28 points and 15 rebounds , also recording 2 blocks . Guards Andrew_Wiggins and Zach_LaVine scored 26 and 23 respectively , and Zach_LaVine hit 4 three_pointers on the night . Starting point guard Ricky_Rubio dished out 12 assists and also came away with 2 steals . Eric_Bledsoe scored a team - high 27 points and had 2 steals . Guard Brandon_Knight had 21 points and 4 assists while shooting 8 - of - 13 .
The second and third quarters were especially decisive , as Minnesota outscored Charlotte by 13 in the second quarter , while the Hornets outscored the T'Wolves by 19 in the third . Kemba_Walker added to his career - best numbers , as he accumulated 30 points , 5 rebounds , 6 assists and 5 steals in the win . Frank_Kaminsky was a huge spark off the bench , as he fell just shy of a career - high in points with 20 , while also adding 4 rebounds and 5 assists . Fresh off of a career - high 47 points , Andrew_Wiggins settled for an impressive 29 points here . Karl-Anthony_Towns did finish with 21 points and 8 rebounds , but continues to struggle shooting , as he went 9 - of - 23 from the field .
The Dallas Mavericks ( 14 - 11 ) defeated the Phoenix Suns ( 11 - 15 ) by a score of 104 - 94 , Monday night in Dallas . After a back and forth start , Dallas took the lead with about 2 minutes to go in the first quarter and did not look back . Phoenix put up a fight with a strong 36 point fourth quarter , but Dallas withstood the attack , scoring 27 points of their own , to stay on top . The Suns were playing on the second night of a back - to - back and their shooting percentage indicates that they may have been a bit fatigued , as they shot only 41 percent from the field as a team . Eric_Bledsoe led the way for the Suns , doing it all with 23 points , 7 assists , 5 rebounds , 3 steals and 2 blocks . Unfortunately , he did not have too much help other than from Jon_Leuer , who finished with 15 points and 13 rebounds , as well as 3 assists and 1 steal , in 33 minutes . Brandon_Knight added 12 points on 5 - 11 shooting , 4 rebounds and 3 assists . Dallas really took control when they outscored Phoenix 31 - 15 in the third quarter , stretching their lead to 19 , heading into the fourth . Deron_Williams led the Mavs in scoring with 18 points on 8 - 16 shooting , in 35 minutes . Five other players scored in double_digit for the Mavericks , including Raymond_Felton and Chandler_Parsons , who both finished with 17 points . Dirk_Nowitzki showed well , with 14 points on 5 - 10 shooing , 7 rebounds and 4 assists , in 29 minutes . Wesley_Matthews chipped in 13 points and 5 rebounds , while Devin_Harris added 12 points and a huge 6 steals .

JR_Smith played a team - high 42 minutes and finished with a game - high 27 points ( 11 - 23 FG ) .

The Atlanta Hawks defeated the visiting Houston Rockets 112 - 97 , Saturday night at Philips_Arena . The Hawks ( 4 - 2 ) put together their highest scoring first half of the young season , with 65 points in the first 24 minutes . Through 48 minutes they shot 53 percent from the field and 40 percent from deep , while holding the Rockets to 44 percent from the field . Dwight_Howard was huge against his former team , finishing with 20 points , 15 rebounds , 3 assists , 2 blocks and 1 steal , in 29 minutes . Paul_Millsap added 23 points , 11 rebounds , 5 steals , and 5 assists , in 34 minutes . Kent_Bazemore had his best game so far this season , with 20 points , 4 rebounds , 4 assists and 3 steals , in 32 minutes . The Rockets ( 3 - 3 ) started out well but began to unravel in the second half , where they were out - scored 47 - 38 . They were held to 13 free_throw attempts , which is almost as many as James_Harden is capable of earning on his own on any average night . James_Harden continued his strong point - guard play , with 30 points , 11 assists , 9 rebounds and 3 steals , in 37 minutes . Ryan_Anderson added 12 points , while Clint_Capela another 12 points along with 10 rebounds . The Rockets bench only chipped in 24 points in total , while the team 's 26 turnovers stand - out as a major issue .
The Pacers posted a sub - par 40 percent success rate from the floor and committed 15 turnovers , while the Heat had 3 players eclipse the 20 - point mark and shot 49 percent overall . Hassan_Whiteside and Dion_Waiters co - led Miami with matching 22 - point efforts , with Hassan_Whiteside also bringing in 17 rebounds . Goran_Dragic followed closely behind with 21 points . Jeff_Teague supplied 16 points , and Slam Dunk Contest champ Glenn_Robinson_III paced the second unit with 13 points . Rodney_Stuckey was productive in a reserve role as well , managing 12 points .

The game itself was a thriller and Golden_State needed an extra 5 minutes to pull out an impressive and gutsy performance to stay undefeated on their home court . Draymond_Green finished with 15 points , 13 rebounds and 9 assists on 6 - of - 15 shooting , while Klay_Thompson led Golden_State in scoring with 26 points , although it came on the back of 27 shots . Paul_Millsap led all Atlanta scorers with 19 points , to go along with 7 rebounds and 4 assists , while Al_Horford contributed 17 points , 9 rebounds and 3 assists in the effort . Dennis_Schroder outplayed Jeff_Teague off the bench , scoring 17 points and dishing out 9 assists in 29 minutes .

Dennis_Schroder 's season - high 28 points led the way , while Kent_Bazemore put together a stellar 25 - point tally while often going up against LeBron_James ' typically stingy defense . Dwight_Howard dominated down low with 17 boards , 15 of them on the defensive glass . Atlanta managed a strong 51 percent success rate from the field , helping to key the victory . Kyrie_Irving posted 29 points , which came on a season - high 27 shot attempts . Poor shooting was Cleveland 's undoing , as they posted a 37 percent success rate from the field , and 26 percent on 42 shot attempts from beyond the arc .
Chris_Paul wasted no time before beginning to rack up assists , as he led the team with 12 dimes . Center DeAndre_Jordan , meanwhile , scored an extremely efficient 20 points on 9 - of - 10 shooting from the field to go with 9 rebounds . The Indiana Pacers ( 9 - 5 ) defeated the Washington Wizards ( 6 - 5 ) 123 - 106 on Tuesday . The outstanding offensive effort was spearheaded by the record - breaking performances of Paul_George ( 40 points , 8 rebounds , 4 assists and 2 steals ) and CJ_Miles ( 32 points , 3 rebounds , 3 assists and 1 steal ) , who were a combined 15 - for - 17 from three_point range . In total , the game featured an astounding 32 three_pointers , with the Pacers tallying 19 of those . However , they did receive double_digit scoring efforts from Monta_Ellis ( 10 points , 5 assists , 5 rebounds ) and the returning Paul_George_Hill ( 14 points , 5 assists , 5 rebounds ) . Center Ian_Mahinmi came within 1 rebound of his second double_double of the season , collecting 7 points and hauling in 9 boards . John_Wall , as he has been prone to do occasionally this season , struggled with turnovers , committing a season - high 8 over 31 minutes . He did manage a season - best 3 buckets from beyond the arc on his way to an 18 - point , 4 - rebound , 5 - assist outing . Like his Pacers ' counterpart Ian_Mahinmi , Marcin_Gortat also came 1 rebound short of a double_double performance ( 10 points , 9 boards ) , while Kris_Humphries ( scoreless over 9 minutes ) and Otto_Porter ( 7 points , 3 rebounds , 3 assists ) did very little to help Washington 's cause . Gary_Neal enjoyed a momentous night off the bench , leading the team with 23 points and sinking 5 three_pointers .
Isaiah_Thomas and Avery_Bradley combined for 45 points on 43 shot attempts for the Celtics , a tally that included a 5 - of - 9 effort for Isaiah_Thomas from beyond the arc . Six Boston players managed double_digit scoring overall , while the defense held the Nets to sub - 40 percent success rates from both the field and three_point range . Al_Horford posted a full line of 17 points , 8 assists , 5 boards 2 blocks and 1 steal , while Jae_Crowder managed 15 points . The bench was led by a pair of 10 - point efforts from Kelly_Olynyk and Jonas_Jerebko . Sean_Kilpatrick 's 23 points over 32 minutes off the bench led the Nets . Trevor_Booker 's 18 - point , 12 - rebound double_double paced the first unit . Bojan_Bogdanovic and Brook_Lopez combined for 27 points , Joe_Harris also had 12 points in a reserve role .
Things were not perfect , however , for Nicolas_Batum , who went 0 - for - 6 from beyond the arc . Charlotte struggled from three_point range as a team , knocking down just 3 threes on the night . For Dallas , meanwhile , forward Harrison_Barnes led the way with 29 points and 7 rebounds . Harrison_Barnes shot a respectable 10 - of - 21 from the field and hit 2 - of - 4 from beyond the arc . Point guard Deron_Williams , meanwhile , had an impressive double_double for Dallas , scoring 15 and dishing out 13 assists . However , Deron_Williams shot just 6 - of - 18 in the game .

The Washington Wizards defeated the Los_Angeles Lakers , 116 - 108 , at Verizon_Center on Thursday . The Wizards ( 29 - 20 ) have been a dominant team at home all season , having secured 20 of the 28 victories they 'd come in to Thursday with at Verizon_Center . However , they may have gotten more than they initially bargained for against a feisty Lakers ( 17 - 35 ) squad that battled back from a 58 - 44 halftime deficit . John_Wall ultimately proved too much for the visitors , though , posting a 33 - point , 11 - assist double_double that also included 3 rebounds , 2 steals and 1 block . Los_Angeles was also done in by its inability to take care of the ball , as they committed a whopping 20 turnovers . The Lakers were led by a 20 - point effort off the bench by Jordan_Clarkson , which he complemented with 2 rebounds and 1 assist . D'Angelo_Russell and Luol_Deng posted matching 17 - point tallies , with the former adding 11 assists , 7 rebounds , 1 steals and 1 block , and the latter hauling in 6 boards and posting 1 block . Tarik_Black managed a 13 - point , 11 - rebound double_double that also included 1 assist . Lou_Williams was productive in a reserve role as well , supplying 15 points , 4 assists , 2 rebounds and 0 block . Bradley_Beal complemented John_Wall 's effort with 23 points , 4 assists , 1 rebound , 2 steals and 1 block . Marcin_Gortat submitted a 21 - point , 14 - rebound double_double that also included 3 assists and 2 steal . Markieff_Morris also accomplished the feat , registering 12 points , 10 rebounds , 2 assists , 3 steals and 2 blocks
The Utah Jazz ( 31 - 35 ) picked up a road win over the Sacramento Kings ( 25 - 40 ) Sunday night at Sleep_Train_Arena , 108 - 99 . This 1 was n't as close as the final score suggests , as the Jazz never trailed and held leads of 20 points or more in each of the second , third and fourth quarters . Derrick_Favors dominated the middle for the Jazz as he finished with a team - high 28 points and a game - high 14 rebounds . Gordon_Hayward chipped in 27 points ( 9 - 19 FG , 4 - 9 3PT , 5 - 5 FT ) , 4 rebounds , 3 assists and 1 steal . The Jazz won with hot outside shooting ( 12 - 28 , 43 percent from 3 ) and 11 offensive rebounds , 5 coming from Derrick_Favors . DeMarcus_Cousins scored a game - high 31 ( 10 - 23 FG , 3 - 6 3PT , 8 - 11 FT ) and grabbed 10 rebounds in the losing effort . Omri_Casspi hit all 4 of his three_point attempts to pitch in 20 off the bench , and Darren_Collison scored 14 with 5 assists and 2 steals
The Oklahoma_City Thunder ( 54 - 24 ) demolished the Denver Nuggets ( 32 - 47 ) on their home court on Tuesday , 124 - 102 . Russell_Westbrook finished with 13 points , 14 rebounds , and 12 assists . Defense also played a big role in the defeat , as the Thunder got absolutely everything they wanted , converting on 53 percent of shots from the field . Denver , meanwhile , shot just a paltry 42 percent .
The Golden_State Warriors beat the host Utah Jazz , 106 - 99 , on Thursday . Reigning MVP Stephen_Curry led the team with 26 points , hitting 3 three_pointers and going a perfect 9 - of - 9 on the night . Despite general struggles with rebounding , the Warriors were able to hold a 47 - 46 advantage on the boards in Utah . Golden_State shot an impressive 49 percent from the field on the night while holding Utah to just 41 percent . The Jazz ( 14 - 10 ) were missing 4 of their 5 starters due to injury on Thursday . Star center Rudy_Gobert led the team with a whopping 17 rebounds , and also scored 20 points on 8 - of - 8 shooting . Meanwhile , bench forward Joe_Ingles scored a team - high 21 in 35 minutes .
The Charlotte Hornets ( 41 - 30 ) defeated the Brooklyn Nets ( 19 - 51 ) 105 - 100 on Tuesday . The Nets put up a valiant fight after falling behind 25 - 14 after 1 period , clawing their way back over the middle 2 quarters . They mostly did it on the strength of solid shooting , as they posted 46 and 44 percent success rates for the game from the field and three_point range , respectively . Charlotte was led by Nicolas_Batum , who posted 23 points , 2 rebounds , 2 assists and 1 steal . Frank_Kaminsky III , getting the start in place of Marvin_Williams ( ankle ) , collected 14 points , 7 rebounds , 1 assist and 2 blocks . Kemba_Walker matched Frank_Kaminsky 's point total and added 4 assists , 3 rebounds and 2 steals . Sean_Kilpatrick continued an outstanding second half of the season , leading the Nets bench with 25 points , 2 rebounds , 1 assist and 1 block . Thaddeus_Young had a relatively quiet night by his standards , but did pitch in with 10 points , 8 rebounds and 1 assist .
The Spurs ( 32 - 18 ) took care of the Heat ( 21 - 29 ) 98 - 85 in San_Antonio on Friday night . San_Antonio jumped out to an 11 - point first quarter advantage and led by double_digit for most of the night . Kawhi_Leonard set the pace , scoring 24 points to go with 4 assists , 4 rebounds and 3 steals in 33 minutes . Tony_Parker chipped in 21 points , and Tim_Duncan had a 10 - point , 12 - rebound double_double . The Spurs shot 48 percent as a team and knocked down 11 three_pointers , 5 of which came courtesy of Kawhi_Leonard . Playing without Dwyane_Wade and Hassan_Whiteside , Miami got 17 points and 6 rebounds from Luol_Deng , while Chris_Bosh added 14 points on 7 - of - 18 shooting . Mario_Chalmers and Shabazz_Napier combined for only 11 points ( 4 - 15 FG ) , but rookie Tyler_Johnson had a team - high 18 in 25 minutes off the bench
The Los_Angeles Clippers ( 8 - 5 ) defeated the Charlotte Hornets ( 4 - 11 ) 113 - 92 on Monday at Time_Warner_Cable_Arena in Charlotte . As a team , Los_Angeles was able to shoot 51 percent from the field and 47 percent from the three_point line , compared to Charlotte , who only shot 41 percent from the floor and a meager 10 percent from beyond the arc . The superior shooting , along with out - rebounding the Hornets 43 - 33 , gave the Clippers the advantage and put them on track for the victory . Blake_Griffin came 1 assist shy of a triple_double , as he had a monster line of 22 points , 16 rebounds and 9 assists . Along with Blake_Griffin , Chris_Paul was able to contribute 22 points ( 10 - 16 FG , 2 - 5 3PT ) , while also handing out 15 assists . The 15 assists were a season - high for Chris_Paul , and it marked his seventh double_double of the season . Jamal_Crawford also continued to make his presence known off the bench , as he shot 8 - for - 13 from the field and 5 - for - 8 from the three_point line to score 21 points in 26 minutes . Al_Jefferson was 1 of the leaders for the team , as he finished with 16 points and 9 rebounds . Kemba_Walker had an inefficient 15 points , as he shot only 4 - for - 11 from the field and 0 - for - 4 from the three_point line . He scored the bulk of his points at the free_throw line where he went 7 - for - 8 on the night . He scored a season - high 17 points , but only grabbed 0 rebound in 29 minutes .
The Phoenix Suns ( 13 - 29 ) saw their woes continue on Sunday after being blown out 117 - 87 by the Minnesota Timberwolves ( 13 - 29 ) . One would not have guessed that based on Sunday 's game , however , as the Timberwolves shot 56 percent from the field while out - rebounding the Suns 41 - 30 . The Wolves also had a huge advantage at the free_throw line , knocking down 31 of a whopping 40 free_throw attempts as opposed to the Suns ' paltry 14 for 25 . Minnesota 's pair of first - overall picks shone brightly in just 50 combined minutes , with Andrew_Wiggins delivering 18 points to go with 4 assists and 4 rebounds and Karl-Anthony_Towns going for 14 points , 8 rebounds , and 3 blocks . Phoenix had major issues with ball movement , racking up just 16 assists on the night .
The Atlanta Hawks ( 2 - 19 ) defeated the Philadelphia 76ers ( 15 - 6 ) 95 - 79 on Wednesday . Both teams shot just 42 percent from the field Wednesday , but the Hawks earned several extra possessions by collecting 16 offensive rebounds and beating the Sixers in total rebounds 52 - 39
The Milwaukee Bucks ( 12 - 12 ) defeated the Los_Angeles Clippers ( 16 - 7 ) 111 - 106 on Saturday . The Bucks shot 57 percent from the field and 64 percent from beyond the arc , dissecting the Clippers ' defense quite masterfully . Brandon_Knight scored a team - high 22 points , and the Bucks had 6 players finish in double_figures . Chris_Douglas-Roberts returned from a 17 - game absence with an Achilles injury to play 6 minutes off the bench . Matt_Barnes scored a game - high 26 points , and Chris_Paul turned the ball over 6 times in what was an all - around obtuse game for the Clippers .
The Chicago Bulls defeated the Phoenix Suns in overtime , 128 - 121 , on Friday evening at United_Center . Jimmy_Butler then added a 13 - foot 2 - point er at the 9 - second mark that gave Chicago a momentary 108 - 106 lead . However , Devin_Booker had a chance to seal the win with 1 second on the scoreboard after he was fouled by Dwyane_Wade in three_point range , yet he missed the last of 3 subsequent free_throws to send the contest into overtime knotted at 108 . The Suns ( 18 - 40 ) were led by Devin_Booker , who posted 27 points , 3 rebounds , 2 assists and 2 steals . Eric_Bledsoe , TJ_Warren and Marquese_Chriss followed with a trio of 17 - point efforts . Alex_Len produced a modest 4 points and 7 rebounds as the starting center , but Alan_Williams led the bench with 16 points , 3 boards and 1 assist . Dwyane_Wade 's 23 points paced Chicago , and he added 4 rebounds , 3 assists , 2 steals and 2 blocks . Jimmy_Butler compiled 22 points , 9 assists , 3 rebounds and 4 steals . Robin_Lopez totaled 19 points , 6 boards and 1 block . Nikola_Mirotic led the second unit with 20 points , 8 rebounds and 2 assists over 37 minutes . Denzel_Valentine was productive in a reserve role as well , posting 15 points , 5 rebounds , 5 assists and 3 steals over 34 minutes .
It was a memorable night for Phoenix guard Eric_Bledsoe , who scored a game - high 40 points and recorded a double_double on Sunday . Eric_Bledsoe , who shot 11 - of - 17 and went 14 - of - 14 from the free_throw line , dished out 13 assists and came down with 6 rebounds . Sophomore guard Devin_Booker added more backcourt production , scoring 20 and coming away with 2 steals . On the whole , though , it was a very good shooting night for the Suns , as the team hit over 51 percent of its shots and almost 93 percent from the line . The 1 shot just 11 - of - 34 from the field , including 1 - of - 9 from three_point range from Kyle_Lowry . As a team , the Raptors shot under 40 percent and were out_rebounded 45 - 35 .
The Minnesota Timberwolves ( 11 - 16 ) defeated the Brooklyn Nets ( 7 - 20 ) by a score of 100 - 85 , Sunday afternoon in Brooklyn . The Nets gave up a troublesome 14 turnovers as a team and also struggled to shoot the ball , going 41 percent from the field . Brook_Lopez had a strong game and continued to be the man for his team , as he finished with 20 points and 12 rebounds , along with 5 assists and 2 blocked shots in 40 minutes . Bojan_Bogdanovic chipped in 13 points , 3 rebounds , 2 assists and 2 steals in 37 minutes . Thaddeus_Young put up a solid 12 points and 8 rebounds , in 33 minutes . The Timberwolves were looking confident and shot a strong 48 percent from the field as a team , but struggled from behind the arc , going 3 - 12 . Two players finished with double_doubles for the Wolves , including rookie Karl-Anthony_Towns who finished with an impressive 24 points and 10 rebounds , in 28 minutes . Gorgui_Dieng chipped in 20 points and 10 rebounds , in 36 long minutes off the bench . Ricky_Rubio dished an impressive 15 assists , grabbed 4 steals and also dropped 8 points of his own , in 28 minutes .
The Oklahoma_City Thunder ( 27 - 12 ) defeated the Minnesota Timberwolves ( 12 - 27 ) 101 - 96 on Tuesday night . What killed Minnesota once again were it 's starters , as they amassed just 41 points between the 5 of them . Russell_Westbrook and Kevin_Durant once again carried the load , as they combined for 52 points , 14 rebounds and 14 assists in the win . Enes_Kanter continued his fantastic bench production , as he scored 18 points in less than 20 minutes of action . In any case , most of their youngsters played great here , as Shabazz_Muhammad , Zach_LaVine and Andrew_Wiggins all scored at least 20 points . Zach_LaVine put in the most impressive line , as he accumulated 21 points , 9 rebounds and 4 assists in 1 of his best games of the season .
The Charlotte Hornets ( 14 - 24 ) beat the Toronto Raptors ( 24 - 11 ) in Toronto on Thursday , 103 - 95 . The Hornets started the second half with a 14 - 1 run to gain an 11 - point lead mid way through the third quarter . Marvin_Williams filled in for Cody_Zeller and had a productive night , scoring 13 points ( 5 - 10 FG , 3 - 6 3PT ) to go along with 9 rebounds . Kyle_Lowry led the team in scoring with 24 points , but did so on just 7 - of - 22 shooting from the field .
Cleveland 's Big Three of Kyrie_Irving , LeBron_James and Kevin_Love stepped up their collective game in the wake of the Cavs ' 3 - game losing streak , combining for 86 of the team 's 116 points . LeBron_James led the way with 34 points , Kevin_Love posted a 28 - point , 14 - rebound double_double and Kyrie_Irving supplied a 24 - point tally . The dynamic duo of Kyle_Lowry and DeMar_DeRozan stepped up in their own right , with the latter 's 31 points pacing the Raptors offense . Kyle_Lowry managed a near double_double with 24 points and 9 assists , while Jonas_Valanciunas contributed 10 rebounds . DeMarre_Carroll and Pascal_Siakam totaled a modest 14 points , but Terrence_Ross ' and Patrick_Patterson 's combined 26 points off the bench helped make up for the scoring void .
The Boston Celtics ( 20 - 19 ) held on through a tight fourth quarter to earn a home win over the Indiana Pacers ( 22 - 17 ) Wednesday night at TD_Garden , 103 - 94 . The Celtics scored the game 's final 12 points to foil a Pacers comeback attempt . Isaiah_Thomas scored a game - high 28 points behind a sharp 4 - 6 three_point shooting night , and he added 4 rebounds and 3 assists . Jae_Crowder poured in 25 on a ruthlessly efficient 11 - 15 shooting night as he added 3 three_pointers of his own . Paul_George led the Pacers with 23 points , but he shot a poor 7 - 20 from the floor and turned the ball over 5 times . Ian_Mahinmi mustered a double_double with 10 points and 10 rebounds . The Pacers just could n't overcome their poor shooting , though , as they shot a brutal 5 - 30 from the three_point line ( 17 percent ) , including an 0 - 9 night from CJ_Miles .
The Houston Rockets defeated the Sacramento Kings , 132 - 98 , Wednesday at Toyota_Center . Wednesday ended up being a breeze for Houston against a Kings team without DeMarcus_Cousins ( rest ) and Rudy_Gay ( hip ) , as MVP-candidate James_Harden posted a triple_double of 15 points , 14 assists and 11 rebounds in 30 minutes . Ryan_Anderson scored 22 points of his own , while Sam_Dekker shined off the bench , scoring a career - high 19 points in just 22 minutes . For the Kings ( 9 - 16 ) , things did n't go nearly as smooth without their 2 best players , as the team they put out on the floor could not keep up with the fast - paced Rockets . The Kings struggled shooting from the field , managing to shoot just 42 percent overall , and they only managed to shoot 11 total free_throws on the night
Portland in the first quarter , outscoring them 40 - 18 in the first quarter . The visiting Miami Heat defeated the Denver Nuggets on Wednesday , 106 - 98 . The Heat outscored Denver 31 - 18 in the fourth , ending the game comfortably in the lead . Hassan_Whiteside also blocked 4 shots . Miami saw a huge advantage in turnovers , coughing up the ball only 6 times while forcing 19 turnovers for Denver . Denver ( 7 - 11 ) was held to just 42 percent shooting on the night , crumbling under the pressure of the tough Miami defense . Starter Emmanuel_Mudiay shot just 3 - of - 11 from the field , while forward Danilo_Gallinari went just 6 - of - 16 . Danilo_Gallinari was 1 of 4 Nuggets to tie for the team lead in scoring with 17 points . Another 1 of those 4 , sophomore Nikola_Jokic , had 17 points and 14 rebounds off the bench . Nikola_Jokic helped counter the poor shooting of his teammates by going 7 - of - 11 from the floor .
The Clippers ( 16 - 5 ) knocked off the Pacers ( 7 - 15 ) 103 - 96 on Monday behind 17 points and 15 assists from Chris_Paul . The Clippers jumped out to an 8 - point first - quarter lead and led by as much as 20 in the third quarter before the Pacers crept back into the game in the fourth . The Clippers responded , however , scoring the final 5 points of the game and holding the Pacers scoreless for the last 2 minutes . The Washington Wizards ( 30 - 15 ) defeated the Denver Nuggets ( 18 - 26 ) 117 - 115 on Sunday at the Pepsi_Center in Denver . The Wizards received a surprise performance from Kris_Humphries off the bench , who finished the game with 21 points ( 9 - 13 FG , 3 - 4 FT ) and 14 rebounds . John_Wall notched an impressive double - doube with 19 points ( 8 - 16 FG , 1 - 6 3PT , 2 - 2 FT ) and 16 assists . He continues to average a double_double at 17 points and 10 assists per game . While not doing much else other than scoring , Paul_Pierce made his presence known and added 19 points ( 4 - 9 FG , 1 - 2 3PT , 10 - 14 FT ) . Both Nene and Bradley_Beal reached double_figures as well with 14 points apiece . Ty_Lawson led all scorers with 31 points ( 10 - 20 FG , 3 - 5 3PT , 8 - 8 FT ) , while also adding 12 assists and 3 steals . Wilson_Chandler on the other hand finished with 20 points ( 8 - 19 FG , 4 - 9 3PT ) and 9 rebounds , including a big three_pointer to pull to within 2 points near the end of overtime . He 's now averaging 14 points and 5 rebounds on the year . Jusuf_Nurkic got the start despite dealing with a back injury , but ended up playing only 19 minutes and finished with 6 points ( 2 - 6 FG , 2 - 2 FT ) and 9 rebounds . In 29 minutes off the bench , he finished with 12 points ( 6 - 15 FG , 0 - 2 3PT ) and 1 rebounds .
Jabari_Parker finished with 20 points , 6 rebounds , 3 assists and 2 steals , in 38 minutes , while Giannis_Antetokounmpo led the way with 25 points , 6 rebounds , 5 assists , 1 steal and 1 block , in 32 minutes . The Bucks scored more than 30 points in every quarter except the second , where they were outscored 27 - 21 . Both teams shot over 50 percent from the field , but the Timberwolves bested the Bucks , by hitting 56 percent of their shots . Andrew_Wiggins was the high - point man in the contest with 31 on 10 - of - 18 shooting , to go along with 6 assists , 5 rebounds and 1 steal , in 39 minutes . Karl-Anthony_Towns added 18 points and 16 rebounds , while Zach_LaVine as on fire from long range , where he hit 6 - of - 9 .
The Toronto Raptors rallied back to defeat the visiting Utah Jazz 101 - 93 , at Air_Canada_Centre on Thursday evening . The Jazz started out strong , with a 27 - 18 first quarter , but were outscored in each of the remaining quarters , resulting in their second straight loss . This was the first game back home after a 6 - game road trip for the Raptors ( 24 - 11 ) . Despite shooting only 40 percent from the field , the Raptors scratched and clawed , with 10 steals , 27 points off turnovers and 12 fast break points , to pull off what seemed like an unlikely win . Kyle_Lowry was the high - point man , with 33 , along with 6 rebounds , 5 assists and 3 steals , in 41 minutes . DeMar_DeRozan followed up with 23 points , 7 rebounds , 2 assists , 2 steals and 1 block , in 37 minutes . Jonas_Valanciunas had his best game in a while , as he tallied 18 points and 13 rebounds , in 31 minutes . This marks the second straight loss for the Jazz ( 22 - 15 ) , as they are now 1 - 2 on their current 5 - game road trip . Rudy_Gobert totaled 15 points and 16 rebounds , while Gordon_Hayward added 16 points . The Jazz shot 47 percent from the field and 35 percent from long range , but were outscored at the free_throw line and in the paint .

Troy_Daniels paced the bench with 17 points , 3 rebounds and 1 steal . Jeremy_Lin was the third player in double_figures on the second unit , registering 11 points , 5 rebounds , 3 assists and 1 block .
The Clippers came into this game as a 12 - point favorite and they looked a worthy favorite for the first 45 minutes . From there , it went into 2 overtimes , with the Nets finally prevailing , 127 - 122 . Sean_Kilpatrick was the star , as he finished with a career - high 38 points and 14 rebounds . Brook_Lopez was just as good , as he tallied 27 points , 8 rebounds and 4 assists . Without Blake_Griffin in the lineup , DeAndre_Jordan totaled 21 points and 23 rebounds . Chris_Paul recorded a huge triple_double , accumulating 26 points , 10 rebounds and 13 assists in the defeat . Despite the Clippers leading for the first 45 minutes , there were 8 ties and 7 lead changes in the final 3 minutes of regulation and the 2 overtimes .
The French big man followed up comments to the media about his All-Star snubbing by blocking 4 shots and coming down with 13 rebounds against Los_Angeles . The Dallas Mavericks ( 16 - 6 ) defeated the Milwaukee Bucks ( 11 - 11 ) 125 - 102 on Sunday at the American_Airlines_Center in Dallas . The Mavericks used their superior shooting in this matchup , as they went 58 percent from the field and 39 percent from the three_point line . The Bucks in comparison shot 50 percent from the floor and only 27 percent from beyond the arc . The Mavericks also forced the Bucks into 19 turnovers , which only added to Dallas ' advantage in the 23 - point victory . Chandler_Parsons could n't miss and went 11 - for - 14 from the field and 4 - for - 6 from the three_point line to score a game - high of 28 points . He 's averaged just under 15 points up to this point , so it was a nice surprise for the Mavericks to get the type of production they 've been looking for all season from him . Dirk_Nowitzki shot nearly as well as Chandler_Parsons and finished with 21 points ( 8 - 12 FG , 1 - 4 3PT , 4 - 4 FT ) and 4 rebounds . Monta_Ellis had 19 points ( 7 - 13 FG , 1 - 5 3PT , 4 - 6 FT ) and 4 assists as the third member of the starting lineup to reach double_figures . In only 5 minutes off the bench , Richard_Jefferson was able to go a perfect 4 - 4 from the field and 2 - for - 2 from beyond the arc to score 10 points . Giannis_Antetokounmpo led the team with 18 points ( 8 - 11 FG , 2 - 3 FT ) and 4 rebounds . Brandon_Knight had 16 points of his own , but did most of his damage from the free_throw line where he went a perfect 7 - for - 7 . Rookie Jabari_Parker shot 7 - for - 12 from the field to score 15 points , while also chipping in 5 rebounds . He 's now averaging 12 points and 5 rebounds on the year
They limited Russell_Westbrook to a modest 17 points on 5 - of - 19 shooting and the Thunder to 35 percent shooting overall , including 1 stretch of 24 consecutive missed shots . The Chicago Bulls defeated the Orlando Magic 112 - 80 at United_Center on Monday . The Bulls ' ( 4 - 3 ) second - half defense propelled them toward a blowout win at home over the Magic ( 3 - 4 ) . Evan_Fournier and Aaron_Gordon led the Magic in the second quarter after falling behind early , and they entered the half with a 9 - point deficit . The second half was a different story , however , as the Magic posted just 11 points in the third quarter and 17 points in the final period . While shooting inside the arc went swimmingly for the Bulls , who hit 47 percent of their attempts from the field as a unit , three_point shooting did not go nearly as well . Chicago shot just 16 percent from behind the arc on 3 - of - 19 shooting . Jimmy_Butler led the way for Chicago and finished with 20 points , 7 assists and 5 rebounds , while Dwyane_Wade added 16 points , 4 assists and 3 boards . Aaron_Gordon finished with 15 points for the Magic , to go along with 4 assists and 4 rebounds . The bench was of little help to the starters , as Mario_Hezonja 's 9 points led the reserves . Orlando shot just 39 percent from the field as a team , and the long scoring drought in the third quarter proved to be all the Bulls needed to come away with a win .

He had been out since Nov 7 , but he finished with 8 points , 9 assists and 4 turnovers . Mo_Williams had a double_double off the bench with 10 points and 10 assists . He put up 24 points and 20 rebounds to go along with 2 blocks and 3 steals in 36 minutes . Norris_Cole led the Heat 's bench with 15 points in 26 minutes .

The Toronto Raptors ( 44 - 20 ) took down the Miami Heat ( 38 - 28 ) in overtime Saturday , winning 112 - 104 in a matchup that should have major implications for the Eastern_Conference playoff picture . Guard DeMar_DeRozan had arguably his strongest performance of the season , scoring 38 points while also pulling down 10 rebounds and dishing out 7 assists . Center Jonas_Valanciunas also posted a double_double , scoring 20 and pulling down 10 boards . The Raptors held the Heat to just 38 percent shooting from the field in a strong team defensive performance . Recent acquisition Joe_Johnson led the Heat with 28 points , his highest - scoring performance in a Miami uniform . Forward Luol_Deng also chipped in 20 points , while standout center Hassan_Whiteside posted 13 from the bench .
The Boston Celtics ( 40 - 30 ) defeated the Philadelphia 76ers ( 9 - 61 ) 120 - 105 on Sunday . Even after the Celtics jumped out to a 28 - 16 lead after 1 period , Philadelphia kept coming , and prevailed over the second and third quarters by a combined margin of 63 - 60 . Boston was able to pull away in the final 12 minutes however , and earned the rather hard - fought victory on the strength of solid shooting from all areas of the court . The Celtics managed a 49 percent success rate from the field , and 42 percent from three_point range . They were also strong down low , outrebounding the Sixers by a margin of 53 - 40 . Boston was unsurprisingly led by Isaiah_Thomas , who compiled 26 points , 8 assists , 6 rebounds and 1 steal . Avery_Bradley was strong in support , tallying 20 points , 4 assists , 3 rebounds , 4 steals and 1 block . Amir_Johnson was a pleasant surprise on offense , registering 18 points , 8 rebounds and 2 blocks . Jared_Sullinger and Evan_Turner rounded out a successful night for the starting 5 with a pair of 17 - point efforts . Marcus_Smart paced the bench with 15 points , 5 rebounds , 5 assists and 2 steals . The Sixers were spearheaded by an outstanding effort off the bench by Carl_Landry , who amassed 26 points and 8 rebounds over 25 highly efficient minutes . Ish_Smith followed with 14 points , 8 assists and 3 rebounds . Jerami_Grant scored 11 points , and also hauled in 8 rebounds , dished out 2 assists and recorded 2 blocks . Nik_Stauskas was the second Sixer to tally double_digit scoring off the bench , totaling 12 points , 6 rebounds and 3 assists .
The Milwaukee Bucks ( 14 - 13 ) defeated the Sacramento Kings ( 11 - 15 ) 108 - 107 on Thursday . Jared_Dudley moved back to a bench role but still put up 19 points in 33 minutes . While it was expected that DeMarcus_Cousins ' minutes may be limited , the Kings let him play his usual compliment of 30 - plus minutes , in which time DeMarcus_Cousins put up a game - high 27 points to go with 11 rebounds and 5 assists
The Atlanta Hawks defeated the Denver Nuggets , 117 - 106 , at Philips_Arena on Wednesday . Atlanta 's offense was extremely efficient , as they shot 51 percent from the field and recorded 31 assists . Denver shot just 40 percent from the field and went 13 - of - 21 from the free_throw line . Wilson_Chandler carried the load , as he tallied 24 points , 8 rebounds , 2 assists , and 2 steals . Nikola_Jokic was second on the team in scoring , as he totaled 18 points and 15 rebounds . Will_Barton was a huge spark off the bench , as he provided 17 points , 7 rebounds , 7 assists , 3 steals and 2 blocks . Kenneth_Faried left after 10 minutes , as he suffered an ankle sprain . Dennis_Schroder was the player of the game , as he accumulated 24 points , 5 rebounds , 10 assists and 3 steals . Paul_Millsap was n't far behind , collecting 23 points , 6 rebounds and 5 assists . Dwight_Howard recorded an 11 - point , 13 - rebound double_double . Tim_Hardaway_Jr. and Kent_Bazemore each scored 14 points apiece .
The Memphis Grizzlies defeated the Phoenix Suns , 130 - 112 , at Fed_Ex_Forum_Arena on Tuesday . Memphis turned it on in the second half though , outscoring Phoenix , 75 - 56 . The Grizzlies had their best offensive game of the season , as they shot 56 percent from the field and 48 percent from three_point range . Eric_Bledsoe led the way for Phoenix , as he tallied 20 points , 4 rebounds , 8 assists and 2 steals . TJ_Warren finished second on the team with 17 points and 6 rebounds on 8 - of - 13 shooting . Devin_Booker really struggled , as he could only muster up 9 points , 3 rebounds and 1 assist on 3 - of - 11 shooting in 36 minutes . Mike_Conley led Memphis with 29 points , 3 rebounds and 8 assists . Marc_Gasol was n't far behind , as he collected 28 points , 7 rebounds and 5 assists . Zach_Randolph was huge off the bench , providing 23 points and 8 rebounds on 10 - of - 15 shooting .
The Rockets trailed 25 - 18 after 1 quarter , but outscored their hosts by an 81 - 71 margin the rest of the way . James_Harden paced the visitors with 28 points , 11 assists and 8 rebounds . Clint_Capela contributed a 15 - point , 12 - rebound double_double , while Trevor_Ariza and Ryan_Anderson combined for 24 points , 12 rebounds and 3 assists . Sam_Dekker led the reserves with 12 points , and the Rockets managed to shoot 45 percent from the field . Kentavious_Caldwell-Pope led the way for the Pistons with 26 points . Andre_Drummond and Marcus_Morris followed with a pair of 13 - point efforts , with the former also hauling in 16 boards , 1 assist and 4 steals , and the latter totaling 2 rebounds and 1 block . Despite the loss , the Pistons shot better than 41 percent from both the field and three_point range .
The Oklahoma_City Thunder defeated the host Dallas Mavericks , 131 - 102 , to take a 2 - 1 lead in the Western_Conference first - round playoffs Thursday at American_Airlines_Center . Oklahoma_City shot 58 percent from the field and tied their season high in three_pointers made with 15 . Oklahoma_City owned a 58 - 48 lead at the half and used a 39 - point third quarter to put it away . Kevin_Durant scored a game - high 34 points ( 11 - 25 FG , 3 - 9 3PT , 9 - 11 FG ) and grabbed 7 rebounds . Russell_Westbrook , meanwhile , was ultra - efficient at the point , dishing 15 assists to go with 26 points ( 9 - 16 FG , 2 - 3 3PT , 6 - 9 FT ) . Enes_Kanter added 21 points ( 6 - 7 FG , 8 - 10 FG ) and Dion_Waiters scored 19 ( 7 - 11 FG , 4 - 8 3PT ) to lead a big night for Oklahoma_City 's bench , which outscored Dallas 's reserves 46 - 26 . Wesley_Matthews scored 22 points ( 6 - 13 FG , 3 - 7 3PT , 7 - 10 FT ) to lead the Mavericks . Dirk_Nowitzki added 16 points ( 7 - 12 FG ) and Raymond_Felton followed up his big Game 2 with 18 points ( 8 - 15 FG ) , 4 assists and 4 steals . They finished 6 - 23 ( 26 percent ) from deep and missed 11 free_throws ( 24 - 34 FT ) , sloppiness they could n't afford against Oklahoma_City 's ruthless attack .
The Bucks dug too deep of a hole , as they trailed by 15 points after the first quarter . The starters were the difference in the game , with Boston 's starters outscoring Milwaukee 's starters , 77 - 55 . Isaiah_Thomas was the player of the game , as he dropped a game - high 37 points to go along with 3 rebounds and 8 assists . Jae_Crowder was second on Boston , with 20 points , 6 rebounds and 4 assists . Kelly_Olynyk was huge off their bench , amassing 17 points , 7 rebounds and 3 assists . Giannis_Antetokounmpo led Milwaukee in scoring , as he accumulated 21 points , 7 rebounds and 6 assists . Greg_Monroe was huge off the bench , totaling 14 points , 13 rebounds , 3 blocks ad 3 steals . Michael_Beasley led Milwaukee 's bench in scoring , amassing 17 points and 8 rebounds .
The San_Antonio Spurs ( 28 - 6 ) remain undefeated at home , now 190 , after they dismantled the hurting Phoenix Suns ( 12 - 22 ) , 112 - 79 , on Wednesday . However , the disciplined Spurs made sure to take nothing for granted , as they got up to a 32 - 12 lead by the end of the first quarter . Tyson_Chandler scored 11 points ( 5 - 6 FG ) and pulled down 10 rebounds in 26 minutes off the bench . Brandon_Knight also had 11 points , along with 4 assists , in 27 minutes . TJ_Warren chipped in 11 points ( 5 - 10 FG ) as well . The Suns shot 40 percent from the field as a team . LaMarcus_Aldridge played 29 minutes and led the way in scoring and rebounds for his team , with a double_double consisting of 21 points ( 8 - 12 FG , 5 - 10 FT ) and 12 rebounds . Kawhi_Leonard finished with a cool 19 points ( 6 - 10 FG , 3 - 4 3PT , 4 - 4 FT ) , along with 2 assists and 2 steals , also in 29 minutes . Tony_Parker had a complete game , with 12 points ( 5 - 8 FG ) , 7 assists , 4 steals , 3 rebounds and only 1 turnover , in 23 minutes . The Spurs shot a blistering 57 percent from the field , including 6 - 14 from beyond the arc .
The Houston Rockets ( 10 ) defeated the Los_Angeles Lakers ( 0 - 1 ) 108 - 90 at the Staples_Center on Tuesday in Los_Angeles . In his Rockets ' regular season debut , Trevor_Ariza got hot from behind the arc , shooting 5 - for - 8 on three_pointers and ending with 16 points to go along with 3 rebounds and 2 assists . The Indiana Pacers defeated the Los_Angeles Clippers at Staples_Center 111 - 102 on Sunday . The Pacers ( 10 - 10 ) spread the ball effectively and saw all 5 starters finish in double_figures on their way to picking up wins in 3 of their last 4 contests . The Detroit Pistons ( 18 - 15 ) rolled over the Minnesota Timberwolves ( 12 - 21 ) 115 - 90 on Thursday night . The Timberwolves started off the game up by 7 points after the first quarter , but it was all downhill after that . In fact , the Pistons outscored the Wolves 100 - 68 over the final 36 minutes . Karl-Anthony_Towns was their best player , as he tallied 23 points and 9 rebounds in the loss . Most notably , Andre_Drummond brought down another 18 rebounds to compliment his 23 points . The Milwaukee Bucks defeated the New_York Knicks , 105 - 104 , at Madison_Square_Garden on Wednesday . New_York led the Bucks ( 18 - 16 ) by a comfortable 87 - 73 margin , but a surging Milwaukee squad was n't done by any stretch . They ultimately outscored their hosts by a 32 - 17 spread in the final 12 minutes , capping off a momentous comeback with a 15 - foot bucket from Giannis_Antetokounmpo as time expired to seal the somewhat improbable road win . Giannis_Antetokounmpo led the Bucks with 27 points , 13 rebounds , 4 assists , 1 steal and 3 blocks , his second consecutive double_double . Greg_Monroe actually checked in as the second - leading scorer and did so in his customary bench role , posting 18 points , along with 9 boards , 4 assists , 3 steals and 1 block . Jabari_Parker contributed 15 points , 4 rebounds , 3 assists and 1 steal . Malcolm_Brogdon went for 12 points , 8 assists and 6 rebounds . Mirza_Teletovic was productive in a reserve role as well , generating 13 points and 1 rebound . Carmelo_Anthony totaled a game - high 30 points to lead the Knicks , a total he supplemented with 11 rebounds , 7 assists and 2 steals . Derrick_Rose was a distant second with 15 points , 4 assists , 3 rebounds and 1 steal . Courtney_Lee checked in with 11 points , 3 assists , 2 rebounds , 1 steal and 1 block . Joakim_Noah mustered a modest 8 points but did haul in 16 boards , while Mindaugas_Kuzminskas paced the second unit with 15 points , 4 rebounds , 1 assist , 2 steals and 1 block .

Dwyane_Wade was once again spectacular for the Heat in the victory , scoring 32 points on 13 - of - 26 shooting , 15 points of which came in the fourth quarter , to go along with 6 assists and 4 rebounds in 39 minutes . The All-Star has scored 32 points in back to back games and is averaging 30 points in his last 6 outings . On the other side , the Warriors saw Stephen_Curry uncharacteristically fail to make a three_point shot , as he finished 0 - of - 8 from behind the arc and just 7 - of - 16 from the field . On the other side , it was Anthony_Davis who led the way for the Pelicans , with a game - high 36 points on 14 - of - 23 shooting , to go along with 14 rebounds , 3 blocks , 2 assists and 1 steal , in 39 minutes

Michael Malcolm_Brogdon was a lone bright spot for Milwaukee , as he led the team with 18 points , 4 rebounds and 3 assists . Greg_Monroe led the bench , as he totaled 12 points and 7 rebounds . Stephen_Curry was the player of the game , as he accumulated 28 points , 4 rebounds , 4 assists and 3 steals . Klay_Thompson finished second on the team in scoring , dropping 21 points . Draymond_Green flirted with a triple_double , as he collected 8 points , 7 rebounds and 10 assists .
Coming into this game the Los_Angeles Clippers ( 5 - 4 ) had won 8 straight versus the Phoenix Suns ( 4 - 4 ) but fell short Thursday night by a score of 118 - 104 . Blake_Griffin played only 16 minutes and came up with 11 points , along with 3 rebounds and 4 assists . DeAndre_Jordan was relatively quiet with only 11 points and 9 rebounds . Jamal_Crawford did his best to fill the offensive void by chipping in a team high 18 points on 7 - 14 shooting , while also nabbing 3 steals . Wesley_Johnson played 24 minutes off the bench and continued his good start to the season with 14 points , including 3 - 6 shooting from deep . Brandon_Knight had a stellar game for the Suns , scoring 37 points on 14 - 22 shooting , including going 6 - 10 from deep . He also dished 4 assists . Meanwhile , Eric_Bledsoe once again came very close to a triple_double with 26 points , 10 rebounds and 9 assists and has been looking great so far this season . The only other players to score double_digit for the Suns were Jon_Leuer who had 10 points and 11 rebounds , and TJ_Warren who scored 18 points on 7 - 10 shooting . The Suns as a team shot a strong 53 percent and did a good job on the defensive glass , not allowing the Clippers any second chances in this game .
The Charlotte Hornets ( 23 - 25 ) defeated the Los_Angeles Lakers ( 9 - 41 ) 101 - 82 at Staples_Center on Sunday . Kobe_Bryant played to the delight of the hometown crowd , and provided 1 of his better performances of the season , as he finished with 23 points , 8 rebounds and 3 assists on 8 - of - 18 shooting in 23 minutes . D'Angelo_Russell contributed 10 points , 6 rebounds and 1 assist off the bench . Julius_Randle strung together another double_double with 10 points and 11 rebounds , while his frontcourt partner , Roy_Hibbert , finished with 0 points and 2 boards in a weak showing from the veteran . Nobody else on the Hornets was nearly as polarizing as the 2 forwards , but a bright spot came from rookie Frank_Kaminsky , who finished with 11 points in 23 minutes off the bench .
The Boston Celtics ( 44 - 32 ) shocked the Golden_State Warriors ( 68 - 8 ) in a 109 - 106 win on Friday . The key for Boston was its defense , as it held the Warriors to 46 percent shooting and forced 22 turnovers . The Celtics shot 47 percent from the field , despite hitting only 63 percent of their free_throws . Evan_Turner filled in for Jae_Crowder and tallied 21 points , 5 rebounds , 5 assists and 3 steals in a great performance . Isaiah_Thomas led the team with 22 points , while also dishing out 6 assists , Jared_Sullinger was huge down low , as he amassed 21 points and 12 rebounds . In fact , Stephen_Curry had just 7 points in the other 3 quarters and committed 9 turnovers in the defeat . Draymond_Green had another great all - around game though , as he accumulated 16 points , 9 rebounds , 7 assists and 6 steals .
The Atlanta Hawks went on the road and defeated the Indiana Pacers 96 - 85 at Bankers_Life_Fieldhouse on Wednesday . His partner in the frontcourt , Paul_Millsap , had a double_double of his own Wednesday night , posting 18 points and 11 rebounds , his fifth double_double of the season . In the end , the game was won on the boards for Atlanta , as they out_rebounded the Pacers ( 7 - 9 ) by 19 , 56 - 37 . Paul_George put together a solid performance , recording 18 points and 6 rebounds , but shot a poor 6 - of - 22 from the field and 2 - of - 11 from behind the arc . Myles_Turner could n't get anything going on the offensive end , posting just 7 points on top of 9 rebounds in his return . It was Thaddeus_Young who ended up leading the way for the Pacers , posting a game - high 24 points on 10 - of - 13 shooting and 7 rebounds in 41 minutes .
The Sacramento Kings won their first game at the Golden_One_Center , defeating the Minnesota Timberwolves , 106 - 103 , on Saturday . In a game where there was a 29 - point swing , the Kings were able to pull out a big comeback . After trailing by 19 at times in the first half , Sacramento prevailed thanks to a 31 - 12 third quarter . Despite shooting 51 percent from the field , Minnesota had 13 less shots than the Kings and struggled getting the 50/50 balls they needed . Andrew_Wiggins scored a season - high 29 points in the defeat , going 10 - for - 20 from the field . He did struggle to do much else though , as he recorded just 1 rebound and 1 block aside from his 29 points . Zach_LaVine was second on the team , dropping 21 points and grabbing 5 boards . Gorgui_Dieng double_doubled in the loss , totaling 14 points and 13 rebounds , dealing with foul trouble in the second half . DeMarcus_Cousins and Rudy_Gay continue to carry the Kings , as they combined for 57 of the teams 106 points in Saturday 's win . DeMarcus_Cousins led the team , tallying 29 points , 7 rebounds and 4 assists before fouling out in the final minutes . Rudy_Gay finished with 28 points , adding 4 rebounds , and 2 blocks . Matt_Barnes was a huge spark , adding 9 assists and 5 rebounds to his 12 points .

There were some eye - popping stats here , as the Nuggets outrebounded the Rockets 52 - 26 in the victory . Denver also shot 51 percent from the field to Houston 's 47 percent . Gary_Harris also scored a career - high 21 points and continues to grow while playing elite defense night in and night out .

Al_Horford continues to break through the rust coming off of missing most of last season following suregery to repair a torn pectoral , and he showed off his passing skills Monday , putting up 21 points , 10 rebounds and 6 assists . Atlanta shot just 43 percent from the field , but to overcome that , they limited the Bulls to an even worse 38 percent shooting from the field . His fill - in Taj_Gibson recorded a double_double , scoring 15 points and pulling down 17 rebounds . Jimmy_Butler scored a game - high 22 points , but the Bulls simply could n't get the ball in the peach basket consistently Monday .
