The Golden_State Warriors ( 38 - 8 ) defeated the Sacramento Kings ( 17 - 30 ) 121 - 96 on Tuesday at Sleep_Train_Arena in Sacramento . The Warriors got off to a very quick start in this game , out_scoring the Kings 63 - 42 in the first half alone . With such a big lead , they were able to coast through the second half and secure the 25 - point victory . The Warriors were impressive as a team shooting the ball , going 51 percent from the field , while the Kings went just 44 percent . The Warriors also out_rebounded them 49 - 34 , even furthering their advantage . Stephen_Curry finished with 23 points ( 6 - 15 FG , 2 - 6 3PT , 9 - 10 FT ) , 9 assists and 3 steals , while Thompson had 14 points ( 6 - 12 FG , 2 - 6 3PT ) and 1 assist . With such a large lead , none of the Warriors ' starters played over 30 minutes . Andre_Iguodala was very successful , going 6 - for - 8 from the field and 2 - for - 3 from the three_point line to score 17 points in 24 minutes . Marreese_Speights added 17 points ( 8 - 13 FG , 1 - 2 FT ) of his own , to go along with 8 rebounds and 3 assists . In 42 minutes , he finished with a game - high of 26 points ( 10 - 21 FG , 6 - 7 FT ) , while also posting 11 rebounds , 4 assists , 3 steals and 4 blocked shots . Rudy_Gay also had a strong showing , scoring 20 points ( 7 - 15 FG , 2 - 5 3PT , 4 - 5 FT ) and grabbing 3 rebounds in 37 minutes . Darren_Collison had 18 points ( 8 - 15 FG , 1 - 4 3PT , 1 - 1 FT ) and 7 assists , while Ben_McLemore posted 18 points ( 6 - 9 FG , 4 - 5 3PT , 2 - 2 FT ) and 3 steals . The Kings bench contributed only 12 points compared to 61 from the Warriors .

The Lakers hit 17 three_pointers , a season high , but the Grizzlies set a season high in threes of their own with 13 and shot a brilliant 56 percent as they managed withstand Los_Angeles 's surprising offensive attack . Matt_Barnes hit 5 three_pointers as he scored a team - high 25 points ( 9 - 14 FG ) for the Grizzlies . Mike_Conley scored 24 ( 10 - 14 FG , 2 - 4 3PT ) and added 8 assists , and PJ_Hairston got into the three_point action , nailing 4 of his 7 attempts as he scored 17 points . All 5 Grizzlies starters finished in double_figures , as did Brandan_Wright , who scored 15 on 7 - 10 shooting off the bench . Jordan_Clarkson led all scorers with 28 as he shot 10 - 18 from the floor and a brilliant 6 - 11 from three_point range . D'Angelo_Russell scored 22 ( 8 - 19 FG , 3 - 9 3PT ) and added 8 assists and 4 rebounds and Lou_Williams added 22 points in 23 minutes off the bench . But the Lakers starting frontcourt of Kobe_Bryant , Julius_Randle and Roy_Hibbert combined to score just 25 points against 51 for Memphis 's starting front court of Matt_Barnes , Jeff JaMychal_Green and Zach_Randolph .
Goran_Dragic 's 22 points led the Heat , while Hassan_Whiteside 's 18 - point , 18 - rebound double_double played a pivotal role in Miami 's 48 - 38 rebounding advantage . Dion_Waiters and Josh_Richardson combined for 31 points on the wings , while Derrick_Williams compiled 12 points over just 17 minutes in a start at power forward . James_Johnson was nearly as efficient off the bench , supplying 17 points over 27 minutes . Overall , the Heat impressively posted 51 and 48 percent success rates from the field and three_point range , respectively . John_Wall and Bradley_Beal paced the Wizards with a pair of 34 - point efforts , and the former notably drained 5 of his 6 shot attempts from beyond the arc . Marcin_Gortat was the only other player to manage double_digit in the scoring column , totaling 10 points , 16 rebounds , 4 assists and 5 blocks .

In fact , the Spurs shot 52 percent from the field , 91 percent from the free_throw line and 50 percent from three_point range . The ball movement was superb as well , with San_Antonio recording 35 assists on 45 made baskets . CJ_McCollum led the team with 26 points , with Damian_Lillard scoring 23 of his own . Mason_Plumlee had a nice all - around game , as he totaled 12 points , 8 rebounds and 5 assists in the defeat . LaMarcus_Aldridge and Kawhi_Leonard tied the team - lead with 22 points in the win . Tony_Parker may have had his best game of the season , as he scored 18 points , while dishing out a season - high 16 assists .
The Portland Trail_Blazers ( 37 - 35 ) defeated the Dallas Mavericks ( 36 - 35 ) 109 - 103 on Wednesday . Portland did a much more effective job Wednesday , holding the Mavs power forward to 21 points , 9 rebounds , 3 assists and 1 block . Wesley_Matthews did have 1 of his more effective nights of the season against his former teammates while posting 22 points , but Damian_Lillard and the rest of the Trail_Blazers starting 5 proved too much for the visitors . Wesley_Matthews ' scoring total did pace Dallas , and he added 5 rebounds , 1 assist , 2 steals and 1 block . Deron_Williams followed with his own double_double , managing 12 points , 11 assists , 3 rebounds and 1 steal . JJ_Barea paced the reserves with 14 points , 5 assists , 2 rebounds and 1 steal . Devin_Harris was also effective off the bench , totaling 11 points , 4 rebounds and 2 steals . Damian_Lillard 's game - high 27 points spearheaded the Portland attack , and he complemented it with 6 rebounds , 6 assists , 2 blocks and 1 steal . He did commit 7 turnovers , the only blemish on his otherwise stellar performance . CJ_McCollum and Maurice_Harkless followed with a pair of 14 - point efforts . CJ_McCollum also dished out 4 assists and hauled in 1 rebound , while Maurice_Harkless posted 4 rebounds , 2 assists , 1 steal and 1 block . Miles Mason_Plumlee pitched in with 10 points , 8 boards , 1 assist , 3 steals and 2 blocks . Al-Farouq_Aminu rounded out a successful night for the starting 5 with 10 points , 11 rebounds , 1 assist , 2 steals and 2 blocks .
The Warriors turned a slim 7 - point lead at halftime into a robust 29 - point edge by the end of the third quarter , as they outscored the Celtics by a 31 - 9 margin during the period . They shot 49 percent from the field overall while holding Boston to a 37 percent figure . Klay_Thompson 's 28 points led the way , while Kevin_Durant was close behind with a 23 - point , 10 - rebound double_double . Isaiah_Thomas and Avery_Bradley combined for 35 points , while Marcus_Smart was forced from the game with a left ankle contusion after 25 minutes and a 10 - point scoring total . Jaylen_Brown and Terry_Rozier stepped up to lead the reserves with a pair of 11 - point efforts .
The New_York Knicks defeated the Orlando Magic , 113 - 105 , at Amway_Center on Monday evening . The Knicks ( 26 - 38 ) had announced earlier in the day that Carmelo_Anthony would sit out the second game of the back - to - back set with knee soreness , which created a domino effect that saw rookie Ron_Baker enter the starting 5 . The Knicks made a comeback after the Magic ( 23 - 41 ) had built a 28 - 20 lead after 1 quarter , and did it once more in the fourth in overcoming a 92 - 85 deficit to pull away for the 8 - point victory . Courtney_Lee led the way with 20 points , 3 rebounds , 2 assists and 1 steal . Lance_Thomas continued his strong play with 17 points , 4 boards , 2 steals and 1 assist . Jeff_Green paced the bench with 15 points , 1 rebound and 1 block .
The San_Antonio Spurs remained undefeated in their 106 - 99 win over the host Miami Heat on Sunday at American_Airlines_Center . San_Antonio ( 40 ) dominated the shooting , as it hit 56 percent of its three_pointers and 85 percent of its free_throws . Miami ( 1 - 2 ) did dominate down low , though , outscoring the Spurs 46 - 32 in the paint . Kawhi_Leonard was the star for the Spurs once again , tallying 27 points and 6 assists . The reigning 2 - time Defensive_Player_of_the_Year scored the final 10 points for the Spurs and accumulated 16 of his 27 points in the fourth quarter . Pau_Gasol was the only other starter in double_figures , totaling 20 points and 11 rebounds in his first double_double of the year . Patty_Mills did provide 18 points off the bench but failed to record any other fantasy - relevant stats in 25 minutes of action . Hassan_Whiteside carried the load for the Heat , contributing 27 points , 15 rebounds and 4 blocks in the loss . Goran_Dragic was second - highest scorer , adding 25 points of his own , while adding 5 assists and 3 boards . Justise_Winslow had a nice game , as well , totaling 18 points and 5 rebounds . Tyler_Johnson was the only bench player to score more than 2 points , as he chipped in 12 in 30 minutes of play .

The Wizards got off to an extremely quick start , shooting 71 percent from the field and 60 percent from the three_point line in the first quarter to secure a 14 - point lead . He could 've put up some much higher numbers , but he was limited to just 25 minutes due to the huge lead the Wizards had early on in the game . DeMar_DeRozan finished with 14 points ( 6 - 13 FG , 2 - 2 FT ) , 4 assists and 3 steals , while Lou_Williams chipped in with 14 points ( 4 - 11 FG , 2 - 6 3PT , 4 - 6 FT ) and 1 rebound . The Pistons opened up the game strong , starting on a 12 - 2 run in the first 6 minutes and winning the first quarter 30 - 10 . Jodie_Meeks led the way scoring for Detroit , posting a game - high 24 points on 8 - of - 12 shooting in 27 minutes off the bench . Andre_Drummond posted a monster double_double in the winning effort of 15 points ( 7 - 12 FG ) and 19 rebounds in 32 minutes , while Greg_Monroe came up 1 rebound shy of a double_double of his own , posting 17 points ( 4 - 10 FG . Reggie_Jackson struggled shooting the ball , going just 1 - of - 7 from the field and scoring 5 points , but he was still able to dish out 13 assists in 30 minutes . The Pistons recorded an efficient 33 assists on 41 made field goals to just 14 turnovers and outrebounded the Hornets 56 - 33 . Four players scored in double_figures , with Noah_Vonleh leading the way in 1 of his best performances of the season , scoring 16 points ( 6 - 11 FG ) and 12 rebounds in 29 minutes off the bench . Gerald Hendersen was not far behind , scoring 14 points on 6 - of - 16 shooting in 25 minutes , while Brian_Roberts ( 11 ) and Jeff_Taylor ( 10 ) round out the 4 Hornets who scored in double_figures . Kemba_Walker had a very poor shooting performance , going just 2 - of - 11 from the field and recording 7 points and 7 assists in 31 minutes .

The visiting Golden_State Warriors defeated the Toronto Raptors , 127 - 121 , on Wednesday at Air_Canada_Centre . Both teams got off to a scorching hot start , scoring a combined 72 points in the first quarter , with the Raptors ( 7 - 4 ) taking an early 4 - point lead . But then , the Warriors ( 9 - 2 ) decided to take it to another level in the second period , dismantling Toronto in a second quarter that ended with Golden_State taking a 66 - 53 lead into halftime , a lead that they would not give up from that point on . Despite a late push from the Raptors in the closing moments of the game , the Warriors , led by 35 points from Stephen_Curry and 30 from Kevin_Durant , ended up being far too much to handle . Klay_Thompson had a rough night shooting , going just 4 - of - 15 from the field en route to 15 points . For the Raptors , DeMar_DeRozan maintained his spot as the top scorer in the league with 34 points on top of 5 rebounds and 6 assists . Kyle_Lowry added 24 points of his own , to go along with 5 rebounds and 5 assists , but the effort from Toronto 's 2 All-Stars was simply not enough in the end . The loss came despite the Raptors managing to get to the line 41 times and making a grand total of 37 free_throws .

The Atlanta Hawks ( 28 - 22 ) defeated the Dallas Mavericks ( 28 - 23 ) 112 - 97 on Monday . Monday 's matchup against a Mavericks defense that had struggled against point guards this season proved to be the final domino to fall in Jeff_Teague 's resurgence , as he managed a season - high 32 points , and complemented them with 8 assists , 5 rebounds and 1 steal over 28 highly efficient minutes . Having totaled a modest 12 points in the first half as Atlanta built a 53 - 46 lead , Jeff_Teague tallied 13 points in the third quarter alone , helping the home team emerge from the period with a commanding 86 - 73 lead they would n't surrender . He managed 19 points , 11 rebounds and 2 assists for his second double_double in the last 3 games . Zaza_Pachulia could only pitch in 4 points , but did haul in 13 boards . Deron_Williams notably was held scoreless over 10 minutes in his return from a calf injury before exiting the game early , although JJ_Barea was able to fill out the stat sheet with 9 points , 6 assists , 2 rebounds and 1 steal while once again logging a solid allotment of minutes ( 28 ) . The San_Antonio Spurs defeated the Houston Rockets , 114 - 75 , at Toyota_Center on Thursday evening in Game 6 of the Western_Conference semifinals . The Rockets ' ( 2 - 4 ) prospects were looking up prior to the game , as they were set to play in front of their vocal home crowd and would n't have to worry about dealing with All-Star forward Kawhi_Leonard , who was announced as out with the ankle injury he 'd suffered late in Game 5 . The Spurs ' ( 4 - 2 ) seamless adjustment to life without their team leader and Houston 's absolutely flat performance thus were the surprises of the night , as San_Antonio dominated the first half and never looked back . The game seemed to spiral out of control for the home squad in the second quarter , when they were outscored by a 30 - 18 margin . LaMarcus_Aldridge ensured that there would n't be a need for a Game 7 by posting a 34 - point , 12 - rebound double_double that also included 1 assist and 1 steal , while the remaining 4 members of the makeshift starting 5 also contributed double_digit scoring . The Spurs finished the night with an excellent 53 percent success rate from the field while styming the Rockets to the tune of a 29 percent figure . Jonathon_Simmons drew the start for Leonard and continued his string of solid postseason play with 18 points , 4 assists and 1 steal . Patty_Mills chipped in with 14 points , 7 assists , 3 rebounds and 1 steal . Danny_Green and Pau_Gasol provided matching 10 - point efforts , with the former adding 6 rebounds , 2 assists , 2 steals and 2 blocks and the latter supplying 11 boards , 5 assists and 3 blocks . Second-year man Dejounte_Murray was excellent off the bench , posting an 11 - point , 10 - rebound double_double that also included 5 assists , 2 steals and 1 block . Trevor_Ariza paced the Rockets with 20 points , 5 rebounds , 1 assist and 1 steal . Clint_Capela tallied a 15 - point , 12 - rebound double_double that also featured 2 steals and 1 block . James_Harden turned in a vastly underwhelming performance , particularly in a game with such high stakes , registering only 10 points on 2 - for - 11 shooting and complementing them with 7 assists , 3 rebounds , 1 steal and 1 block . He fouled out after 37 minutes . Patrick_Beverley totaled 7 points , 4 rebounds and 4 assists . Eric_Gordon drew the start and managed 6 points , 1 rebound , 1 assist and 1 steal .

The Cleveland Cavaliers defeated the Washington Wizards , 130 - 122 , at Capital One Arena on Friday night . He was in vintage form against a Washington team that had been vulnerable to small forwards in the early going , posting 57 points , 11 rebounds , 7 assists , 3 steals and 2 blocks over 43 minutes . He played an integral part of a jaw - dropping 74 - point first half for the Cavaliers , who nevertheless allowed the Wizards ( 4 - 4 ) 66 points during the first 2 periods as well . As the final score implied , both teams shot superbly throughout the contest , with the visitors compiling a 56 percent success rate from the field and the home squad countering by draining 54 percent of their attempts . Derrick_Rose checked in as a distant second to LeBron_James with 20 points , 2 assists and 1 rebound . Jae_Crowder drew the start and posted 17 points , 7 rebounds , 1 assist and 2 steals . Kevin_Love managed 11 points , 8 rebounds and 1 steal . JR_Smith had a small role in the offense once again , mustering only three_points , 1 assist and 1 steal despite playing 30 minutes . Kyle_Korver led the bench with 8 points . Bradley_Beal led Washington 's offensive barrage with 36 points , a total he supplemented with 4 rebounds , 4 assists and 1 steal . Kelly_Oubre_Jr. headed back to the bench with Markieff_Morris ( abdomen ) making his season debut and supplied 21 points , 6 rebounds , 2 assists and 1 steal . Marcin_Gortat and Otto_Porter_Jr. registered matching 15 - point tallies , with the former adding 5 rebounds , 1 steal and 1 block and the latter providing 5 boards as well . John_Wall posted a modest 13 points on 4 - for - 13 shooting , but he dished out 15 assists , hauled in 6 rebounds and recorded both 1 steal and 1 block . Markieff_Morris generated 2 points , 4 rebounds and 3 assists while seeing just 14 minutes in his first game of the season . Mike_Scott was productive on the second unit as well , totaling 12 points and 3 rebounds .
The Miami Heat defeated the Los_Angeles Clippers , 104 - 101 , at Staples_Center on Sunday afternoon . Miami forged a 34 - 20 lead by the end of the first quarter and took an 89 - 66 advantage into the fourth period . Hassan_Whiteside led the way for the Heat with a 21 - point , 17 - rebound double_double that also included 1 assist , 3 steals and 2 blocks . Tyler_Johnson followed with a bench - leading 19 points , which he supplemented with 3 assists , 2 rebounds and 3 steals . Wayne_Ellington tallied 17 points , 2 assists , 1 rebound and 1 block . Johnson and Josh_Richardson generated matching 14 - point efforts , with the former adding 4 assists , 2 rebounds and 0 block and the latter supplying 4 assists , 2 rebounds and 3 steals . Goran_Dragic managed 12 points , 6 assists , 4 rebounds and 1 steal . Blake_Griffin led the way for the Clippers with 23 points , 8 rebounds , 4 assists and 2 steals . Lou_Williams followed with a bench - leading 22 points , which he supplemented with 2 boards and 2 assists . Austin_Rivers registered 12 points , 3 assists , 2 rebounds , 4 steals and 1 block . Willie_Reed was productive on the second unit against his old squad , totaling 10 points , 4 rebounds and 1 steal . DeAndre_Jordan matched Willie_Reed 's point total and also hauled in 19 rebounds , dished out 3 assists and recorded 1 block .
The host Portland Trail_Blazers took down the Oklahoma_City Thunder , 103 - 99 , in a thriller at Moda_Center on Sunday evening . Damian_Lillard scored a game - high 36 points and dished out 13 assists . CJ_McCollum finished the night with 6 made threes , and scored 22 points to aid in the winning effort . Big man Jusuf_Nurkic rounded out a strong showing for Portland 's `` big 3 , '' delivering 25 points and drawing a controversial flagrant foul call that resulted in the ejection of OKC star Carmelo_Anthony . Oklahoma_City ( 4 - 5 ) has not had the start to the season it hoped for , dropping to below .500 after its fourth crunch - time loss in 9 games
The Toronto Raptors defeated the visiting Chicago Bulls , 119 - 114 , at Air_Canada_Centre on Tuesday evening . The Raptors ( 6 - 4 ) entered the fourth quarter with a comfortable 98 - 81 lead . However , the Bulls slowly and steadily chipped away throughout the fourth quarter , amassing a 20 - 9 run that brought it to an 8 - point game with just under 5 minutes left . DeMar_DeRozan was the high - point man for Toronto , with 24 points on 9 - of - 18 shooting , in 36 minutes . Jonas_Valanciunas tallied a double_double with 21 points and 10 rebounds , in just 24 minutes . Kyle_Lowry had a full line , with 17 points , 6 rebounds and 6 assists , in 33 minutes . The Raptors shot 54 percent from the floor , including 52 percent from long range . Meanwhile , the Bulls shot 50 percent from the floor but were not as sharp from long range , hitting 38 percent . Bobby_Portis gave Chicago a great boost off the bench , as he helped propel their late run , and finished with 21 points , 13 rebounds and 4 assists , in 24 minutes . Robin_Lopez added 20 points , while Justin_Holiday chipped in 15 . Lauri_Markkanen finished with 12 points , reaching double_figures in scoring in all of his first 9 NBA games .
The host Sacramento Kings took down the Oklahoma_City Thunder , 94 - 86 , at Golden_One_Center on Tuesday . Sophomore guard Buddy_Hield wound up being the offense 's driving force , scoring a team - high 21 points on 7 - of - 9 shooting . Rookie guard De'Aaron_Fox also impressed off the bench , shooting 5 - of - 10 for 10 points and dishing out 8 assists off the bench . The Kings ultimately shot 47 percent on the night , handily out - shooting the Thunder , who finished at just 34 percent on the night . On Tuesday , the Thunder struggled heavily from the field , shooting just over 34 percent as a team . Reigning MVP Russell_Westbrook was a big part of the Thunder 's issues , as he shot just 7 - of - 21 from the field . Steven_Adams finished the game with 14 points on 5 shot attempts .
The Washington Wizards defeated the Los_Angeles Lakers , 111 - 95 , at Capital One Arena on Thursday evening . Both teams came out with the hot hand , as evidenced by the 37 - 34 score in favor of the Wizards ( 6 - 5 ) at the end of the first quarter . The home squad was able to keep Los_Angeles at bay throughout the second half , utilizing some aggressive defense that led to a total of 19 turnovers on the part of the visitors , along with a pedestrian 36 percent success rate from the field ( including 13 percent from three_point range ) . Brook_Lopez added 4 rebounds , 2 blocks and 1 steal , while Jordan_Clarkson supplied 2 rebounds . Kyle_Kuzma and Kentavious_Caldwell-Pope produced matching 13 - point tallies , with the former adding 9 rebounds and 1 assist and the latter registering 4 rebounds , 3 assists and 3 steals . Julius_Randle turned in a near double_double off the bench with 11 points , 9 rebounds , 1 assist and 1 steal . Brandon_Ingram contributed 10 points , 4 rebounds and 1 assist . Lonzo_Ball matched his point total but his shooting woes continued , as he drained only 3 of 12 from the field . He did add 8 rebounds , 8 assists and 2 steals . John_Wall paced the Wizards with 23 points , 8 rebounds , 5 assists , 3 blocks and 2 steals . Backcourt mate Bradley_Beal followed closely behind with 22 points , 5 rebounds , 5 assists and 1 steal . Otto_Porter_Jr. turned in a 20 - point , 11 - rebound double_double that also included 2 assists and 1 steal . Markieff_Morris compiled 16 points , 5 rebounds and 1 assist over 17 minutes in his best outing of the season . Marcin_Gortat managed 8 points , 5 rebounds and 1 assist .
The Sacramento Kings defeated the visiting Philadelphia 76ers , 109 - 108 , at Golden_One_Center on Thursday evening . The Kings ( 3 - 8 ) held a three_point lead heading into the final quarter , but the 76ers ( 6 - 5 ) started the quarter strong and quickly took the lead , which they expanded to a 6 - point margin with 1:30 remaining in the game . It marks the first game_winner of De'Aaron_Fox 's young career , as he finished with 11 points , 7 assists and 4 rebounds , in 30 minutes off the bench . Zach_Randolph was the high - point man for the Kings , with 20 points on 7 - of - 14 shooting , in 29 minutes . Justin_Jackson contributed 19 points on 7 - of - 12 shooting , in 30 minutes off the bench , while Willie_Cauley-Stein added 15 points on 6 - of - 11 shooting , in 24 minutes . The Kings shot 43 percent from the field , including 44 percent from long range , and dished 20 assists in the contest . They also hit a season - high 12 threes . All 5 starters scored in double_digit for the Sixers , led by Robert_Covington , who finished with 24 points , on 7 - of - 16 shooting , in 35 minutes . Joel_Embiid followed up with 22 points and 15 rebounds , in 32 minutes , while Ben_Simmons added 18 points and 6 assists , in 27 minutes .
The Milwaukee Bucks defeated the hosting San_Antonio Spurs , 94 - 87 , at AT_&_T_Center on Friday night . The turning point of the game for the Bucks was undoubtedly the third quarter , as Milwaukee were down 46 - 47 at the break but ended the third period up by 6 thanks to a 30 - 23 scoring run during those 12 minutes . As it has been the case all season long , Giannis_Antetokounmpo led the Bucks offensively with a double_double of 28 points and 12 rebounds , but he also added 5 assists , 4 blocks , and 1 steal . Last but not least , John_Henson made an impact on both ends of the court after ending the contest with 10 points , 7 rebounds , 6 assists and 2 blocks . On the other end , LaMarcus_Aldridge led San_Antonio 's offense with a 20 - point , 12 - rebound performance that also included 4 assists , 2 blocks , and 1 steal . Patty_Mills chipped in with 14 points and 3 assists , and Manu_Ginobili offered a vintage effort coming off the bench since the Argentinian veteran ended the game with 18 points in only 25 minutes of action .
The New_Orleans Pelicans defeated the Los_Angeles Clippers , 111 - 103 , at Smoothie_King_Center on Saturday . Rebounding was the difference in the game , with the Pelicans outrebounding the Clippers , 51 - 37 . The shooting disparity was vast as well , as New_Orleans hit 54 percent of their shots , while holding the Clippers to just 41 percent from the field . The Clippers ( 5 - 7 ) have now lost 7 of their last 8 games , as they continue to free fall down the standings . Blake_Griffin led Los_Angeles , as he accumulated 26 points , 4 rebounds and 6 assists , despite going just 9 - of - 27 from the field . Austin_Rivers tallied 19 points , 3 rebounds , 2 assists and 2 steals . DeAndre_Jordan recorded a 12 - point , 14 - rebound double_double . The Pelicans ( 7 - 6 ) were led by DeMarcus_Cousins , as he collected 35 points , 15 rebounds and 5 assists on 14 - of - 23 shooting . Anthony_Davis amassed 25 points , 10 rebounds , 5 assists , 2 steals and 2 blocks . E'Twaun_Moore finished with 18 points , as the only other Pelican in double_figures .
The Toronto Raptors defeated the host New_Orleans Pelicans , 125 - 116 , at Smoothie_King_Center on Wednesday . The Raptors actually turned a three_point deficit into a 17 - point lead in a 10 - minute span between the third ad fourth quarters . Toronto 's offense could n't be stopped , as they shot 59 percent from the field and 47 percent from three_point range . The Raptors ( 9 - 5 ) got a near triple_double out of Kyle_Lowry , as he collected 22 points , 11 rebounds and 9 assists . DeMar_DeRozan led the team in scoring , tallying 25 points , 9 rebounds , 6 assists and 2 steals on 11 - of - 18 shooting . Jonas_Valanciunas amassed 21 points , 6 rebounds and 2 assists . CJ_Miles led the bench with 17 points . The Pelicans ( 8 - 7 ) were led by DeMarcus_Cousins , who totaled 25 points , 9 rebounds , 5 assists and 4 steals . Anthony_Davis finished with 19 points , 5 rebounds and 3 steals . Jrue_Holiday accrued 18 points , 4 rebounds and 5 assists . Rajon_Rondo made his first start of the season and provided 4 points and 8 assists in 14 minutes of action .
The host Oklahoma_City Thunder took down the Chicago Bulls , 92 - 79 , at Chesapeake_Energy_Arena on Wednesday evening . Wednesday 's win came in particularly ugly fashion , though , as the Thunder shot only 36 percent from the field in the game and scored over a third of their points at the free_throw line . Russell_Westbrook and Carmelo_Anthony were the Thunder 's 2 lead ing scorers , combining for 39 points and 18 made free_throws . Russell_Westbrook , the reigning MVP , went a reassuring 7 - of - 7 at the line after starting out the season uncharacteristically shooting under 60 percent from the stripe . OKC held a 48 - 38 advantage on the glass by the game 's end . The Bulls shot a dismal 35 percent from the field and managed to commit a whopping 27 fouls on the night . While rookie stud Lauri_Markkanen gave the team a reason to be optimistic with his team - high 16 points , the Bulls still trailed for the entirety of the game despite OKC 's poor shooting
The Indiana Pacers defeated the host Memphis Grizzlies , 116 - 113 , at Fed_Ex_Forum_Arena on Wednesday . Three-point shooting was the difference for the Pacers , as they hit 50 percent of their 3 's . while holding the Grizzlies to just 25 percent . The Indiana starters really dominated the Memphis starters , outscoring them , 82 - 64 . The Pacers ( 7 - 8 ) got a season - high 30 points out of Darren_Collison , as he also provided 2 rebounds and 8 assists . Victor_Oladipo amassed 21 points , 6 rebounds , 3 assists and 2 blocks . Myles_Turner accrued 10 points , 5 rebounds , 4 assists and 3 blocks . Domantas_Sabonis led the bench with 13 points , 6 rebounds and 4 assists . The Grizzlies ( 7 - 7 ) were led by Marc_Gasol , who accumulated 35 points , 11 rebounds , 5 assists and 5 blocks . Tyreke_Evans led the bench with 18 points , 6 rebounds and 9 assists .
Kemba_Walker was 8 - for - 17 from the field overall , including an impressive 6 - for - 9 from three_point range . The Hornets ( 6 - 9 ) also were extremely careful with the ball , committing only 8 turnovers while eliciting 14 from the visiting Clippers ( 5 - 10 ) . Their defensive effort also included limiting Los_Angeles to just 40 percent shooting overall , including 28 percent from three_point range . Lou_Williams paced the Clippers with a 25 - point effort off the bench , and he added 4 assists and 2 rebounds . Blake_Griffin totaled 19 points , 8 rebounds and 4 assists . DeAndre_Jordan followed with a 10 - point , 14 - rebound double_double that also included 2 assists and 2 blocks . Wesley johnson and Austin_Rivers provided matching 9 - point efforts , with the former adding 4 rebounds , 1 assist , 2 blocks and 1 steal , and the latter supplying 4 boards , 3 assists and 1 steal . Jeremy_Lamb , back on the second unit now that Nicolas_Batum has returned to action , led the bench with 17 points , 4 rebounds , 1 assist and 2 steals . Dwight_Howard mustered a 16 - point , 16 - rebound double_double that also included 1 assist , 2 steals and 1 block . Nicolas_Batum filled out the stat sheet with 12 points , 7 assists , 4 rebounds , 2 blocks and 1 steal . Marvin_Williams tallied 10 points , 4 rebounds , 1 assist , 2 blocks and 1 steal .
The Houston Rockets defeated the hosting Memphis Grizzlies , 105 - 83 , on Saturday evening . The Rockets ( 13 - 4 ) extended their positive run of results with an easy win over a Memphis ( 7 - 8 ) that was no match for Houston 's high - powered offense . Mike D'Antoni 's team quickly jumped to a 33 - 25 lead in the first quarter , and they never looked back . James_Harden once again led Houston 's offense with a strong effort of 29 points , 7 assists , and 5 rebounds . Chris_Paul added 17 points with 6 assists , and Clint_Capela once again notched a double_double after finishing with 17 points and 13 boards . Ryan_Anderson added 13 points , and Eric_Gordon chipped in with 12 points off the bench . The Grizzlies did n't have Mike_Conley , but Mario_Chalmers did a decent job starting as point guard with 8 assists alongside 6 points , 4 rebounds , and 4 steals . Chandler_Parsons led the way with 17 points , while both JaMychal_Green and Marc_Gasol ended with 15 points apiece . Marc_Gasol ended 1 rebound shy of a double_double .
The Toronto Raptors defeated the Washington Wizards , 100 - 91 , at Air_Canada_Centre on Sunday afternoon . The Raptors had a tight 60 - 55 lead at the half , but DeMar_DeRozan ultimately proved to be too much for Washington to handle . The All-Star 2 - guard went 15 - for - 26 from the field on the way to 33 points , and he added 8 rebounds , 6 assists , 2 steals and 1 block . The home team was able to overcome a strong shooting effort from the Wizards , which posted a 58 percent success rate from three_point range . In John_Wall 's absence , Bradley_Beal led the way for the visitors with 27 points , a total he supplemented with 4 boards and 1 assist . Otto_Porter_Jr. was a distant second with 15 points , 6 boards and 1 steal . Marcin_Gortat contributed a 12 - point , 12 - rebound double_double that also included 7 assists and 1 steal . Kelly_Oubre_Jr. led the bench with 10 points , 2 rebounds and 1 block , while Tim_Frazier , drawing the start at point guard in John_Wall 's stead , pitched in 6 points , 8 rebounds and 8 assists . CJ_Miles followed DeMar_DeRozan with a bench - leading 12 points . Kyle_Lowry mustered 10 points , 6 assists , 5 rebounds and 2 steals . Fred_VanVleet matched Kyle_Lowry 's point total off the bench over 24 minutes and also provided 5 assists and 3 rebounds . Serge_Ibaka overcame a knee injury to post 9 points , 8 rebounds and 1 block . Jonas_Valanciunas had a quiet afternoon with 4 points , 7 rebounds , 1 assist and 2 blocks .
The Indiana Pacers defeated the host Miami Heat , 120 - 95 , at American_Airlines_Arena on Sunday evening . It was a back and forth first half , with Indiana leading 58 - 55 at halftime . However the tide turned in the third quarter , where the Pacers kicked things off with a 19 - 4 run , and ultimately outscored Miami 32 - 13 in the quarter to take a 90 - 68 lead into the final frame . Six players scored in double_digit for the Pacers ( 9 - 8 ) , led by Bojan_Bogdanovic , who poured in 26 points on 9 - of - 14 shooting , in 35 minutes . Myles_Turner was huge on both ends of the floor for Indiana , and finished with 25 points , 7 rebounds , 4 assists , 4 blocks and 1 steal , in 32 minutes . Victor_Oladipo chipped in 15 points , while Domantas_Sabonis hauled in 10 rebounds , in 19 minutes off the bench . The Pacers shot 60 percent from the field , including 48 percent from long range . Meanwhile , Wayne_Ellington was on fire for the Heat ( 7 - 9 ) , as he tied his career - high with 7 three_pointers , on his way to a team - high 21 points on 7 - of - 12 shooting , in 25 minutes off the bench . On the other hand , Dion_Waiters went 0 - of - 10 from the field , as he struggled to find his groove . Hassan_Whiteside tallied 15 points and 7 rebounds , while Josh_Richardson also tallied 15 points .
The Cleveland Cavaliers defeated the Detroit Pistons , 116 - 88 , at Little Caesars Arena on Monday night . The Cavaliers ( 10 - 7 ) have progressively been finding their footing after a shockingly inconsistent start , checking into Monday 's contest as winners of 4 consecutive games . They continued cruising in the third quarter , and only a 26 - point fourth period by the Pistons after the game was out of hand prevented the final score from representing an outright massacre . Kevin_Love led the way for the Cavaliers with a 19 - point , 11 - rebound double_double that also included 4 assists . Jae_Crowder and LeBron_James followed with matching 18 - point efforts , with the former also providing 5 boards and the latter registering 8 assists , 2 rebounds , 1 steal and 1 block . Jose_Calderon drew the start at point guard and surprised with 14 points , 4 rebounds , 2 assists and 1 steal . Jeff_Green led the bench with 11 points , 3 rebounds and 1 assist , while Channing_Frye pitched in 10 points , 2 rebounds and 2 assists . Tobias_Harris paced them with a modest 11 points , a total he supplemented with 5 rebounds and 3 assists . Stanley_Johnson managed 10 points , 3 rebounds and 1 steal . Reggie_Jackson matched Stanley_Johnson 's point total and added 6 assists and 1 rebound . Avery_Bradley supplied 9 points , 3 assists and 2 rebounds . Andre_Drummond went for 8 points , 8 rebounds , 3 assists and 1 steal , but he also turned the ball over a game - high 6 times . Langston_Galloway led the second unit with 8 points , while Reggie_Bullock , Anthony_Tolliver , Eric_Moreland and Henry_Ellenson chipped in a quartet of 6 - point tallies .
The Philadelphia 76ers defeated the visiting Utah Jazz , 107 - 86 , at Wells_Fargo_Center on Monday evening . Philadelphia was so dominant that they won the first quarter 25 - 15 , and they never looked back . Ben_Simmons led the way for the Sixers with a double_double of 27 points and 10 rebounds , as the rookie once again looked like a dominant force on both ends of the court . Joel_Embiid also added a double_double of 15 points and 11 boards , but he also chipped in with 3 assists and 2 blocks . JJ_Redick added 20 points , and Amir_Johnson produced off the bench thanks to 8 points , 13 rebounds , and 4 blocks . On the other hand , Donovan_Mitchell led the way for the Jazz , as the rookie once again was the team 's top scoring threat and finished with 17 points , 5 assists , and 4 rebounds . Rodney_Hood added 13 points off the bench and Ricky_Rubio chipped in with 12 points , but also committed 6 turnovers while dishing out just 2 assists .
The Dallas Mavericks defeated the host Memphis Grizzlies , 95 - 94 , at Fed_Ex_Forum_Arena on Wednesday evening . The Grizzlies started out strong , taking a 27 - 12 lead after 1 quarter . They carried the lead through halftime , before giving up a poor third quarter that allowed the Mavericks to take a 2 - point lead heading into the fourth . The Mavericks held a 4 - point lead with 3:30 to go in the game , before the Grizzlies battled back to tie things up with a clutch three_pointer by Marc_Gasol , and then take a 2 - point lead with only 0 second left , thanks to a put - back jam by JaMychal_Green . Harrison_Barnes led the way for the Mavericks ( 4 - 15 ) with 22 points , 9 rebounds and 1 assist , in 35 minutes . Dennis_Smith_Jr. followed up with 17 points , 4 rebounds , 3 assists and 1 steal , in 27 minutes . JJ_Barea contributed 10 points , 11 assists and 1 rebound , in 24 minutes off the bench , while Devin_Harris added 11 points , 4 steals and 2 rebounds , in 18 minutes off the bench . The Mavericks shot 43 percent from the field , including 9 - of - 28 from long range . Meanwhile , Tyreke_Evans led the Grizzlies ( 7 - 10 ) with 18 points , 9 rebounds , 7 assists , 2 steals and 1 block , in 30 minutes . Marc_Gasol tallied 14 points , 10 rebounds , 4 assists and 1 block , while Chandler_Parsons chipped in 11 points on 5 - of - 9 shooting . The Grizzlies shot 46 percent from the field , including 7 - of - 29 from long range .
The Indiana Pacers defeated the Orlando Magic , 121 - 109 , at Bankers_Life_Fieldhouse on Monday evening . The Pacers ( 12 - 9 ) received a bit of notably good news earlier in the day when they learned that Victor_Oladipo would be able to return from a 1 - game absence due to a knee injury to face his old squad , a team he had already lit up for 29 points , 8 rebounds , 5 assists , 7 steals and 2 blocks on Nov 20 . Indiana got off to a fast start , building a 33 - 25 lead after 1 quarter . To their credit , the Magic ( 8 - 13 ) battled back , and they entered the fourth quarter trailing by only an 84 - 85 margin . Although Orlando was able to shoot relatively well , Indiana was that much more effective while draining 53 percent of their 79 attempts , including 58 percent of their 26 three_point shots . Jonathon_Simmons drew the start at small forward and led the way with 21 points , 3 rebounds and 1 assist . Nikola_Vucevic contributed a 16 - point , 12 - rebound double_double that also included 3 assists and 3 blocks . Aaron_Gordon matched Nikola_Vucevic 's scoring total and added 6 boards , 2 assists , 4 blocks and 1 steal . Elfrid_Payton tallied 15 points , 5 assists , 3 rebounds and 1 steal . Evan_Fournier poured in 12 points overall and complemented them with 4 assists and a pair of boards . DJ_Augustin scored a bench - leading 11 points , dished out 4 assists and hauled in 1 rebound . Victor_Oladipo enjoyed another successful game versus his old squad , pacing Indiana with 26 points , 6 rebounds , 5 assists , 4 blocks and 2 steals . Bojan_Bogdanovic supplied 22 points and 3 rebounds . Domantas_Sabonis led the second unit with 19 points , 8 rebounds and 5 assists . Lance_Stephenson was productive off the bench as well with 18 points , 8 rebounds , 5 assists , 1 steal and 1 block . Myles_Turner matched his point total and also posted 4 rebounds . Darren_Collison had a down game with a modest 7 points , 2 rebounds , 2 assists , 2 steals and 1 block . The same was true for Thaddeus_Young , who shot just 1 - for - 9 on his way to 2 points . He also had 5 rebounds , 5 assists and 2 steals .
The Detroit Pistons defeated the Boston Celtics 118 - 108 on Monday at TD_Garden . Andre_Drummond was phenomenal for the Pistons , scoring 26 points on 10 - of - 12 shooting from the field to go along with 22 rebounds , 6 assists and 4 steals . Tobias_Harris continued his great 2017 - 18 campaign , scoring a game - high 31 points and grabbing 8 rebounds , while Reggie_Jackson scored 20 points of his own and dished out 7 assists . As a team , the Pistons shot a scorching 44 percent from behind the arc and 52 percent from the field overall . Boston still had a great shooting night , shooting an impressive 16 - of - 33 ( 48 percent ) from 3 and 52 percent from the field overall , but the Celtics committed 17 turnovers and shot just 12 - of - 21 from the free_throw line . Marcus_Smart came off the bench and did everything he could to keep his team in the game , shooting 6 - of - 9 from behind the arc en route to scoring a team - high 23 points in 32 minutes , but ultimately it was not enough . Kyrie_Irving added 18 points and 9 assists , but shot just 6 - of - 16 from the field .

There was little doubt as to which team had come to play right from the jump , as Detroit forged a commanding 36 - 19 first - quarter lead that had grown to 69 - 41 by halftime . Even with the home squad mostly putting things on cruise control in the second half , they still managed a comfortable 24 - point win while shooting a blistering 57 percent from the field , including 46 percent from three_point range . The Pistons ' reserves saw plenty of run in the second half with the large lead , as they compiled a combined 51 points . Devin_Booker led the way for Phoenix with 22 points , 4 rebounds and 1 steal . Rookie Josh_Jackson saw 32 minutes off the bench and managed 20 points , 7 rebounds , 1 assist , 3 steals and 0 block . Greg_Monroe filled out the stat sheet with 14 points , 7 rebounds , 5 assists and 2 steals . Tyler_Ulis turned in 13 points , 4 assists , 2 rebounds and 1 steal . Marquese_Chriss poured in 10 points and added 4 boards , 1 assist , 1 steals and 1 block . Reggie_Jackson exploited the Suns ' suspect point guard defense to register a team - leading 23 points , a total he supplemented with 5 assists , 2 steals and 1 rebound . Avery_Bradley and Tobias_Harris followed with matching 20 - point tallies . Andre_Drummond collected 13 points , 7 rebounds , 7 assists , 1 steal and 1 block over 28 minutes . Ish_Smith led the bench with 14 points and added 6 assists , 3 rebounds and 1 block . Luke_Kennard was productive on the second unit as well , tallying 12 points , 6 assists , 2 rebounds and 2 steals .

The Minnesota Timberwolves defeated the New_Orleans Pelicans , 120 - 102 , at Smoothie_King_Center on Wednesday evening . However , after a tightly - contested first quarter that the Pelicans ( 11 - 10 ) emerged from with a narrow 29 - 28 advantage , the balance of power underwent a seismic shift . The Timberwolves ( 13 - 9 ) were able to take advantage , forging a 62 - 49 halftime lead and outscoring their hosts by a 58 - 53 margin in the second half to garner the comfortable victory . Minnesota shot an impressive 58 percent from the field and won the rebounding battle by a decisive 44 - 28 margin , an advantage that the absence of Anthony_Davis undoubtedly help create . Andrew_Wiggins led the way on the night for the Timberwolves , compiling 28 points on 10 - for - 18 shooting and adding 8 rebounds , 5 assists and 1 block . Jimmy_Butler followed with 19 points , 4 rebounds , 3 assists and 1 steal . Gorgui_Dieng matched Jimmy_Butler 's scoring total and supplemented it with 6 rebounds , 5 assists and 4 steals . Tyus_Jones drew another start for Jeff_Teague ( Achilles ) and was impressive once again , filling out the stat sheet with 16 points , 6 assists , 4 rebounds and 4 steals . Ageless veteran Jamal_Crawford poured in 12 points and also supplied 3 assists and 1 rebound . Karl-Anthony_Towns took more of a back seat than usual on the offensive end with only 7 shot attempts , but he still mustered an 11 - point , 10 - rebound double_double that also included 3 assists . Taj_Gibson managed a 10 - point , 10 - rebound double_double of his own that featured 4 assists and 1 steal . Jrue_Holiday nearly matched Andrew_Wiggins basket for basket while leading the Pelicans with 27 points , 5 assists , 1 rebound , 2 steals and 1 block . Anthony_Davis was enjoying a successful evening before getting the hook , as he 'd amassed 17 points and 5 rebounds in just 18 minutes . DeMarcus_Cousins matched Anthony_Davis ' point haul and added 10 rebounds , 6 assists , 1 steal and 1 block . E'Twaun_Moore registered just 5 points , 2 boards , 1 assist and 1 steal , while Rajon_Rondo could only provide three_points , 7 assists , 1 rebound and 1 steal in 27 minutes . Darius_Miller led the bench with 12 points .
The Cleveland Cavaliers defeated the Atlanta Hawks , 121 - 114 , at Philips_Arena on Thursday evening . The Cavaliers ( 15 - 7 ) checked into Thursday as perhaps the NBA 's hottest team , having ripped off 9 consecutive victories and seemingly having left their early_season struggles in the dust . Atlanta surprised their visitors by bouncing back from a 42 - 35 first - quarter deficit with a 32 - 21 advantage in the second quarter that sent them into halftime with a 67 - 63 edge . Cleveland utilized intermission to regroup , however , as they regained the lead with a strong 36 - point third period before nearly matching their hosts point - for - point in the final 12 minutes to hang on for the win . Kevin_Love put on a second consecutive explosive performance to lead the Cavaliers , managing 25 points , 16 rebounds and 2 assists . LeBron_James was right behind him with a 24 - point , 12 - assist double_double that also included 6 rebounds , 2 steals and 2 blocks . Dwyane_Wade produced a bench - leading 19 points and supplemented them with 3 assists , 2 rebounds , 4 steals and 2 blocks . Jae_Crowder poured in 15 points and added 3 assists and 2 rebounds . Jeff_Green was productive on the second unit as well with 12 points , 3 rebounds , 2 assists , 1 steal and 1 block . Dennis_Schroder took on his usual role as offensive leader for the Hawks , leading the way with 27 points , 5 assists and 2 rebounds . Ersan_Ilyasova supplied 22 points , 3 rebounds and 4 steals . Marco_Belinelli registered 18 points , 5 assists , 4 rebounds and 1 block in 28 minutes off the bench . John_Collins contributed 13 points , 7 rebounds , 2 steals and 1 block in his first start for Dewayne_Dedmon ( leg ) . Taurean_Prince totaled 12 points , 4 rebounds and 2 assists .
The Milwaukee Bucks defeated the host Portland Trail_Blazers , 103 - 91 , at Moda_Center on Thursday evening . The Bucks got out to a great start , leading 33 - 21 through 1 quarter . They continued the assault in the second quarter to push their lead to 15 , 60 - 45 , by halftime . The Bucks did not let up , extending their lead even further , to a 21 - point advantage , 87 - 66 , after 3 quarters . The Trail_Blazers gave up 19 turnovers in the contest and subsequently were never able to catch up significant ground . This marks the second straight win for the Bucks ( 11 - 9 ) , and the end of a 4 - game road trip , where they went 3 - 1 . Khris_Middleton led the way for Milwaukee , with 26 points on 10 - of - 17 shooting in 35 minutes . Eric_Bledsoe followed up with 25 points on 10 - of - 17 shooting , while Giannis_Antetokounmpo added 20 points , 9 rebounds , 5 assists , 3 steals and 3 blocks . The Bucks shot 48 percent from the field , including 6 - of - 20 from long range . Meanwhile , the Trail_Blazers ( 13 - 9 ) shot 42 percent from the field , including 6 - of - 23 from long range . Jusuf_Nurkic led the way for Portland , with 25 points , 11 rebounds , 3 steals , 1 assist and 1 block in 32 minutes . Damian_Lillard followed up with 18 points , 7 rebounds and 7 assists , while CJ_McCollum tallied 15 points , 6 rebounds , 5 assists and 1 block .

The Sacramento Kings defeated the host Chicago Bulls , 107 - 106 , at United_Center on Friday evening . The game got out to a quick start , as 2 of the league 's lowest scoring teams combined for 60 points in the first quarter , with the Bulls taking the early 31 - 29 advantage . Sacramento maintained the 1 - point advantage after 3 quarters , leading 82 - 81 heading into the fourth . It was still a 1 - point game with 3:20 left to play , when the Kings finally pulled ahead with a 5 - point lead . Still , the Kings ( 7 - 15 ) only narrowly escaped with the win , while the Bulls suffered their eighth straight loss for the Bulls ( 3 - 18 ) . Zach_Randolph led the way for the Kings , with 25 points on 12 - of - 19 shooting , 13 rebounds , 3 assists and 1 block , in 32 minutes . Donovan_Mitchell became the first rookie in the 2017 class to score at least 40 points in a game , leading the Jazz with 41 . The rookie guard posted his new career high on 13 - of - 25 shooting , including 6 made three_pointers . Only 7 Utah players scored on Friday , and Donovan_Mitchell was 1 of only 2 players to score more than 13 points . The Jazz as a whole shot an efficient 49 percent from the field and hit 12 three_pointers on the night . DeMarcus_Cousins was the team 's top scorer , posting 23 points to go with 13 rebounds . Anthony_Davis added a double_double , scoring 19 points along with 10 rebounds . The Pelicans had issues at the line throughout the night , though , making just 9 free_throws on 60 percent shooting .

Denver delivered a whopping 37 points in the fourth , ultimately establishing a comfortable double_digit lead . The Kings ( 8 - 17 ) seemed to be set to lose a tight contest against the Pelicans ( 13 - 13 ) , but somehow they found a way to come out on top thanks to a huge comeback during the fourth quarter , and a dominant performance during overtime . Sacramento 's bench scored 53 points in total . DeMarcus_Cousins had a huge game for the Pelicans , but his efforts were n't enough and he ended on the losing end of this game despite the fact he finished with 38 points , 11 rebounds , 4 assists , and 3 steals . Anthony_Davis returned to the lineup following a groin problem , and contributed with 18 points and 6 rebounds across 31 minutes . But the Pelicans ' bench looked awful , as they only scored 16 points as a whole .

Jose_Calderon had 8 points , 5 assists , 1 rebound and 1 steal .
The Phoenix Suns defeated the visiting Memphis Grizzlies , 97 - 95 , at Talking_Stick_Resort_Arena on Thursday evening . The first quarter was a tight 1 , with the Suns emerging with a 1 - point , 26 - 25 , lead . The Suns turned it up a notch in the second , outscoring the Grizzlies 34 - 26 , to take a 60 - 51 lead into halftime . The Grizzlies turned the tables in the third quarter , pouring in 30 points to take a 2 - point lead heading into the fourth . TJ_Warren led the way for Phoenix , with 27 points on 9 - of - 15 shooting , 5 rebounds , 1 assist , 1 steal and 1 block , in 34 minutes . Troy_Daniels came up big off the bench , with 14 points , including the game_winner . Josh_Jackson tallied 13 points and 5 rebounds , while Greg_Monroe finished with 8 points , 12 rebounds and 7 assists . The Suns shot 41 percent from the field , including 10 - of - 26 from long range . Meanwhile , Tyreke_Evans led the Grizzlies , with 23 points , 9 rebounds , 5 assists and 1 steal , in 34 minutes . Marc_Gasol tallied 13 points , 11 rebounds , 5 assists and 3 blocks , while JaMychal_Green finished with 12 points , 10 rebounds and 2 assists . The Grizzlies shot 43 percent from the field , including 5 - of - 26 from long range .
The New_Orleans Pelicans defeated the host Orlando Magic , 111 - 97 , at Amway_Center on Friday . New_Orleans actually led by at least 7 points for the entirety of the second half , as Orlando could never recover from a 32 - 20 first quarter deficit . Defense was key for the Pelicans , as they held the Magic to 42 percent from the field and 20 percent from three_point range . New_Orleans ended up hitting 50 percent from the field and 33 percent from three_point range . Rebounding was also a big factor , with New_Orleans outrebounding Orlando , 48 - 40 . The Pelicans ( 16 - 16 ) were led by DeMarcus_Cousins , as he tallied 26 points , 11 rebounds , 6 assists and 3 steals . Anthony_Davis finished with 20 points and 11 rebounds . Jrue_Holiday was the only other starter in double_figures , as he amassed 24 points , 2 rebounds and 2 assists . The Magic 's ( 11 - 22 ) best player was Jonathon_Simmons , as he accrued 22 points , 8 rebounds and 2 assists . Nikola_Vucevic totaled 21 points , 8 rebounds , 2 assists and 2 steals . Elfrid_Payton accumulated 18 points , 5 rebounds and 6 assists .

The home team entered the fourth quarter trailing by an 85 - 81 margin , but they were able to go on a 28 - 17 run over the final 10:5 to secure their 10th home victory of the campaign . The Philadelphia 76ers defeated the New_York Knicks , 105 - 98 , at Madison_Square_Garden on Monday afternoon . The Sixers ( 15 - 18 ) received some good news prior to tip - off , as Joel_Embiid determined his troublesome back was in good enough shape for him to suit up for the Christmas Day clash . His presence turned out to be pivotal to Philadelphia 's success , as he led the way with a 25 - point , 16 - rebound double_double that also included 3 assists and 3 blocks . However , as spectacular as the big man 's final line was , he was 1 - upped by Enes_Kanter , who posted 31 points , 22 rebounds and 1 assist for the Knicks ( 17 - 16 ) . Enes_Kanter put up a game - high 21 shot attempts as well , but a fourth - quarter push by the visitors , which included a clutch Joel_Embiid three_pointer with 2:23 remaining , sealed the hard - fought win . JJ_Redick was right behind Joel_Embiid in his return from a hamstring injury , pouring in 24 points and adding 6 rebounds , 2 assists and 2 steals . Michael_Beasley led the bench with 10 points , 5 boards , 1 assist and 1 steal . Lance_Thomas ( 2 points , 1 rebound ) and Jarrett_Jack ( 0 points , 7 assists , 2 rebounds and 2 steals ) underwhelmed on the first unit .

The Toronto Raptors defeated the Miami Heat , 115 - 112 , at Air_Canada_Centre on Tuesday evening . The Raptors ( 40 - 16 ) came into the game having lost just 4 times over 27 home outings , so based on that trend alone , they were considered a solid favorite . The Heat second unit helped lead the fourth - quarter charge and posted a collective 52 points . Goran_Dragic overcame a tough individual matchup against Kyle_Lowry to lead the way for the Heat with a game - high 28 points , which he supplemented with 4 assists , 2 rebounds and 1 steal . James_Johnson followed with a bench - leading 16 points and added 7 rebounds . Wayne_Ellington finished with 15 points , 7 boards and 1 assist , with all of his scoring coming from three_pointers . Bam_Adebayo supplied 11 points , 5 boards , 3 assists and 1 block . Dwayne Dwyane_Wade managed a 10 - point , 11 - rebound double_double that also included 6 assists in his second game back with Miami . Hassan_Whiteside accomplished the feat as well with 10 points , 10 boards , 1 assist , 2 steals and 1 block . Josh_Richardson accounted for 10 points , 5 assists , 3 rebounds , 1 steal and 1 block . Tyler_Johnson drew the start and mustered a modest 7 points , 4 rebounds , 2 assists and 1 steal . DeMar_DeRozan paced the Raptors with 27 points , a total he complemented with 4 assists , 2 rebounds and 1 steal . Kyle_Lowry contributed 22 points , 8 assists , 4 rebounds and 2 steals . Serge_Ibaka generated a 14 - point , 10 - rebound double_double . CJ_Miles poured in 11 points to lead the bench , while Fred_VanVleet and Delon_Wright tallied matching 10 - point efforts . Fred_VanVleet also registered 6 assists , 5 rebounds and 2 steals , while Delon_Wright had 2 assists , 1 rebound , 1 steal and 1 block . Jonas_Valanciunas totaled 6 points , 10 rebounds , 1 assist , 1 steal and 1 block .
The Philadelphia 76ers defeated the visiting Miami Heat , 104 - 102 , at Wells_Fargo_Center on Wednesday evening . They continued the dominance in the second , as they started off with a 60 run to push their lead to 15 , just 2 minutes into the quarter . However , it was a tale of 2 halves , as the Sixers mounted a comeback in the third quarter , where they chipped away until the trailed by just 8 , down 81 - 73 , heading into the final frame . The Sixers then used a 12 - 5 run to take a 6 - point lead with 2:25 to go in the game . Ben_Simmons tallied a triple_double with 18 points , 12 rebounds 10 assists , along with 4 steals , in 36 minutes , to lead the 76ers in the win . Dario_Saric finished with 19 points , 8 rebounds , 3 assists and 1 steal , while Marco_Belinelli poured in 17 points on 7 - of - 12 shooting , in 28 minutes off the bench , in his debut with Philadelphia . The 76ers shot 42 percent from the field , including 9 - of - 35 from long range . Meanwhile , James_Johnson was the high - point man for Miami , with 22 points on 8 - of - 10 shooting , in 21 minutes off the bench . Goran_Dragic followed up with 18 points , 4 assists and 3 rebounds , while Hassan_Whiteside finished with 16 points , 10 rebounds , 3 blocks and 1 assist . The Heat shot 46 percent from the field , including 11 - of - 27 from long range .
The New_York Knicks defeated the Orlando Magic , 120 - 113 , at Amway_Center on Thursday evening . Orlando got off to a good start and they won the first quarter 41 - 31 , and they held a 6 - point advantage heading into the second half . After winning the third quarter 30 - 21 , they sealed the deal with a strong fourth - quarter performance ( 27 - 23 ) . Trey_Burke was the best player for the Knicks in this game , as he came off the bench to deliver a strong 26 - point , 6 - assist , 4 - rebound performance in only 30 minutes of action . Tim_Hardaway_Jr. added 23 points and 6 assists , and Enes_Kanter registered a strong double_double of 12 points and 12 boards . Courtney_Lee had 10 points , and Kyle_O'Quinn registered 14 points with 8 rebounds off the bench . Evan_Fournier led the way for Orlando , as he finished with 25 points , 5 rebounds , and 5 assists . Nikola_Vucevic added 19 points with 6 rebounds , and DJ_Augustin contributed with 13 points and 4 assists . Jonathon_Simmons had 12 points , 5 assists and 4 rebounds . Meanwhile , Mario_Hezonja contributed with 15 points coming off the bench .
The Oklahoma_City Thunder defeated the host Sacramento Kings , 110 - 107 , at Golden_One_Center on Thursday evening . The Thunder got out to a blistering hot start , as they jumped out to a 12 - 3 lead within the first 3 minutes , and went on to pour in 44 points in the first quarter , while holding the Kings to 21 . The Kings held on to trail by 7 at halftime , down 67 - 60 . The Kings carried the momentum into the third quarter , where they outscored the Thunder 30 - 18 , to take a 90 - 85 lead into the final frame . Russell_Westbrook tallied a triple_double with 17 points , 15 rebounds and 11 assists . Paul_George finished with a team - high 26 points , along with 7 rebounds and 8 assists , while Carmelo_Anthony finished with 23 points on 8 - of - 17 shooting . Steven_Adams had a solid outing with 18 points and 11 rebounds . The Thunder shot 44 percent from the field , including 14 - of - 36 from long range . Meanwhile , Zach_Randolph had a huge night for Sacramento with 29 points on 12 - of - 23 shooting , and 12 rebounds . Garret Garrett_Temple and Vince_Carter chipped in 13 points each , while Buddy_Hield added 19 points , 9 rebounds and 4 assists , off the bench . The Kings shot 46 percent from the field , including 12 - of - 27 from long range .
The Golden_State Warriors took down the visiting Los_Angeles Clippers , 134 - 127 , behind Stephen_Curry 's 44 points at Oracle_Arena on Thursday . It was an offense - heavy game from both teams , as Los_Angeles ( 30 - 27 ) nearly caught up with Golden_State 's 70 - point first half thanks to 69 points of their own in the second . Stephen_Curry hit 8 three_pointers en route to a game - high 44 points . He shot 14 - of - 19 from the field . As a team , the Warriors shot a brilliant 62 percent from the field . Offensive powerhouse Lou_Williams came off the bench and delivered another strong outing , scoring 21 points .
The Miami Heat defeated the Memphis Grizzlies , 115 - 89 , at American_Airlines_Arena on Saturday night . The Heat ( 31 - 29 ) looked absolutely dominant in this game , as they remembered some of their early_season form in a game where the Grizzlies ( 18 - 40 ) simply did n't have answers to what Miami was offering . Miami shot better from the field ( 46 percent against 44 ) and won the rebounding battle as well ( 51 - 39 ) . Tyler_Johnson led the way with 23 points , while Justise_Winslow had 17 points and 7 rebounds . Josh_Richardson added 15 points , while Hassan_Whiteside had 12 points , 8 boards and 3 blocks . Wayne_Ellington had 15 points off the bench , and Bam_Adebayo had 13 points . Goran_Dragic struggled , though , with only 6 points . Andrew_Harrison was the top scorer for the Grizzlies with 17 points , 6 assists and 4 rebounds . JaMychal_Green had 10 points and 11 rebounds , and Deyonta_Davis contributed 14 points and 7 boards
The New_Orleans Pelicans defeated the host Milwaukee Bucks in overtime , 123 - 121 , at BMO_Harris_Bradley_Center on Sunday . The Pelicans ( 33 - 26 ) were led by Jrue_Holiday , as he tallied 36 points , 9 rebounds and 6 assists . Anthony_Davis accrued 27 points , 13 rebounds , 2 steals and 2 blocks . Rajon_Rondo collected 16 points , 8 rebounds and 12 assists . Nikola_Mirotic led the bench with 14 points , 7 rebounds and 4 blocks . The Bucks ( 33 - 26 ) were led by Khris_Middleton , as he totaled 25 points , 5 rebounds and 3 assists . Eric_Bledsoe finished with 20 points , 8 rebounds and 5 assists . Giannis_Antetokounmpo generated 20 points , 4 rebounds , 6 assists and 2 steals . Jabari_Parker led the bench with a season - best 18 points , 6 rebounds and 2 assists .
The San_Antonio Spurs defeated the Cleveland Cavaliers , 110 - 94 , at Quicken_Loans_Arena on Sunday afternoon . The Spurs ( 36 - 25 ) and Cavaliers ( 35 - 24 ) came into the marquee matinee with strikingly similar records but decidedly different trajectories . Matters took a turn for the better for the visitors coming out of intermission , as they outscored the Cavs by a 26 - 21 margin during the period . LaMarcus_Aldridge led the way for the Spurs with 27 points , a total he supplemented with 6 rebounds , 3 assists and 1 block . Danny_Green headed to the bench but thrived , pouring in 22 points and adding 3 rebounds , 1 steal and 1 block over 23 minutes . Dejounte_Murray supplied a full line of 13 points , 9 boards , 5 assists , 4 steals and 3 blocks . Bryn_Forbes totaled 12 points , 1 rebound and 1 steal in 20 minutes on the second unit . Patty_Mills and Pau_Gasol provided matching 11 - point efforts , with the former also dishing out 5 assists , hauling in 2 rebounds and recording 1 steal , and the latter tallying 7 rebounds and 3 assists . Kyle_Anderson was solid while contributing 10 points . LeBron_James paced the Cavaliers with a near - triple_double of 33 points , 13 rebounds , 9 assists and 1 steal . Jordan_Clarkson went for 17 points and 2 rebounds while leading the bench in scoring . Jeff_Green posted 14 points , 2 boards , 1 assist and 1 steal . Tristan_Thompson accounted for 6 points , 13 rebounds and 1 steal . Cedi_Osman mustered just 4 points and 1 rebound , while the starting backcourt duo of George_Hill ( 2 points , 2 rebounds , 1 assist and 1 block ) and JR_Smith ( 2 points , 2 rebounds ) were significantly underwhelming .
The Houston Rockets defeated the host Denver Nuggets , 119 - 114 , at Pepsi_Center on Sunday evening . The Nuggets battled back to make it a 5 - point game , but the Rockets closed the quarter on 19 - 11 run , to take a 38 - 25 lead into the second . The Rockets kept the foot on the gas through the second quarter , not allowing Denver to catch up at all , and took a 66 - 52 lead into halftime . Houston took a 92 - 79 lead into the final frame , where the Nuggets continued their best effort to claw back . They did a great job chipping away , making it just a 5 - point game with 4:31 to go . James_Harden led Houston with 41 points on 11 - of - 20 shooting , 8 rebounds , 7 assists and 1 steal , in 37 minutes . Chris_Paul followed up with 23 points , 6 assists , 5 rebounds and 2 steals , while Trevor_Ariza added 14 points , 6 rebounds and 1 steal . The Rockets shot 51 percent from the field , including 15 - of - 34 from long range . Meanwhile , Will_Barton led the Nuggets with 25 points , 7 rebounds , 6 assists and 3 steals , in 36 minutes . Nikola_Jokic finished with 21 points , 14 rebounds , 8 assists , 1 steal and 1 block , while Jamal_Murray tallied 19 points , 5 assists and 2 rebounds . The Nuggets shot 48 percent from the field , including 10 - of - 29 from long range .
The Charlotte Hornets defeated the Chicago Bulls , 118 - 103 , at Spectrum_Center on Tuesday evening . The Hornets ( 28 - 33 ) have been seemingly honed in on their postseason aspirations since resuming play after the All-Star break , as they 'd rattled off victories in all 3 subsequent contests , and 4 consecutive overall , coming into Tuesday 's game . However , it was Chicago that came out of the gates hot , as they took a 29 - 26 first - quarter lead . In all , 6 Bulls players hit double_digit in the scoring column , but none compiled more than Zach_LaVine 's 21 points , which he complemented with 4 rebounds and 4 assists . Denzel_Valentine followed Zach_LaVine with 14 points , a total he supplemented with 6 rebounds , 4 assists and 1 steal . Cristiano_Felicio provided 12 points , 6 boards , 4 assists and 1 steal . Bobby_Portis matched his scoring total to lead the bench and also hauled in 10 rebounds , dished out 1 assist and recorded 1 steal . Lauri_Markkanen and David_Nwaba posted matching 11 - point efforts , with the former supplying 7 boards , 1 assist and 2 steals , and the latter generating 6 rebounds , 2 assists , 3 steals and 1 block . Kris_Dunn registered 10 points , 3 assists , 2 rebounds and 2 blocks . Kemba_Walker turned in 31 points , 5 assists , 2 rebounds and 3 steals . Dwight_Howard finished with 24 points , 6 rebounds , 1 assist and 5 steals . Jeremy_Lamb accounted for a bench - leading 15 points and complemented them with 5 assists and 1 rebound . Marvin_Williams totaled 14 points , 5 rebounds , 1 assist and 1 block . Frank_Kaminsky was productive off the bench as well with 11 points , 2 rebounds and 1 block . Michael_Kidd-Gilchrist was forced from the game after 6 minutes with a hamstring injury and was unable to return .

The Detroit Pistons defeated the Milwaukee Bucks , 110 - 87 , at Little Ceasars Arena on Wednesday . Things were quite square after the first quarter ( 32 - 32 ) , but Detroit pulled away in the second quarter ( 21 - 12 ) and the Bucks never got it back . In fact , Detroit won the remaining 2 quarters ( 32 - 26 and 25 - 17 , respectively ) so won quite comfortably in front of their own fans . Andre_Drummond was the best player for the Pistons , as he finished with 15 points , 16 rebounds and 2 steals . Reggie_Bullock chipped in with 16 points and 3 assists , and Blake_Griffin had 8 points , 9 rebounds , and 7 assists . Stanley_Johnson ( 19 points ) and Eric_Moreland ( 10 points , 12 boards ) stood out . Eric_Bledsoe was the best player for the Bucks , as he finished with 19 points , 6 rebounds and 4 assists . Khris_Middleton had 17 points and Giannis_Antetokounmpo added 11 , but both teams struggled overall since they combined for 8 - 23 from the field .

Accordingly , Toronto came out with a considerable sense of urgency , racking up an impressive 42 points in the first 12 minutes . However , not to be outdone , the Magic ( 18 - 43 ) did their best to hang with the visitors , compiling 37 points of their own to keep their deficit to a manageable 5 . As their final tally implied , Toronto shot well , posting a 54 percent success rate from the field , although the Magic were n't far behind with a 48 percent figure . Aaron_Gordon notably added 10 rebounds , 3 assists , 2 steals and 1 block .

The Golden_State Warriors defeated the Atlanta Hawks , 114 - 109 , at Philips_Arena on Friday . The Warriors ( 49 - 14 ) were massive favorites ahead of this game and even though they managed to pull away with the win , they did n't have the kind of dominant performance many were expecting considering they were playing against 1 of the worst teams in the Eastern_Conference such as the Hawks ( 19 - 44 ) . It 's safe to say the Warriors cruised , though , They built a 12 - point lead at halftime and never looked back , and even though Atlanta won the last 2 quarters ( 34 - 28 and 25 - 24 , respectively ) , Golden_State was never in danger of losing this game . Kevin_Durant led the way for the Warriors with 28 points , 5 assists , 3 rebounds and 2 blocks . Klay_Thompson had 15 points , and Nick_Young chipped in with 16 points off the bench . The Oklahoma_City Thunder defeated the host Phoenix Suns , 124 - 116 , at Talking_Stick_Resort_Arena on Friday evening . The Suns got out to a solid start at home , leading 20 - 13 mid way through the first and held on to take a 37 - 32 lead after 1 . They kept the momentum through the second quarter , where they expanded their lead to 10 , before settling on a 67 - 60 lead at halftime . The Suns kept up the strong play to start the third , and held a 10 - point lead at the 6 - minute mark of the quarter . However the Thunder powered their way back into the game with an 18 - 10 run to close the quarter , which cut the deficit to just 2 , so that they trailed 99 - 97 heading into the final frame . They started the fourth with a quick 50 run to overtake the lead and stayed ahead until around the 2 - minute mark , where the Suns pulled ahead again , owning a 2 point advantage with 1:40 to go . Russell_Westbrook led the Thunder with 43 points , 14 rebounds , 8 assists , 1 steal and 1 block , in 40 minutes . Paul_George followed up with 20 points , 5 rebounds , 5 assists , 2 steals and 2 blocks , while Carmelo_Anthony added 14 points , 8 rebounds and 2 assists . The Thunder shot 48 percent from the field , including 11 - of - 34 from long range . Meanwhile , Devin_Booker had another huge game for the Suns , with 39 points on 16 - of - 28 shooting , in 39 minutes . Josh_Jackson and TJ_Warren added 19 points each , while Elfrid_Payton finished with 18 points , 10 rebounds , 8 assists , 2 steals and 2 blocks . The Suns shot 48 percent from the field , including 11 - of - 25 from long range .

The Hawks ( 20 - 46 ) had only notched 5 wins in 31 tries away from Philips_Arena prior to landing in the Hoosier State , and the first quarter of Friday 's game played out exactly like 1 would expect a matchup between a playoff - caliber team and a unit with no postseason aspirations at this stage of the season would . Once Indiana expanded their edge by 8 additional points courtesy of a 34 - point third period , the game was effectively decided . He also dished out 5 dimes , hauled down 2 rebounds and recorded 1 steal . Thaddeus_Young managed just 4 points , 2 rebounds , 1 assist and 2 steals .

The Trail_Blazers got off to a good start , as they led for most of the first quarter before taking a 33 - 27 lead into the second . The Warriors cut the deficit to 2 in the final minutes of the half , but the Trail_Blazers made run to push their lead back to 9 , as they took a 61 - 52 lead into halftime . The Warriors came out strong in the third quarter and began chipping away until they finally overtook the lead , 75 - 73 , with 4:30 left in the quarter , however the Trail_Blazers battled back to reclaim an 87 - 83 lead heading into the final frame . Damian_Lillard followed up with 28 points , 8 assists and 4 rebounds , while Jusuf_Nurkic added 10 points , 11 rebounds and 1 assist . Ed_Davis was big off the bench , with 10 points , 15 rebounds , 4 assists , 1 steal and 1 block , in 26 minutes . Evan_Turner and Zach_Collins added 12 points each off the bench . The Trail_Blazers shot 49 percent from the field , including 16 - of - 39 from long range . Meanwhile , Kevin_Durant led Golden_State with 40 points on 12 - of - 21 shooting . Klay_Thompson followed up with 25 points , while the only other player to score in double_digit for the Warriors was JaVale_McGee who added 10 points . Draymond_Green tallied 7 points , 12 rebounds , 6 assists and 3 steals , while Stephen_Curry ( ankle ) was sidelined . The Warriors shot 49 percent from the field , including 12 - of - 28 from deep .
The Heat ( 36 - 31 ) came into the contest riding a wave of strong play , as they 'd emerged victorious in 5 of their previous 7 games . However , the Wizards ( 38 - 29 ) had proven to be a rather tough puzzle to solve for them this season , as they 'd notched wins in 2 of 3 tries against Miami . The contest was then essentially decided in the third period , as the Heat racked up a whopping 43 points to enter the final 12 minutes with a 27 - point cushion . The Los_Angeles Lakers overcame the Cleveland Cavaliers , 127 - 113 , at Staples_Center on Sunday evening . Julius_Randle had a career - high 36 points to lead the Lakers ( 30 - 36 ) to victory . He added 14 rebounds and 7 assists in what was a career night for the fourth - year forward . Los_Angeles exploited the weak defense of Cleveland ( 38 - 28 ) , shooting 50 percent from the field and knocking down 13 three_pointers . While LeBron_James continued to excel , scoring 24 points along with 10 rebounds and 7 assists , the Cavaliers could not get the job done . Jordan_Clarkson , who was acquired by Cleveland in a deadline - day trade from Los_Angeles , shot just 1 - of - 8 in his return to his former home court .

The Sixers quickly reduced the lead and they made it a 4 - point game heading into the fourth quarter , but Indiana managed to survive and secured a massive win against a potential playoff contender . New_Orleans came out blazing , as a 36 - 20 first quarter was too much for Portland to overcome . The assist - to - turnover differential was the decisive statistic , with New_Orleans handing out 27 assists to 12 turnovers while Portland recorded just 19 assists to 24 turnovers . That led to the Pelicans connecting on 53 percent from the field and 41 percent from three_point range while the Trail_Blazers hit just 46 percent from the field and 29 percent from long range . The 16 steals recorded by New_Orleans marked a franchise record for the playoffs , as they also won the fastbreak differential , 32 - 13 , and the points in the paint battle , 62 - 50 .
