The Utah Jazz defeated the visiting Oklahoma_City Thunder , 96 - 91 , in Game 6 of the Western_Conference first - round playoffs , at Vivint_Smart_Home_Arena on Friday evening . The Thunder started out well , with a 22 - 18 lead through the first quarter . Despite losing Ricky_Rubio early in the game due to a hamstring injury , the Jazz carried the momentum into the third , where Donovan_Mitchell led the way to help his team outscore the Thunder 37 - 29 in the quarter and take a 78 - 70 lead into the final frame . Nonetheless , the Jazz closed out the game at the foul line , as Donovan_Mitchell hit 2 , to cap off his team - high 38 points . Donovan_Mitchell shot 14 - of - 26 from the field , and finished with 4 rebounds , 2 assists and 1 steal , in a team - high 40 minutes of action . Derrick_Favors followed up with 13 points on 6 - of - 9 shooting , 8 rebounds , 2 blocks , 1 assist and 1 steal , while Joe_Ingles and Rudy_Gobert added 12 points each . Meanwhile , Russell_Westbrook led OKC with 46 points on 18 - of - 43 shooting , 10 rebounds , 5 assists and 2 steals , in 44 minutes of action . Steven_Adams followed up with 19 points on 9 - of - 11 shooting , 16 rebounds , 3 assists , 1 steal and 1 block , in 39 minutes . Carmelo_Anthony added 7 points , while Paul_George finished with just 5 points .
The Cleveland Cavaliers defeated the visiting Indiana Pacers , 105 - 101 , in Game 7 of the Eastern_Conference first - round playoffs at Quicken_Loans_Arena on Sunday . The Pacers ( 3 - 4 ) were led by Victor_Oladipo , as he tallied 30 points , 12 rebounds , 6 assists and 3 steals . Darren_Collison accrued 23 points and 2 assists . Thaddeus_Young generated 14 points , 10 rebounds and 4 assists . No other player had more than 10 points or 5 rebounds , as Myles_Turner , Domantas_Sabonis and Bogdan Bojan_Bogdanovic all battled foul trouble . The Cavaliers ( 4 - 3 ) got yet another gem out of LeBron_James , as he collected 45 points , 8 rebounds , 7 assists and 4 steals . Tristan_Thompson totaled 15 points and 10 rebounds on 5 - of - 6 shooting . Kevin_Love amassed 14 points , 6 rebounds and 2 assists . Geroge George_Hill was a nice spark off the bench , providing 11 points , 6 rebounds and 3 assists .
The New_Orleans Pelicans defeated the Golden_State Warriors , 119 - 100 , in Game 3 of the Western_Conference semi - finals at Smoothie_King_Center on Friday . The Pelicans quickly jumped to a 30 - 21 lead in the first quarter , but the Warriors shortened the game with a 35 - 32 second quarter that made it a 6 - point game at half time . A 30 - 19 third quarter and a 27 - 25 fourth quarter were enough to put the Pelicans on top on dominant fashion . Anthony_Davis was the best player for the Pelicans since he finished with 33 points , 18 rebounds , 3 assists and 4 steals . Rajon_Rondo might have only scored 4 points , but he delivered 21 assists and also added 10 rebounds . Nikola_Mirotic chipped in with 16 points and 13 rebounds , and Jrue_Holiday added 21 points of his own . Ian_Clark came through off the bench and registered 18 points ( 7 - 11 FG ) . Klay_Thompson led the way for the Warriors with 26 points and 7 rebounds , while Kevin_Durant added 22 points on 8 - 18 from the field . Stephen_Curry had 19 points , but only made 6 of his 19 shots . Draymond_Green came quite close to another triple_double since he finished the game with 11 points , 12 rebounds and 9 assists , but 9 turnovers as well .
The Houston Rockets defeated the Utah Jazz , 113 - 92 , at Vivint_Smart_Home_Arena on Friday evening in Game 3 of their Western_Conference semifinal - round playoff series . The Rockets ( 2 - 1 ) were looking for some redemption after having unexpectedly dropped Game 2 at Toyota_Center by a 116 - 108 score , their first loss to the Jazz ( 1 - 2 ) in 6 combined meetings between the regular season and postseason . Accordingly , they came out Friday with what was clearly an enhanced level of focus , jumping out to a 39 - 22 first - quarter advantage in enemy territory . Stellar shooting and above - average ball security were both keys to Houston 's performance , as they drained 49 percent of their 86 attempts and only turned the ball over on 8 occasions . Given the lopsided score , the visitors ' bench saw plenty of run , leading to reserve guard Eric_Gordon drawing even with James_Harden for the team lead in scoring with 25 points . James_Harden added 12 assists , 4 rebounds , 2 steals and 1 block to his point total , while Eric_Gordon also compiled 2 rebounds and 1 steal . Chris_Paul followed with 15 points , 7 rebounds , 6 assists and 1 steal . Clint_Capela generated 11 points , 8 rebounds , 4 assists , 4 blocks and 2 steals over 30 minutes . Trevor_Ariza matched Clint_Capela 's scoring total and added 3 boards , 2 assists , 1 steal and 1 block . PJ_Tucker supplied 9 points and 5 rebounds . Royce_O'Neale was the surprising leader for the Jazz in scoring with 17 points , a total he supplemented with 5 boards and 1 assist . Alec_Burks followed with a bench - leading 14 points and added 4 boards and 1 assist . Rudy_Gobert tallied 12 points , 9 rebounds , 2 assists and 2 blocks . Donovan_Mitchell totaled 10 points , 3 assists and 1 rebound . Raul_Neto provided 8 points , 4 assists , 3 rebounds and 2 steals . Joe_Ingles shot just 2 - for - 10 from the field on his way to 6 points .
The Boston Celtics defeated the Philadelphia 76ers in overtime , 101 - 98 , at Wells_Fargo_Center on Saturday evening in Game 3 of their Eastern_Conference semifinal - round playoff series . The Celtics ( 30 ) may just have the Sixers ' ( 0 - 3 ) number . Jayson_Tatum paced the Celtics with 24 points , a total he supplemented with 5 rebounds , 4 assists and 1 steal . Terry_Rozier poured in 18 points and added 7 rebounds , 3 assists and 2 steals . Jaylen_Brown provided a bench - leading 16 points , which he complemented with 9 rebounds , 2 blocks and 1 steal . Al_Horford finished with 13 points , 6 rebounds , 2 assists , 3 blocks and 2 steals . Marcus_Smart and Marcus_Morris generated matching 9 - point tallies , with the former adding 3 assists , 2 rebounds , 2 steals and 1 block before fouling out late in the fourth quarter , and the latter hauling in 7 boards , dishing out 3 assists and recording 1 block . Aron_Baynes mustered 7 points but also hauled in 10 rebounds and dished out 3 assists . Joel_Embiid led the way for the Sixers with a 22 - point , 19 - rebound double_double that also included 2 assists , 1 steal and 1 block . JJ_Redick generated 18 points , 2 rebounds , 2 assists and 2 steals . Ben_Simmons tallied 16 points , 8 rebounds , 8 assists , 2 blocks and 1 steal . Ersan_Ilyasova finished with 14 points , 7 rebounds , 2 assists and 1 block . Marco_Belinelli netted 12 points overall and also managed 4 rebounds and 3 assists . Dario_Saric accounted for 11 points , 5 rebounds , 3 assists , 3 steals and 1 block .
The Houston Rockets defeated the host Utah Jazz , 100 - 87 , in Game 4 of the Western_Conference semi - finals at Vivint_Smart_Home_Arena on Sunday . Defense was key for Houston , as they held Utah to just 39 percent from the field and 24 percent from three_point range . They also forced 16 turnovers from the Jazz while recording 11 steals and 9 blocks . Utah forced just 13 turnovers from Houston while recording 8 steals and 5 blocks . The Rockets ( 3 - 1 ) were led by Chris_Paul , as he tallied 27 points , 12 rebounds , 6 assists and 2 steals . James_Harden accrued 24 points , 4 rebounds , 3 assists and 4 steals . Clint_Capela was a presence down low , finishing with 12 points , 15 rebounds , 2 assists , 2 steals and 6 blocks . The Jazz ( 1 - 3 ) were led by Donovan_Mitchell , as he collected 25 points , 9 rebounds , 2 assists and 4 steals . Joe_Ingles amassed 15 points , 8 rebounds and 4 assists . Rudy_Gobert totaled 11 points , 10 rebounds and 3 blocks .
The Boston Celtics defeated the visiting Cleveland Cavaliers , 96 - 83 , at TD_Garden in Game 5 of the Eastern_Conference Finals on Wednesday . Boston quickly jumped to a 32 - 19 lead in the first quarter , and they never looked back after that . Cleveland won the second quarter 23 - 21 , but a 23 - 18 third - quarter for the C 's sealed the deal for good . Jayson_Tatum was the best player for the Celtics since he finished with 24 points , 7 rebounds , 4 assists , 4 steals and 2 blocks . Al_Horford contributed a double_double thanks to 15 points and 12 rebounds . Jaylen_Brown added 17 points , and the bench came through as well . Marcus_Morris and Marcus_Smart each finished with 13 points despite not starting . LeBron_James had 26 points , 10 rebounds and 5 assists , but also committed 6 turnovers , while Kevin_Love added 14 points with 7 rebounds , but the rest of the players did not work out
The Houston Rockets defeated the Golden_State Warriors , 98 - 94 , in Game 5 of the Western_Conference Finals at Toyota_Center on Thursday . While Houston held the lead for the entirety of the first half , there were 9 ties and 16 lead changes in the second half , as neither club led by more than 6 points for the final 27 minutes of action . The key for the Rockets was their defense , as they held the Warriors to 44 percent from the field and 38 percent from three_point range while winning the turnover differential , 16 - 10 . It 's not like Houston 's offense was any better though , as they hit just 37 percent from the field and 30 percent from long range . The Warriors ( 2 - 3 ) were led by Kevin_Durant , as he tallied 29 points and 4 rebounds . Klay_Thompson amassed 23 points and 4 boards . Stephen_Curry finished with 22 points , 7 rebounds , 6 assists and 4 steals . Draymond_Green was the only other Warrior with more than 4 points , as he collected 12 points , 15 rebounds and 4 assists . The Rockets ( 3 - 2 ) big 2 really struggled , as Chris_Paul and James_Harden combined to go just 11 - of - 40 from the field . With that said , James_Harden finished with 19 points , 3 rebounds , 4 assists and 2 steals while Chris_Paul accrued 20 points , 7 rebounds , 6 assists and 3 steals . Clint_Capela totaled 12 points and 14 boards . Eric_Gordon was huge off the bench , as he provided 24 points , 4 rebounds and 2 steals .
The Golden_State Warriors defeated the visiting Houston Rockets , 115 - 86 , in Game 6 of the Western_Conference Finals at Oracle_Arena on Saturday . Despite the fact that Houston led by 17 points at the end of the first quarter , Golden_State was able to prevail thanks to a dominant second half . The assist - to - turnover ratio was critical for the Warriors , as they recorded 26 assists to 12 turnovers while the Rockets handed out just 13 assists to 21 turnovers . Defense was also huge for Golden_State , as they recorded 11 steals and 10 blocks while holding Houston to under 40 percent from the field . The Rockets ( 3 - 3 ) were led by James_Harden , as he collected 32 points , 7 rebounds , 9 assists and 3 steals . Eric_Gordon tallied 19 points and 2 rebounds . Trevor_Ariza finished with 14 points and 4 boards . Clint_Capela led the team with 15 rebounds but provided just 2 points . Gerald_Green led the bench with 11 points . The Warriors ( 3 - 3 ) got 87 combined points from Stephen_Curry , Klay_Thompson and Kevin_Durant , as Klay_Thompson led the team with 35 points , 6 rebounds and 4 steals on 9 - of - 14 from three_point range . Kevin_Durant finished with 23 points , 7 rebounds and 4 assists while Stephen_Curry accrued 29 points , 5 rebounds , 6 assists and 3 blocks . Draymond_Green had an all - around gem , accumulating 4 points , 10 rebounds , 9 assists , 4 steals and 5 blocks .
The Cleveland Cavaliers defeated the Boston Celtics , 87 - 79 , in Game 7 of the Eastern_Conference Finals at TD_Garden on Sunday . Things got off to a strong start for the Celtics ( 3 - 4 ) , as the team scored 26 first - quarter points to take an 8 point lead . Cleveland ( 4 - 3 ) responded with an 80 run in the late second quarter to help cut the lead to just 4 points by halftime . It was an extremely poor offensive third quarter that cost Boston the game , as the team finished the third with only 13 points . The Celtics had their worst shooting performance of the playoffs , going just 7 - of - 39 from three_point range and shooting 34 percent from the field overall . LeBron_James once again led the Cavaliers with a terrific performance , scoring 35 points to go with 15 rebounds and 9 assists , all team highs . LeBron_James also finished with 2 blocks on the defensive end , including a highlight - reel swat on Terry_Rozier to stop a fast break . Jeff_Green added 19 points and 8 rebounds in his second start of the playoffs . The Cavaliers as a whole played relatively well , shooting 46 percent from the field and knocking down 9 three_pointers . For the Celtics , rookie Jayson_Tatum led the way with 24 points on 7 rebounds . Despite committing only 5 turnovers , Boston 's poor shooting on open looks led to a dismal 79 point total in the elimination game .
The Golden_State Warriors defeated the host Houston Rockets , 101 - 92 , in Game 7 of the Western_Conference Finals at Toyota_Center on Monday . Despite the fact that Houston captured a 15 - point lead in the first half , Golden_State was able to prevail thanks to a monster second half . In fact , the Warriors rode a 33 - 15 third quarter en route to their comeback , as the Rockets went 0 - of - 14 from three_point range in that quarter . The Warriors ( 4 - 3 ) got a near triple_double out of Stephen_Curry , as he collected 27 points , 9 rebounds , 10 assists and 4 steals . Kevin_Durant led the team with 34 points , 5 rebounds , 5 assists and 3 blocks . Klay_Thompson totaled 19 points , 3 rebounds and 1 assists . Draymond_Green accumulated 10 points , 13 rebounds and 5 assists . The Rockets ( 3 - 4 ) were led by James_Harden , as he accrued 32 points , 6 rebounds , 6 assists and 4 steals on just 12 - of - 29 from the field . Eric_Gordon finished with 23 points , 3 rebounds and 6 assists . Trevor_Ariza really hurt his team , as he went 0 - of - 12 from the field and failed to score . Clint_Capela amassed 20 points and 9 rebounds on 9 - of - 10 shooting . PJ_Tucker generated 14 points , 12 rebounds , 2 assists and 4 steals .
The Golden_State Warriors defeated the visiting Cleveland Cavaliers , 122 - 103 , in Game 2 of the NBA_Finals , at Oracle_Arena on Sunday evening . They outscored the Cavs 27 - 18 in the quarter and carried a 59 - 46 lead into halftime . The Warriors pulled away in the fourth quarter , led by a barrage of ridiculous three_pointers by Stephen_Curry , who set an NBA_Finals record with 9 threes in the game . Stephen_Curry led the Warriors with 33 points , 8 assists , 7 rebounds and 1 steal , in 38 minutes . Kevin_Durant followed up with 26 points , 9 rebounds , 7 assists and 2 blocks , while Klay_Thompson tallied 20 points on 8 - of - 13 shooting . The Warriors shot 57 percent from the field , including 15 - of - 36 from long range . Meanwhile , LeBron_James led the Cavs with 29 points , 13 assists , 9 rebounds , and 2 steals , in 44 minutes . Kevin_Love followed up with 22 points , 10 rebounds , 2 steals , 1 assist and 1 block , while George_Hill added 15 points , 3 assists , 2 rebounds , 2 steals and 1 block . The Cavs shot 41 percent from the field , including 9 - of - 28 from long range .
The New_York Knicks defeated the visiting Atlanta Hawks , 126 - 107 , at Madison_Square_Garden on Wednesday . In fact , the Knicks rode a 49 - 25 second quarter to victory , as the Hawks never got the game within a single - digit margin for the entirety of the second half . Bench production was the difference for New_York , as they outscored Atlanta 's bench , 56 - 39 . Defense was also critical for the Knicks , as they recorded 12 steals and 6 blocks while winning the turnover differential , 24 - 15 . The Hawks ( 0 - 1 ) were led by Taurean_Prince , as he tallied 21 points , 6 rebounds and 6 assists . Trae_Young accumulated 14 points , 6 rebounds and 5 assists . Kent_Bazemore provided 14 points , 6 boards and 2 steals . Vince_Carter was the only other Hawk in double_figures , as he dropped 12 points . The Knicks ( 10 ) got a gem out of Tim_Hardaway_Jr. , as he led the way with 31 points , 6 rebounds , 5 assists and 2 steals . Enes_Kanter totaled 16 points , 11 rebounds and 3 assists . Trey_Burke started at point guard and provided 15 points , 3 rebounds and 4 assists .

Terrence_Ross led the team in scoring off the bench , dropping 14 points .

The first quarter was tight the whole way , but the Jazz emerged with a 34 - 32 lead heading into the second . The second stayed close until Jazz turned up the heat with an 18 - 8 run , to take an 81 - 69 lead into halftime . Utah was able to maintain a good cushion through most of the third , but the Warriors closed the quarter strong and cut the deficit to just 6 , heading into the fourth . Kevin_Durant led the way for Golden_State , with 38 points , 9 rebounds , 7 assists , 1 steal and 1 block , in 40 minutes . Stephen_Curry followed up with 31 points , 8 assists , 4 rebounds and 2 steals , while Draymond_Green tallied 14 points 9 rebounds , 6 assists , 2 blocks and 1 steal , in 33 minutes . Meanwhile , Joe_Ingles was the high - point man for the Jazz , with 27 points on 10 - of - 15 shooting , in 36 minutes of action . Donovan_Mitchell followed up with 19 points , while Jae_Crowder chipped in 17 points , 7 rebounds . The Jazz shot 45 percent from the field , including 19 - of - 46 from long range .
The Toronto Raptors defeated the host Washington Wizards , 117 - 113 , at Capital One Arena on Saturday evening . The Wizards started out well , but the Raptors overtook them late in the quarter to hold a 24 - 22 advantage heading into the second . The second quarter stayed close until Toronto pulled away late to amass a 10 - point . The Raptors turned it around again as they closed the quarter on a 20 - 9 run , to take a 90 - 82 advantage into the final frame . Kyle_Lowry led the Raptors with 28 points , 12 assists , 3 rebounds , 1 steal and 1 block , in 35 minutes . Jonas_Valanciunas and Serge_Ibaka chipped in 16 points each , as well as provided a combined 16 rebounds . Fred_VanVleet added 13 points , 5 assists and 4 rebounds , in 27 minutes off the bench . The Raptors shot 44 percent from the field , including 10 - of - 29 from long range . Meanwhile , Bradley_Beal had a big night with 32 points , 6 assists , 3 rebounds , 1 steal and 1 block , while John_Wall followed up with 25 points , 6 assists , 4 rebounds , 4 steals and 1 block .
The visiting San_Antonio Spurs defeated the Los_Angeles Lakers , 143 - 142 , at Staples_Center in overtime on Monday evening . In addition to his clutch put - back , LaMarcus_Aldridge scored a game - high 37 points in the tense win . He added 10 rebounds and 5 assists . His fellow All-Star , the newly - acquired DeMar_DeRozan , scored 32 points and dished out a whopping 14 assists to lead the team . Rudy_Gay contributed another 16 points . In their absence , LeBron_James picked up the slack , scoring 32 points , grabbing 8 rebounds , and matching DeMar_DeRozan 's game high of 14 assists . Sophomore forward Kyle_Kuzma added a whopping 37 points in the loss .
The Atlanta Hawks defeated the Dallas Mavericks , 111 - 104 , at State Farm Arena on Wednesday evening . The Hawks ( 2 - 2 ) found themselves in some dire straits early , falling behind by a 42 - 22 margin after 1 quarter . However , Atlanta continued to have the hot hand throughout the third quarter , posting 32 points and chipping off another three_points from the Mavericks ' ( 2 - 2 ) advantage . Their persistence culminated in a dominant final 12 minutes in which they outscored Dallas by a 31 - 17 margin to secure the comeback win . While neither club shot particularly well , a 10 - point advantage in free_throw accuracy for the Hawks ( 71 percent - 62 percent ) was key to the home squad 's success . Wesley_Matthews paced the Mavericks with 23 points , a total he supplemented with 3 rebounds and 2 assists . Luka_Doncic followed with a near double_double of 21 points , 9 boards , 2 assists , 1 steal and 1 block . Dennis_Smith_Jr. contributed 16 points , 7 rebounds and 6 assists , while DeAndre_Jordan and Maxi_Kleber had matching 11 - point tallies , DeAndre_Jordan notably also hauled in 16 rebounds . Kent_Bazemore 's 32 points , which he supplemented with 7 assists , 3 rebounds and 3 steals , led the Hawks . Taurean_Prince mustered 24 points , 4 rebounds and 3 assists . Tre Trae_Young shot 3 - for - 12 from the field , but a 10 - for - 13 showing from the charity stripe helped lead to 17 points for the rookie . He added 5 assists and 4 rebounds . DeAndre ' DeAndre'_Bembry pitched in an 11 - point , 16 - rebound double_double off the bench .
The Toronto Raptors defeated the Minnesota Timberwolves , 112 - 105 , at Scotiabank Arena on Wednesday night . The Raptors ( 50 ) are showing early in the season why they should be considered as 1 of the top teams in the Eastern_Conference and they had no problems to dismantle a combative Timberwolves ( 2 - 3 ) squad that fought this game until the very end . However , the Raptors were in control early on and they never let it go : they jumped to a 26 - 19 lead in the first quarter and increased their lead to 9 points at the break following a 31 - 29 second quarter . Kawhi_Leonard led the way for Toronto with 35 points , 5 rebounds , 2 assists , 2 steals and 2 blocks , while Kyle_Lowry once again posted a double_double with 13 points and 10 assists , while also adding 6 rebounds and 4 steals . Serge_Ibaka contributed with 15 points , while Jonas_Valanciunas came close to post another double_double off the bench with 16 points and 9 rebounds in 20 minutes . Norman_Powell added 10 points . Jimmy_Butler once again led the Timberwolves with 23 points but he also filled the stat sheet with 6 steals , 5 assists and 4 rebounds . Taj_Gibson had 13 points with 6 rebounds , and Jeff_Teague finished with 12 points and 9 assists . Karl-Anthony_Towns disappointed , though , since he only had 12 points and 8 boards .

The Sacramento Kings defeated the visiting Washington Wizards , 116 - 112 , at Golden_One_Center on Friday evening . The Wizards kept up the push in the second quarter , where they took the lead early on and held on to outscore the Kings by 7 , to take a 61 - 55 lead into halftime . The Kings came out strong in the third and initiated a series of lead changes between the 2 teams , which ultimately led to them matching each other point - for - point in the quarter , and the Wizards carrying an 85 - 79 lead into the fourth . However , the Kings started the fourth on a 70 run to take a 1 - point lead just 2:30 into the quarter . After a couple more lead changes , the Kings took a 1 - point lead with 6:18 remaining , and quickly pushed the lead to 5 . Although the Wizards got within 1 point in the final seconds , the Kings were able to stay on top and earn the impressive home win . Nemanja_Bjelica led Sacramento with 26 points , 12 rebounds , 3 assists , 1 steal and 1 block , in 36 minutes . Buddy_Hield followed up with 22 points , 5 rebounds , 2 assists and 1 block , while De'Aaron_Fox tallied 18 points , 9 assists , 1 rebound and 1 steal . Kelly_Oubre_Jr. followed up with 22 points , 9 rebounds , 2 assists , 1 block and 1 steal , while Bradley_Beal tallied 21 points , 5 rebounds and 2 steals , in 39 minutes . The Wizards shot 46 percent from the field , including 14 - of - 41 from long range .
The Golden_State Warriors defeated the Brooklyn Nets , 120 - 114 , at Barclays_Center on Sunday evening . The Warriors ( 6 - 1 ) looked in absolute control of the game in this contest , the second of their 3 - game road trip , although things ended being far tighter than expected since the Nets ( 2 - 4 ) mounted a charge in the fourth quarter and came quite close to force an overtime . Golden_State jumped to a 32 - 29 lead in the first quarter , and were pretty consistent the rest of the way since they also won the subsequent 2 quarters , 31 - 20 and 30 - 28 , so they entered the final 12 minutes of action up by 16 points ( 93 - 77 ) . Stephen_Curry was the top scorer for the Warriors with 35 points , 7 rebounds and 3 assists , while Kevin_Durant contributed with 34 points , 8 rebounds and 6 assists . Klay_Thompson chipped in with 18 points , and Draymond_Green did an excellent job of filling out the stat sheet since he posted a line of 8 points , 4 rebounds , 13 assists and 5 steals . Alfonzo_McKinnie added with 9 points and 5 boards . D'Angelo_Russell was the best player for the Nets since he finished with 25 points , 6 rebounds and 6 assists , while Caris_LeVert chipped in with 23 points and 7 assists . Jarrett_Allen had 11 points , 3 rebounds and 4 assists . Two players thrived off the bench , as Allen_Crabbe finished with 14 points , and Spencer_Dinwiddie added 12 of his own .
The Oklahoma_City Thunder defeated the Phoenix Suns , 117 - 110 , at Chesapake Energy Arena on Sunday evening . Oklahoma_City enjoyed a prolific first half on offense , racking up 62 points by halftime and 96 through 3 quarters . The Thunder drained 51 percent of its shots and also goaded the visitors into 22 turnovers , both keys to victory . Elie_Okobo and TJ_Warren co - led the Suns with matching 18 - point tallies off the bench . Elie_Okobo added 7 assists and 5 rebounds over 31 minutes , while TJ_Warren also supplied 8 boards and 1 block . The Pelican 's starting backcourt was n't too far behind , with E'Twaun_Moore scoring a very efficient 24 points on 11 - of - 16 shooting , while Jrue_Holiday added 21 points and 9 assists of his own . Julius_Randle , however , might have had the key performance off the bench , notching a triple_double of 21 points , 14 rebounds and 10 assists in just 25 minutes . In the end , New_Orleans hot shooting was simply too much for the Spurs to handle , as the home team shot a scorching 58 percent from the field Monday night . As for San_Antonio , its offensive performance was nothing to scoff at , as the Spurs shot 50 percent from 3 and 48 percent from the field overall . DeMar_DeRozan led the way with 21 points , while Bryn_Forbes was close behind with 20 points on an efficient 7 - of - 8 shooting . Dante_Cunningham was perfect from the field ( 7 - 7 FG , 5 - 5 3PT ) on his way to a surprising 19 points , while Rudy_Gay added 17 of his own . What really killed the Spurs on Monday was their inability to take care of the basketball , committing an uncharacteristic 15 turnovers .
The Sacramento Kings took down the visiting Oklahoma_City Thunder , 117 - 113 , at Golden_One_Center on Monday . That changed in the final minute , though , when a last - ditch Thunder ( 10 - 6 ) run closed the gap to just 1 possession . Sophomore guard De'Aaron_Fox scored only 6 points , but made up for it with a game - high 13 assists . The bulk of Sacramento 's scoring came from Buddy_Hield , who poured in 25 points , and Iman_Shumpert , who had a season - high 23 in the win . Paul_George , meanwhile , scored 27 points

That allowed them to enter the final 12 minutes with a 95 - 86 lead , 1 that they 'd preserve by showing some impressive killer instinct while outpacing their visitors by a 39 - 23 fourth - quarter margin . A 33 - 23 first quarter really set the tone , as the Wizards held the lead for the final 45 minutes of action . In fact , Washington led by at least 15 points for the entirety of the second half , as they led by 23 points heading into the fourth quarter . The Wizards offense was unstoppable , as they connected on 51 percent from the field and 42 percent from three_point range while recording 30 assists . Their defense was huge as well , as they won the rebounding battle , 51 - 43 while picking up 14 steals . The Lakers ( 18 - 12 ) were led by Kyle_Kuzma , as he tallied 20 points , 6 rebounds and 3 assists . LeBron_James finished with just 13 points , 6 rebounds and 3 assists . Lonzo_Ball collected 10 points , 5 rebounds , 4 assists , 3 steals and 2 blocks . Kentavious_Caldwell-Pope led the bench with 25 points , 6 rebounds and 5 assists . The Wizards ( 12 - 18 ) got a vintage performance from John_Wall , as he accumulated 40 points , 6 rebounds , 14 assists , 3 steals and 2 blocks . Bradley_Beal accrued 25 points , 12 rebounds and 3 assists . Jeff_Green started and totaled 20 points and 7 boards . Sam_Dekker had a season - high 20 points , 5 rebounds , 4 assists and 3 steals to lead the bench .
The San Ajntonio Spurs defeated the Orlando Magic , 129 - 90 , at Amway_Center on Wednesday evening . The Spurs ( 17 - 15 ) came into the contest running hot , having claimed wins in 5 of their prior 6 times on the court . San_Antonio set the tone by forging a 66 - 44 halftime lead that essentially sealed the win for them in just 2 quarters . However , they put the final nail in the coffin in the third quarter by compiling 38 points , a prolific amount they accomplished with excellent shooting up and down the roster . The Spurs finished with a 63 percent success rate from the floor , including 63 percent from three_point range . They were just as effective on the other end by limiting Orlando to a meager 38 percent figure . LaMarcus_Aldridge paced the Spurs with 20 points , a total he supplemented with 4 assists , 3 rebounds and 2 steals . Marco_Belinelli poured in 18 points to lead the bench . DeMar_DeRozan and Bryn_Forbes contributed matching 17 - point tallies . DeMar_DeRozan added 7 rebounds , 6 assists and 1 steal , while Bryn_Forbes posted 4 boards . Rudy_Gay supplied 14 points , 6 rebounds , 3 assists and 1 block . DJ_Augustin led the Magic with 17 points and added 2 assists and 0 steal . Aaron_Gordon contributed 12 points , 9 rebounds and 7 assists . Evan_Fournier matched Aaron_Gordon 's scoring total and also collected 2 rebounds , 1 assist and 1 steal . Jonathan_Isaac delivered 10 points , 5 rebounds and 1 assist . Mo_Bamba drew the start for Nikola_Vucevic and contributed 7 points , 8 rebounds , 2 assists , 2 steals and 2 blocks .
The Utah Jazz defeated the host Portland Trail_Blazers , 120 - 90 , at Moda_Center on Friday evening . They held most of their cushion through the second , while the home team battled , and led 55 - 49 at halftime . The Jazz came out strong again in the third and outscored the Trail_Blazers by 9 in the quarter to push their lead to 15 heading into the final frame . The Jazz did not leave anything to chance , as they pulverized the Trail_Blazers down the stretch , outscoring them by 15 in the quarter , to complete the 30 - point road win . Ricky_Rubio led the Jazz with 24 points , 8 assists , 2 rebounds , 1 block and 1 steal , in 27 minutes . Kyle_Korver followed up with 18 points , 4 rebounds , 2 assists and 1 steal , in 26 minutes off the bench , while Joe_Ingles finished with 15 points , 7 assists , 5 rebounds and 1 steal . The Jazz shot 55 percent from the field , including 16 - of - 31 from long range . Meanwhile , Damian_Lillard led the Trail_Blazers with 19 points , 4 rebounds , 3 steals , 2 assists and 2 blocks , in 34 minutes . CJ_McCollum and Evan_Turner chipped in 12 points each , while Jusuf_Nurkic finished with 10 points , 10 rebounds , 4 assists , 2 blocks and 1 steal . The Trail_Blazers shot 40 percent from the field .
The Los_Angeles Clippers defeated the visiting Denver Nuggets , 132 - 111 . at Staples_Center on Saturday . Rebounding was huge for Los_Angeles , as they won that battle , 56 - 37 . The Clippers ended up shooting 58 percent from the field and 50 percent from three_point range while holding the Nuggets to 42 percent from the field and 29 percent from long range . The Nuggets ( 21 - 10 ) leading scorer was actually ejected in the third quarter , as Nikola_Jokic tallied 19 points , 6 rebounds and 3 assists before being handed 2 technicals for arguing . Jamal_Murray totaled 18 points , 3 rebounds and 2 assists . Monte_Morris led the bench with 15 points and 5 assists while Malik_Beasley amassed 11 points , 4 rebounds and 5 steals . The Clippers ( 19 - 13 ) were led by Danilo_Gallinari , as he accrued 21 points , 4 rebounds and 2 assists against his former team . Tobias_Harris matched those 21 points , adding 7 rebounds and 3 assists to his tally . Montrezl_Harrell was huge off the bench , providing 20 points and 10 boards on 9 - of - 11 shooting .
The Oklahoma_City Thunder defeated the host Utah Jazz , 107 - 106 , at Vivint_Smart_Home_Arena on Saturday evening . The Jazz got out to a strong start at home with a 6 - point lead after 1 quarter . They pushed their lead to double_digit early in the second , but the Thunder were able to rally back and cut the deficit to just 3 , as they trailed 61 - 58 at halftime . The Thunder carried the momentum into the third , where they outscored the home team by 15 , to take a 93 - 81 lead into the final frame . The Jazz kept fighting and managed to make it at 4 - point game with 2 minutes remaining . The Thunder did not score in the final 2 minutes of the game but were able to slip away with the 1 - point win . Paul_George led the Thunder with 43 points , 14 rebounds , 6 assists , 5 steals and 1 block , in 40 minutes . Steven_Adams followed up with 15 points , 10 rebounds , 1 steal and 1 block , while Jerami_Grant added 15 points , 7 rebounds , 2 blocks and 1 steal . Russell_Westbrook finished with 8 points , 12 rebounds , 9 assists and 3 steals . Meanwhile , Rudy_Gobert tallied 20 points , 10 rebounds and 1 block , in 34 minutes for the Jazz . Donovan_Mitchell added 20 points , 9 rebounds , 6 assists and 1 steal , while Ricky_Rubio finished with 12 points , 14 assists , 7 rebounds and 3 steals . The Jazz shot 45 percent from the field , including 11 - of - 34 from long range .
The Indiana Pacers defeated the Washington Wizards , 105 - 89 , at Bankers_Life_Fieldhouse on Sunday evening . The third quarter made all the difference , as Indiana outscored the Wizards ( 13 - 21 ) by a 31 - 18 margin during the period . Washington was clearly dealing with some fatigue in the second half , which was reflected in their 37 percent success rate from the field and 22 turnovers . They were also significantly out - hustled on the boards , losing the rebounding battle by a 57 - 37 margin . Markieff_Morris paced the Wizards with 16 points and added 6 rebounds , 1 assist and 1 steal . Thomas_Bryant produced 11 points and 7 rebounds . Jeff_Green tallied 10 points , 3 rebounds and 2 assists . Chasson_Randle contributed 10 points off the bench . Bradley_Beal ( 7 points , 5 assists , 4 rebounds , 1 steal ) and John_Wall ( 7 points , 5 rebounds , 5 assists , 1 steal ) had underwhelming performances . Domantas_Sabonis followed with 15 points , 10 rebounds , 3 assists and 2 blocks . Bojan_Bogdanovic finished with 14 points , 3 rebounds , 2 assists and 3 steals . Darren_Collison and Victor_Oladipo generated matching 12 - point tallies , with Victor_Oladipo also dishing out 9 assists . Aaron_Holiday poured in 12 points off the bench as well .
The Brooklyn Nets defeated the Phoenix Suns , 111 - 103 , at Barclays_Center on Sunday evening . The Nets ( 16 - 19 ) came into Sunday 's contest with a couple of built - in advantages , 1 of which was the fact they were on their home floor . However , to its credit , Phoenix came out and stayed close in the first quarter , trailing just 38 - 31 after 12 minutes . By the third quarter , fatigue apparently was settling in , as they scored just 18 points while Brooklyn added 10 more points to what had been a 63 - 56 halftime edge . Deandre_Ayton showed he still had plenty of life left in his legs by leading the Suns with a 26 - point , 18 - rebound double_double that also included 1 assist , 3 blocks and 2 steals . Devin_Booker followed with 25 points , 9 assists and 2 rebounds . Josh_Jackson led the bench with 11 points , 3 rebounds and 1 assist . Malik Mikal_Bridges mustered 9 points , 4 assists , 3 rebounds , 5 steals and 1 block . TJ_Warren had just 4 points on 2 - for - 11 shooting . Rodions_Kurucs followed with a 16 - point , 10 - rebound double_double that also included 2 assists and 1 block . Eric Ed_Davis posted 15 points , 9 boards , 3 steals and 1 block . Joe_Harris offered 13 points , 3 boards and 2 assists . Jarrett_Allen just missed a double_double with 11 points , 9 boards , 2 assists and 1 steal .
However , the Thunder ( 21 - 12 ) created some important distance in the second and took a 60 - 52 lead into halftime . The light went on for the Rockets ( 18 - 15 ) coming out of intermission , however , leading to a 61 - point second half that allowed them to hold off a strong push by OKC . As expected , each team 's star - studded starting 5 provided the bulk of the production , with the Thunder and Rockets benches generating just 20 and 19 points , respectively . Paul_George led the way for the Thunder with a 28 - point , 14 - rebound double_double that also included 2 assists and 3 steals . Russell_Westbrook posted a near triple_double with 21 points , 9 rebounds and 9 assists , also tallying 4 steals and 1 block . Steven_Adams managed 17 points , 7 rebounds , 3 assists and 1 steal . PJ_Tucker followed with 11 points , 7 rebounds and 2 steals . Austin_Rivers led the Houston second unit with 10 points .

The Sacramento Kings blew out the Orlando Magic , 111 - 95 , at Golden Once Center on Monday evening . Interior play was the key for the Kings , as they outscored the Magic ( 17 - 23 ) by a total of 64 - 24 in the paint . Sacramento shot 55 percent on shots inside the arc in the win . The Kings were led by a brilliant performance from sophomore guard De'Aaron_Fox , who scored a team - high 20 points in just 22 minutes on the floor . De'Aaron_Fox was also a menace on the defensive end , tallying 5 steals . Orlando , meanwhile , saw 20 points from veteran wing Terrence_Ross . Terrence_Ross went 5 - of - 10 from three_point range while playing just 23 minutes off the bench . Big man Nikola_Vucevic also impressed , delivering an 18 - point , 13 - rebound double_double . Their best efforts were not enough , however , as the Magic shot just 37 percent from the floor as a team .
The Indiana Pacers defeated the Cleveland Cavaliers , 123 - 115 , at Quicken_Loans_Arena on Tuesday . The Pacers ( 27 - 13 ) were an absolutely dominant team during the first half of this game against the Cavaliers ( 8 - 33 ) , as they quickly took control of the game and did n't look back . Indiana won the first quarter by a 38 - 16 differential , and that 22 - point lead practically ended the game after the first 12 minutes . The Pacers would end up losing the remaining 3 quarters ( 25 - 27 , 29 - 36 and 31 - 36 , respectively ) but it was n't enough since Cleveland were never able to come back from such a huge deficit following the first 12 minutes of action . Thaddeus_Young led the offense for the Pacers with 26 points , but he filled the stat sheet since he also added 5 rebounds , 3 assists and 2 steals . Bojan_Bogdanovic contributed 23 points , and Domantas_Sabonis chipped in with 15 points , 9 boards , 4 assists and 1 steals in a rare start . Victor_Oladipo had 17 points , and Cory_Joseph delivered 11 points and 6 assists off the bench . Cedi_Osman and Tristan_Thompson both had 15 points , but the Canadian big man did an excellent job on both ends of the court since he also added 13 rebounds , 5 assists and 2 blocks . Collin_Sexton added 14 points .

The Golden_State Warriors defeated the New_Orleans Pelicans , 147 - 140 , at Oracle_Arena on Wednesday . They fell behind early to the visiting , and surging , Pelicans ( 21 - 24 ) , who opened up a lead as large as 16 points in the third quarter and appeared to be pulling away . The 2 - time MVP hit 7 threes in the third period on his way to scoring 23 points and leading a furious comeback that had the Warriors miraculously up by 1 point heading into the final 12 minutes . Stephen_Curry finished with a game - high 41 points while shooting 9 - of - 17 from 3 , while Kevin_Durant added 30 points and 15 assists . As a team , Golden_State shot a ridiculous 24 - of - 49 ( 49 percent ) from 3 in the winning effort . The Pelicans , on the other hand , were even more impressive with their arial assault , as they shot a scorching 19 - of - 37 ( 51 percent ) from the field , but it would n't be enough . Anthony_Davis led the way as usual with 30 points , 18 rebounds and 7 assists in 41 minutes , while Nikola_Mirotic was close behind with 29 points in 29 minutes off the bench . New_Orleans ' third frontcourt star , Julius_Randle , shot just 6 - of - 8 from the field , but still managed to finish with 23 points in 22 minutes .
The Utah Jazz took down the Los_Angeles Clippers , 129 - 109 , at Staples_Center on Wednesday . Utah played a remarkably efficient game , shooting 51 percent from the field and reaching the free_throw line 37 times . Despite boasting 1 of the league 's highest - scoring offenses , the Clippers shot only 46 percent from the field and tallied just 49 first - half points . Utah saw an incredible 23 - points , 22 - rebound performance from star center Rudy_Gobert . The Jazz also enjoyed a team - high 28 points from sophomore guard Donovan_Mitchell . Big man Montrezl_Harrell , fresh off consecutive 20 - point performances , scored only 11 points off the bench on the night .

While the Thunder led for over 40 minutes of this game , there were still 5 ties and 9 lead changes in total . Steven_Adams totaled 16 points , 9 rebounds , 3 assists and 2 blocks while Dennis_Schroder led the bench with 21 points , 4 rebounds and 2 assists . The Sixers ( 30 - 17 ) were led by Joel_Embiid , as he collected 31 points , 8 rebounds and 6 assists . Ben_Simmons accrued 20 points , 14 rebounds and 9 assists . JJ_Redick amassed 22 points and 2 rebounds while Jimmy_Butler generated 18 points , 3 rebounds , 4 assists , 2 steals and 2 blocks .

The Los_Angeles Clippers defeated the Sacramento Kings , 122 - 108 , at Staples_Center on Sunday afternoon . The Clippers ( 28 - 22 ) have now won 4 out of their last 5 games and seem to be leaving behind an ugly 5 - game losing run that complicated their position in the standings , and they looked like the better side against the Kings ( 25 - 25 ) right from the beginning of the contest . The Clippers quickly jumped to a huge 34 - 21 lead following the first 12 minutes of action , and they never looked back from there . Los_Angeles also won the second quarter ( 33 - 30 ) and while Sacramento showed some signs of life in the third quarter , period they won 25 - 20 , it was n't enough to put the Clippers ' win in any sort of danger . Los_Angeles won the final quarter as well , 35 - 32 , and closed things out rather comfortably . Six Clippers scored in double_digit in this one and surprisingly , the top scorer came off the bench since Montrezl_Harrell had 25 points and 7 rebounds while going 11 - 13 from the field . Tobias_Harris had 18 points , and Patrick_Beverley delivered a strong double_double since he finished the contest with 16 points , 10 rebounds and 8 assists . Shai_Gilgeous-Alexander had 17 points , 5 assists and 4 rebounds . De'Aaron_Fox led the way for the Kings since he finished with 21 points , 4 rebounds and 3 assists . Iman_Shumpert and Buddy_Hield each contributed 16 points , although the latter also chipped in with 5 assists , 4 rebounds and 2 steals . Marvin_Bagley_III had 14 points off the bench , while Bogdan_Bogdanovic also impressed off the bench with 19 points in 31 minutes .

Adding insult to the injury , the Clippers won the third quarter 27 - 20 and the game was essentially over from there . The Clippers won the final quarter 19 - 18 , but they could n't mount any sort of a comeback and Indiana cruised their way to a solid win . The Toronto Raptors defeated the Atlanta Hawks , 119 - 101 , at Philips_Arena on Thursday . It was n't the prettiest start for the Raptors ( 40 - 16 ) , who were without star Kawhi_Leonard , on Thursday , as the team came out rather flat in the opening moments and fell behind 33 - 22 after the first quarter . The Hawks ' lead grew to as much as 17 points in the first half , but Toronto was able to trim it down to 8 before heading into the locker room . From there , the Raptors just poured it on the lowly Hawks , outscoring them 59 - 33 in the second half and taking home the easy victory . The young Raptors were sensational in Thursday 's game , with Pascal_Siakam scoring a game - high 33 points to go along with 14 rebounds , 4 assists and 2 steals in 40 minutes . Fred_VanVleet , meanwhile , was close behind with 30 points of his own on top of 5 rebounds and 6 assists . Kyle_Lowry could n't get much going from the field , hitting just 3 of his 13 field goal attempts , but he still managed to finish with a double_double of 13 points and 13 assists on top of 8 rebounds . As for the Hawks ( 18 - 36 ) , they were very efficient from downtown , going 16 - of - 35 ( 46 percent ) from behind the arc , but they just were not able to put together a strong enough defensive effort down the stretch . Dewayne_Dedmon was the only other Hawks player to score in double_figures with 10 points in 24 minutes .

The Minnesota Timberwolves defeated the Sacramento Kings , 112 - 105 , at Target_Center on Monday . Karl-Anthony_Towns was the catalyst behind a 20 - 1 run for Minnesota , and the team would end up taking a 10 - point lead into halftime . Karl-Anthony_Towns was a force down low in his return to the floor , posting a game - high 34 points , 21 rebounds , 5 assists and 2 blocks despite playing just 31 minutes due to foul trouble . Every point was needed from Karl-Anthony_Towns too , as he did n't have much support other than Derrick_Rose 's 20 points off the bench and starting point guard Tyus_Jones ' 16 points . Minnesota had to do most of its work inside , as nobody except Karl-Anthony_Towns could get it going from deep , with the team going a very poor 8 - of - 31 ( 26 percent ) from behind the arc . De'Aaron_Fox was close behind with 23 points of his own , but it was n't a very efficient night for the point guard , as he shot just 8 - of - 24 from the floor . Buddy_Hield and Corey_Brewer were the only other Kings players to score in double_figures with 18 and 12 points , respectively .

But the Trail_Blazers stepped it up and closed things out with a strong 37 - 28 period that gave the Western_Conference franchise their sixth win in their last 7 games . As a team , the Kings put together as efficient an offensive performance you could ask for , shooting 45 percent from 3 and 50 percent from the field overall , but Boston ended up making just 1 more play .

The Toronto Raptors defeated the Los_Angeles Lakers , 111 - 98 , on Thursday at Air_Canada_Centre . The Raptors ( 49 - 20 ) came into Thursday 's contest without 2 key players , with Kyle_Lowry ( ankle ) and Serge_Ibaka ( suspension ) both sidelined , but that did n't have much of an impact when it came to beating up on the lowly Lakers . Pascal_Siakam struggled mightily from the floor , going just 3 - of - 16 , but he still managed to finish with 16 points thanks to his ability to get to the free_throw line . Lastly , Normal Norman_Powell came up with a huge performance off the bench , scoring 20 points and grabbing 8 rebounds in 24 key minutes as a reserve . It was n't the most efficient offensive performance for the Raptors , however , as they shot 40 percent from the field , but the 16 threes they hit helped overcome that and propel them to victory . As for the Lakers ( 31 - 37 ) , they have now lost 6 of their last 7 games , and injuries have left them with a real lack of quality depth . Los_Angeles only had 3 guys who played double_digit minutes off the bench , and only 1 , Alex_Caruso , scored in double_figures with an impressive 16 - point outing . LeBron_James , of course , scored a game - high 29 points to go along with 4 rebounds and 6 assists across 32 minutes , while Rajon_Rondo 's 13 points made him the third and final Laker player to score in double_figures . As a team , what killed Los_Angeles was its inability to hit a shot from behind the arc , as the team shot a miserable 7 - of - 31 ( 23 percent ) from 3 Thursday night .

The Charlotte Hornets defeated the Minnesota Timberwolves , 113 - 106 , at Spectrum_Center on Thursday evening . The Timberwolves ( 32 - 40 ) came into Thursday 's contest looking to essentially play spoiler to a Hornets ( 32 - 39 ) squad still hanging on to hopes of an eighth seed in the Eastern_Conference . Minnesota was effective in its mission , matching Charlotte bucket for bucket in the first and trailing by only 3 at the half . After another deadlock in the third , the Hornets finally opened up a 10 - point lead with 1:42 remaining . Karl-Anthony_Towns paced the Timberwolves with a 21 - point , 16 - rebound double_double that also included 6 assists , 2 blocks and 1 steal . Andrew_Wiggins delivered 20 points , 5 rebounds , 2 assists and 1 steal . Dario_Saric posted 15 points , 7 rebounds and 1 assist . Tyus_Jones furnished 14 points , 7 assists , 2 rebounds and 2 steals . Gorgui_Dieng and Josh_Okogie contributed matching 10 - point tallies while hauling in 5 and 3 rebounds , respectively . Kemba_Walker led the Hornets with 31 points , adding 6 assists and 5 rebounds . Malik_Monk followed with a bench - leading 14 points and also provided 4 rebounds . Jeremy_Lamb and Marvin_Williams offered matching 13 - point totals , with Jeremy_Lamb also hauling in 10 rebounds . Miles_Bridges finished with 11 points , 12 rebounds , 4 assists and 2 steals . Willy_Hernangomez registered 10 points , 7 rebounds and 2 assists .

The contest got out to a competitive start , as the teams traded the lead through the first quarter , before the Hawks took a 29 - 28 lead into the second . The Hawks led for the entire quarter and took an 11 - point lead into halftime . The Jazz went on to outscore the Hawks by 16 points in the quarter , to take a 5 - point lead into the fourth . The Hawks started chipping away to start the fourth and made it a 1 - point game with just over 7 minutes to go . Trae_Young led the Hawks with 23 points , 11 assists and 2 rebounds , in 34 minutes . Dewayne_Dedmon followed up with 18 points , 9 rebounds , 3 blocks and 2 assists , while Kevin Heurter added 14 points , 2 assists and 2 rebound . Dennis_Schroder led the way for the Thunder with 32 points , adding 5 rebounds , 3 assists and 4 steals . Jerami_Grant provided 28 points , 5 rebounds and 1 assist . Russell_Westbrook supplied a 15 - point , 17 - assist , 11 - rebound triple_double that included 1 steal and 1 block . Markief Markieff_Morris and Raymond_Felton generated matching 12 - point tallies while hauling in 10 rebounds and dishing out 7 assists , respectively . Terrance_Ferguson and Abdel_Nader furnished 11 points apiece . Tim_Frazier paced the Bucks with 29 points and supplemented them with 13 assists , 6 rebounds and 1 block . Bonzie_Colson and Khris_Middleton posted 21 points each , with Bonzie_Colson also bringing down 10 rebounds . DJ_Wilson posted an 18 - point , 17 - rebound double_double that also included 4 assists and 1 steal . Patrick Pat_Connaughton poured in 12 points and added 5 rebounds , 1 assist and 1 steal .
The Detroit Pistons defeated the host New_York Knicks 115 - 89 , at Madison_Square_Garden on Wednesday evening . Nonetheless , the Pistons outscored the Knicks 36 - 22 in the first quarter , and added another 10 points to their lead by halftime . Luke_Kennard led the Pistons with 27 points , 5 rebounds and 2 assists , in 25 minutes off the bench . Andre_Drummond finished with 20 points , 18 rebounds , 3 assists and 2 steals , in 28 minutes , while Reggie_Jackson added 21 points , 7 assist and 4 rebounds . The Pistons shot 48 percent from the field , including 14 - of - 33 from deep . John_Jenkins led the Knicks with 16 points , 3 rebounds and 3 assists , in 27 minutes off the bench . Kadeem_Allen tallied 13 points , 8 assists , 5 rebounds , 2 steals and 1 block , while Henry_Ellenson added 12 points , 4 rebounds and 2 blocks . The Knicks shot 40 percent from the field , including 9 - of - 30 from long range .
The Philadelphia 76ers defeated the visiting Chicago Bulls , 125 - 109 , at Wells_Fargo_Center on Wednesday evening . The Sixers got out to a great start at home , with a 32 - 20 lead after 1 quarter . They kept the same energy in the second and outscored the visitors by 8 in the quarter , to take a 20 - point lead by halftime . The Bulls did not have much to offer in the third , as they were outscored by 13 in the quarter and trailed by 33 , entering the final frame . However , they pulled together in the fourth with a massive rally , outscoring the Sixers 45 - 28 in the quarter , but it was too little , too late , as the Bulls closed out their season with a third straight loss . Jonathan Jonathon_Simmons led the 76ers with 20 points , 7 rebounds , 5 assists and 1 block , in 30 minutes . Boban_Marjanovic added 18 points , 8 rebounds , 6 assists and 2 blocks , while TJ_McConnell finished with 18 points , 6 assists , 2 rebounds and 1 block . The 76ers shot 56 percent from the field , including 12 - of - 26 from long range . Meanwhile , 7 players scored in double_digit for the Bulls , led by Walter_Lemon_Jr. , who finished with 20 points , 6 rebounds and 4 assists , in 28 minutes . Ryan_Arcidiacono finished with 14 points , 6 rebounds , 6 assists and 1 steal , while Timothe_Luwawu-Cabarrot tallied 14 points , 4 rebounds and 2 assists .
The Memphis Grizzlies defeated the Golden_State Warriors , 132 - 117 , at Fed_Ex_Forum_Arena on Wednesday night . The rag - tag squad fielded by the defending champs helped the Grizzlies ( 33 - 49 ) accumulate a whopping 86 first - half points . Kevin_Durant led the way for the Warriors with 21 points , adding 6 assists and 1 steal over just 18 minutes . Klay_Thompson followed with 19 points , 3 assists , 1 rebound , 1 steal and 1 block . Jordan_Bell totaled 15 points , 8 rebounds , 1 assist and 1 block . Marcus_Derrickson delivered 13 points and 2 rebounds . Quinn_Cook and Damion_Lee mustered 10 points each . Jevon_Carter paced the Grizzlies with 32 points , complementing them with 4 rebounds , 2 assists and 1 steal . Justin_Holiday finished with 22 points , 4 rebounds and 1 assist . Bruno_Caboclo registered 21 points , 4 rebounds , 2 assists and 1 steal . Tyler_Dorsey collected 18 points , 4 rebounds , 3 assists and 1 steal . Delon_Wright contributed a 13 - point , 11 - rebound , 11 - assist triple_double that also included 3 steals .
The Milwaukee Bucks defeated the visiting Detroit Pistons , 121 - 86 , in Game 1 of the Western_Conference first - round playoffs , at Fiserv Forum on Sunday evening . The Bucks got out to a great start at home , with a 38 - 18 lead after 1 quarter . The Pistons had no answers in the second half , as the Bucks outscored them by 9 in the third quarter , to make it a 36 - point game heading into the final frame . Giannis_Antetokounmpo led the Bucks with 24 points , 17 rebounds , 4 assists and 1 steal , in 23 minutes . George_Hill added 16 points , 3 rebounds , 2 assists and 1 steal , in 23 minutes off the bench . Khris_Middleton finished with 14 points , 5 rebounds and 4 assists , in 25 minutes . The Bucks shot 49 percent from the field , including 15 - of - 43 from long range . Meanwhile , Luke_Kennard led the Pistons with 21 points , 4 rebounds and 2 assists , in 28 minutes off the bench . Andre_Drummond followed up with 12 points , 12 rebounds , 2 assists and 1 steal , while Reggie_Jackson chipped in 12 points , 5 assists , 1 steal and 1 rebound . The Pistons shot 38 percent from the field , including 8 - of - 27 from long range .
The Philadelphia 76ers defeated the Brooklyn Nets , 145 - 123 , at Wells_Fargo_Center on Tuesday night in Game 2 of their Eastern_Conference first - round playoff series . The 76ers ( 1 - 1 ) came out in markedly better form than they had in Game 1 , but the Nets ( 1 - 1 ) were far from satisfied with having already stolen 1 game in enemy territory . Brooklyn roared back from a 6 - point first - quarter deficit to pull within 1 by halftime . Spencer_Dinwiddie led the Nets with 19 points , adding 3 assists and 1 rebound . D'Angelo_Russell furnished 16 points , 2 rebounds and 2 assists over 25 minutes . Rondae_Hollis-Jefferson delivered 15 points , 3 rebounds , 1 assist and 1 block . Shabazz_Napier tallied 13 points , 3 boards and 1 assist . Caris_LeVert matched his scoring total off the bench and added 4 boards and 1 assist . Joel_Embiid paced the 76ers with a 23 - point , 10 - rebound double_double that also included 1 assist and 1 steal . Tobias_Harris bounced back from a rough Game 1 to post 19 points , 5 rebounds , 2 assists and 1 block . Ben_Simmons contributed an 18 - point , 12 - assist , 10 - rebound triple_double that also included 2 steals . JJ_Redick poured in 17 points . Boban_Marjanovic and Mike_Scott came off the bench to score 16 and 15 points , respectively , with Boban_Marjanovic also pulling down 8 rebounds .
The San_Antonio Spurs defeated the Denver Nuggets , 118 - 108 , at AT_&_T_Center on Thursday night in Game 3 of their Western_Conference first - round playoff series . The Spurs ( 2 - 1 ) were likely itching to get the bad taste of the Game 2 loss out of their mouth , and they got off to a good start in that regard on their home court . San_Antonio jumped out to a 31 - 22 lead through the first 12 minutes , and despite the Nuggets ( 1 - 2 ) putting a 6 point dent into that lead during the second period , the home squad still held a halftime advantage . Nikola_Jokic led the way for the Nuggets with 22 points , adding 8 rebounds and 6 rebounds . Malik_Beasley followed with 20 points , 9 rebounds and 2 assists . Paul_Millsap poured in 14 points . Gary_Harris and Torrey_Craig generated matching 12 - point efforts while dishing out 7 assists and pulling down 6 rebounds , respectively . Monte_Morris furnished 10 points , 7 assists and 2 rebounds . Derrick_White paced the Spurs with a career - high 36 points , adding 5 rebounds , 5 assists , 3 steals and 1 block . DeMar_DeRozan followed with 25 points and also supplied 5 assists , 4 rebounds and 3 steals . LaMarcus_Aldridge registered an 18 - point , 11 - rebound double_double that also included 5 assists and 1 block . Rudy_Gay generated his first career postseason double_double with 11 points and 10 rebounds . Jakob_Poeltl and Bryn_Forbes netted 10 points apiece .
The Philadelphia 76ers defeated the Brooklyn Nets , 112 - 108 , at Barclays_Center on Saturday afternoon in Game 4 of their Eastern_Conference first - round playoff series . The Sixers held the Nets to just 17 points in the fourth quarter and 40 percent shooting overall . Joel_Embiid overcame his doubtful designation to generate a 31 - point , 16 - rebound double_double that also included 7 assists , 6 blocks and 2 steals . Tobias_Harris furnished 24 points , 9 rebounds , 6 assists , 1 steal and 1 block . Ben_Simmons tallied 15 points , 8 rebounds , 8 assists and 1 steal . Jimmy_Butler provided 11 points , 4 rebounds , 4 assists and 2 steals before his ejection after 24 minutes . JJ_Redick shot just 3 - for - 11 on his way to 9 points , with all 3 of his buckets coming from distance . Caris_LeVert paced the Nets with 25 points while also dishing out 6 assists , pulling down 5 rebounds and recording 1 steal . D'Angelo_Russell and Jarrett_Allen generated matching 21 - point tallies while hauling in 7 and 8 rebounds , respectively . Spencer_Dinwiddie managed 18 points , 4 rebounds and 1 steal . Joe_Harris poured in 10 points and also supplied 6 rebounds and 2 steals .
The Boston Celtics defeated the Indiana Pacers , 110 - 106 , in Game 4 of the Eastern_Conference first - round playoffs at Banker 's Life Fieldhouse on Sunday . The Celtics ( 40 ) were the better team throughout the series and it showed once again in this game ; despite the fact the Pacers ( 0 - 4 ) got off to a better start , they simply could n't hold on to their lead in the second half and ended crumbling in front of their own crowd . Indiana grabbed the lead following the first quarter ( 23 - 21 ) and they maintained that 2 - point edge after half - time ( 49 - 47 ) , but things changed drastically during the second half . Boston turned things around with a 26 - 23 third quarter that pushed them up by 1 after 3 ( 73 - 72 ) , and Brad Stevens ' men closed things out with a 37 - 34 fourth - quarter score . Seven Celtics finished with more than 10 points and the leading scorer came off the bench since Gordon_Hayward ended with 20 points in 34 minutes of action , while shooting 7 - of - 9 from the field . Marcus_Morris had 18 points off the bench as well , while Jayson_Tatum had 18 points and 8 boards . Kyrie_Irving had 14 points with 7 assists . Al_Horford came close to a triple_double with 14 points , 12 boards and 5 assists . Bojan_Bogdanovic led the way for the Pacers in this one since he finished with 22 points . Tyreke_Evans looked surprisingly productive off the bench with 21 points , while Darren_Collison chipped in with 19 points , 6 rebounds and 5 assists . Myles_Turner had 13 points with 7 boards , and Domantas_Sabonis added 14 points and 8 boards despite not starting .
The San_Antonio Spurs defeated the visiting Denver Nuggets , 120 - 103 , in Game 6 of the Western_Conference first - round playoffs at AT_&_T_Center on Thursday . In total , the Spurs outscored the Nuggets in the second half , 56 - 43 . San_Antonio 's offense was on point , as they shot 57 percent from the field and 42 percent from three_point range while holding Denver to 46 percent from the field and 25 percent from long range . The Nuggets ( 3 - 3 ) got a gem from Nikola_Jokic , as he collected 43 points , 12 rebounds , 9 assists and 2 steals . Jamal_Murray totaled 16 points , 3 rebounds and 6 assists . Torrey_Craig accrued 5 points , 6 rebounds and 6 assists while Gary_Harris amassed 14 points , 1 rebound and 2 assists . The Spurs ( 3 - 3 ) were led by LaMarcus_Aldridge , as he tallied 26 points , 10 rebounds and 5 assists . DeMar_DeRozan accumulated 25 points , 7 rebounds and 7 assists . Rudy_Gay was huge off the bench , providing 19 points , 4 rebounds , 2 assists and 2 blocks .
The Golden_State Warriors defeated the Los_Angeles Clippers , 129 - 110 , at Staples_Center on Friday night in Game 6 of their Western_Conference first - round playoff series Friday . The Warriors ( 4 - 2 ) received a significant wake - up call in the form of a Game 5 upset loss on their Oracle_Arena home floor , which left them in somewhat of a precarious position heading into enemy territory in Game 6 . However , Golden_State made a statement in the first half , building a 72 - 53 lead by intermission after finishing the first quarter with a modest 4 - point advantage . the defending champs kept their foot on the gas in the third , adding 5 more points to their edge to essentially seal the win , and by extension , the series . Kevin_Durant took matters into his own hands , scoring a game - high 50 points on 15 - for - 26 shooting and adding 6 rebounds , 5 assists , 1 steal and 1 block . Stephen_Curry followed with 24 points and complemented them with 6 rebounds , 6 assists and 1 steal . Draymond_Green overcame his wrist woes to post a 16 - point , 14 - rebound , 10 - assist triple_double that also included 4 blocks . Andre_Iguodala furnished 15 points to lead the second unit . Klay_Thompson netted 9 points , 7 rebounds , 1 assist , 3 blocks and 1 steal . Danilo_Gallinari paced the Clippers with 29 points and also offered 5 rebounds , 2 steals and 1 block . Shai_Gilgeous-Alexander delivered 22 points , 6 assists , 5 rebounds and 1 block . Patrick_Beverley posted an 11 - point , 14 - rebound double_double that included 7 assists , 2 blocks and 1 steal . Montrezl_Harrell and Landry_Shamet contributed matching 10 - point tallies .
The Milwaukee Bucks defeated the visiting Boston Celtics , 123 - 102 , in Game 2 of the Eastern_Conference semi - finals at Fiserv Forum on Tuesday . A 28 - 2 run in that third quarter was the key difference , as that allowed them to lead by at least 20 points for the entirety of the fourth quarter . The Celtics ( 1 - 1 ) were led by Marcus_Morris , as he amassed 17 points and 7 rebounds . Jaylen_Brown accrued 16 points , 6 rebounds and 3 assists . Al_Horford generated 15 points , 8 rebounds and 3 assists . Kyrie_Irving went just 4 - of - 18 from the field to finish with 9 points , 5 rebounds and 4 assists . The Bucks ( 1 - 1 ) were led by Giannis_Antetokounmpo , as he tallied 29 points , 10 rebounds , 4 assists and 2 steals . Khris_Middleton totaled 28 points and 7 boards . Eric_Bledsoe accumulated 21 points , 3 rebounds , 5 assists and 2 blocks . Pat_Connaughton was a nice spark off the bench , providing 5 points , 11 rebounds and 3 assists .
The Milwaukee Bucks defeated the Boston Celtics , 113 - 101 , at TD_Garden on Monday night in Game 4 of their Eastern_Conference semifinal - round playoff series . The Celtics ( 1 - 3 ) appeared set to make up for dropping Game 3 on their home court in the early stages Monday . Boston looked exceedingly sharp while building a 30 - 22 first - quarter lead over the Bucks ( 3 - 1 ) , but that would prove to be the high point of the game . Milwaukee had erased all but 2 points from its deficit by halftime and then asserted their dominance in a third period they won by a 33 - 23 margin . With an 8 - point lead going into the final 12 minutes , the Bucks allowed the Celtics to get as close as 91 - 86 before pulling away again for good . Giannis_Antetokounmpo led the way for the Bucks with 39 points , adding 16 rebounds , 4 assists , 1 steal and 1 block . George_Hill paced the second unit with 15 points , supplementing them with 5 assists and 4 rebounds . Khris_Middleton and Eric_Bledsoe generated matching 13 - point efforts , with Khris_Middleton also dishing out 7 assists . Nikola_Mirotic furnished 9 points and 6 rebounds , while Brook_Lopez totaled 7 points , 8 rebounds and 1 block . Kyrie_Irving shot just 7 - for - 22 but paced the Celtics with 23 points . He also compiled 10 assists , pulled down 6 rebounds and 2 steals but now has 3 consecutive sub - 40 percent shooting efforts . Al_Horford delivered 20 points , 6 rebounds , 5 assists and 1 block . Marcus_Morris generated an 18 - point , 14 - rebound double_double , his first time accomplishing the feat this postseason . Jayson_Tatum tallied 17 points , 10 rebounds , 4 assists and 2 blocks . Jaylen_Brown poured in 16 points and added 7 boards , 2 assists and 0 steal .
The Portland Trail_Blazers defeated the Denver Nuggets , 119 - 108 , in Thursday 's Game 6 at Moda_Center . The superstar point guard scored 18 points in the third period , helping the Trail_Blazers enter the final quarter with a 7 - point lead that they refused to let up . Damian_Lillard finished with a game - high 32 points with CJ_McCollum right behind him , posting 30 points of his own . He finished with 25 points on 8 - of - 12 shooting , and he led the way for a Portland second unit that accounted for 42 points Thursday . Meanwhile , the Nuggets ' bench was non - existent , accounting for just 13 points , and that ultimately ended up being the difference in Game 6 . All of Denver 's starters had solid outings with Nikola_Jokic leading the way yet again , posting 29 points on 10 - of - 15 shooting , 12 rebounds and 8 assists across 37 minutes . Jamal_Murray added 24 points , while Paul_Millsap and Gary_Harris added 17 and 15 points , respectively . In the end , however , it was n't a very efficient outing for the Nuggets , who shot just 38 percent from the floor .
The Golden_State Warriors defeated the host Portland Trail_Blazers , 110 - 99 , in Game 3 of the Western_Conference Finals , at Moda_Center on Saturday evening . The Trail_Blazers kept the upper hand though , as they outscored the visitors by 11 in the second quarter , to take a 13 - point lead into halftime . The Warriors came out on another level in the second half , as they got straight to business , outscoring the Trail_Blazers by 16 in the third quarter , to take a three_point lead into the fourth . Stephen_Curry led the Warriors with 36 points , 6 rebounds and 3 assists , in 37 minutes . Draymond_Green tallied a triple_double , with 20 points , 13 rebounds and 12 assists in 38 minutes . Klay_Thompson added 19 points , 5 rebounds , 5 assists , 2 steals and 2 blocks . The Warriors shot 49 percent from the field , including 8 - of - 26 from deep . Meanwhile , CJ_McCollum led the Trail_Blazers with 23 points , 5 assists , 3 rebounds and 2 steals , in 38 minutes . Damian_Lillard followed up with 19 points , 6 rebounds , 6 assists and 2 steals , while Myers Meyers_Leonard added 16 points , 4 assists and 3 rebounds . The Trail_Blazers shot 40 percent from the field , including 11 - of - 35 from long range .
